 12606                                  
 12607                                  ; DOSCODE:52F3h (MSDOS 621, MSDOS.SYS)
 12608                                  
 12609                                  ; The user wants to throw away what he's typed in and wants to start over.
 12610                                  ; We print the backslash and then go to the next line and tab to the correct
 12611                                  ; spot to begin the buffered input.
 12612                                  
 12613                                  KILNEW:
 12614 00001A4C B05C                            mov	al,'\'
 12615 00001A4E E8E201                          call	OUTT            ;Print the CANCEL indicator
 12616 00001A51 5E                              pop	si		;Remember start of edit buffer
 12617                                  PUTNEW:
 12618 00001A52 E81001                  	call	CRLF            ;Go to next line on screen
 12619 00001A55 36A0[FA01]              	mov	al,[SS:STARTPOS]
 12620 00001A59 E84B02                  	call	TAB             ;Tab over
 12621 00001A5C E96CFF                          JMP     NEWLIN		;Start over again
 12622                                  
 12623                                  ;	Destructively back up one character position
 12624                                  
 12625                                  BACKSP:
 12626                                  	; 09/09/2018
 12627 00001A5F E80800                  	Call    BackSpace
 12628 00001A62 EB83                    	JMP     short GETCH	; 15/01/2024
 12629                                  
 12630                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12631                                  ;User really wants an ESC character in his line
 12632                                  TWOESC:	
 12633 00001A64 2EA0[960A]              	mov	al,[cs:ESCCHAR] ; 10/06/2019
 12634 00001A68 EBA2                    	jmp	short SAVCH
 12635                                  
 12636                                  BackSpace:
 12637 00001A6A 08F6                    	or	dh,dh
 12638 00001A6C 7419                    	jz	short OLDBAK	;No chars in line, do nothing to line
 12639 00001A6E E85800                  	call	BACKUP          ;Do the backup
 12640 00001A71 268A05                  	mov	al,[es:di]	;Get the deleted char
 12641 00001A74 3C20                            cmp	al,20h	; ' '
 12642 00001A76 730F                    	jnb	short OLDBAK	;Was a normal char
 12643 00001A78 3C09                            cmp	al,c_HT ; 9
 12644 00001A7A 741B                    	jz	short BAKTAB	;Was a tab, fix up users display
 12645                                  ;; 9/27/86 fix for ctrl-U backspace
 12646 00001A7C 3C15                    	CMP     AL,"U"-"@" ; 15h ; ctrl-U is a section symbol not ^U
 12647 00001A7E 7407                    	JZ	short OLDBAK
 12648 00001A80 3C14                           	CMP     AL,"T"-"@" ; 14h ; ctrl-T is a paragraphs symbol not ^T
 12649 00001A82 7403                    	JZ	short OLDBAK
 12650                                  ;; 9/27/86 fix for ctrl-U backspace
 12651 00001A84 E84500                          call	BACKMES         ;Was a control char, zap the '^'
 12652                                  OLDBAK:
 12653 00001A87 36803E[7905]00                  cmp	byte [SS:INSMODE], 0
 12654 00001A8D 75B7                    	jnz	short OLDBAK_RETN ;In insert mode, done
 12655 00001A8F 08FF                    	or	bh,bh
 12656 00001A91 74B3                            jz	short OLDBAK_RETN 
 12657                                  				;Not advanced in template, stay where we are
 12658 00001A93 FECF                    	dec	bh		;Go back in template
 12659 00001A95 4E                              dec	si
 12660 00001A96 C3                      	retn
 12661                                  BAKTAB:
 12662 00001A97 57                              push	di
 12663 00001A98 4F                              dec	di		;Back up one char
 12664 00001A99 FD                              std			;Go backward
 12665 00001A9A 88F1                            mov	cl,dh		;Number of chars currently in line
 12666 00001A9C B020                            mov	al,20h	; ' '
 12667 00001A9E 53                              push	bx
 12668 00001A9F B307                            mov	bl,7		;Max
 12669 00001AA1 E30E                            jcxz	FIGTAB		;At start, do nothing
 12670                                  FNDPOS:
 12671 00001AA3 AE                              scasb			;Look back
 12672 00001AA4 7609                    	jbe	short CHKCNT
 12673 00001AA6 26807D0109              	cmp	byte [es:di+1],9
 12674 00001AAB 7409                    	jz	short HAVTAB	;Found a tab
 12675 00001AAD FECB                    	dec	bl		;Back one char if non tab control char
 12676                                  CHKCNT:
 12677 00001AAF E2F2                            loop	FNDPOS
 12678                                  FIGTAB:		
 12679 00001AB1 362A1E[FA01]            	sub	bl,[SS:STARTPOS]
 12680                                  HAVTAB:
 12681 00001AB6 28F3                    	sub	bl,dh
 12682 00001AB8 00D9                    	add	cl,bl
 12683 00001ABA 80E107                  	and	cl,7		;CX has correct number to erase
 12684 00001ABD FC                      	cld			;Back to normal
 12685 00001ABE 5B                      	pop	bx
 12686 00001ABF 5F                      	pop	di
 12687 00001AC0 74C5                    	jz	short OLDBAK	;Nothing to erase
 12688                                  TABBAK:
 12689 00001AC2 E80700                  	call	BACKMES
 12690 00001AC5 E2FB                    	loop	TABBAK		;Erase correct number of chars
 12691 00001AC7 EBBE                    	jmp	short OLDBAK
 12692                                  
 12693                                  BACKUP:
 12694 00001AC9 FECE                            dec	dh		;Back up in line
 12695 00001ACB 4F                              dec	di
 12696                                  BACKMES:
 12697 00001ACC B008                            mov	al,c_BS ; 8	;Backspace
 12698 00001ACE E86201                          call	OUTT
 12699 00001AD1 B020                            mov	al,20h ; ' '	;Erase
 12700 00001AD3 E85D01                          call	OUTT
 12701 00001AD6 B008                            mov	al,c_BS ; 8	;Backspace
 12702 00001AD8 E95801                  	jmp	OUTT		;Done
 12703                                  
 12704                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12705                                  ;User really wants an ESC character in his line
 12706                                  ;TWOESC:	
 12707                                  ;	mov	al,[cs:ESCCHAR] ; 10/06/2019
 12708                                  ;	jmp	SAVCH
 12709                                  
 12710                                  ;Copy the rest of the template
 12711                                  COPYLIN:
 12712 00001ADB 88D9                            mov	cl,bl		;Total size of template
 12713 00001ADD 28F9                    	sub	cl,bh		;Minus position in template, is number to move
 12714 00001ADF EB07                            jmp	short COPYEACH
 12715                                  
 12716                                  COPYSTR:
 12717 00001AE1 E83200                  	call	FINDOLD         ;Find the char
 12718 00001AE4 EB02                    	jmp	short COPYEACH  ;Copy up to it
 12719                                  
 12720                                  ;Copy one char from template to line
 12721                                  COPYONE:
 12722 00001AE6 B101                            mov	cl,1
 12723                                  ;Copy CX chars from template to line
 12724                                  COPYEACH:
 12725 00001AE8 36C606[7905]00                  mov	byte [SS:INSMODE],0	;All copies turn off insert mode
 12726 00001AEE 38D6                    	cmp	dh,dl
 12727 00001AF0 740F                            jz	short GETCH2		;At end of line, can't do anything
 12728 00001AF2 38DF                            cmp	bh,bl
 12729 00001AF4 740B                            jz	short GETCH2		;At end of template, can't do anything
 12730 00001AF6 AC                              lodsb
 12731 00001AF7 AA                              stosb
 12732 00001AF8 E8CC01                  	call	BUFOUT
 12733 00001AFB FEC7                            inc	bh			;Ahead in template
 12734 00001AFD FEC6                            inc	dh			;Ahead in line
 12735 00001AFF E2E7                            loop	COPYEACH
 12736                                  GETCH2:
 12737 00001B01 E9E3FE                          jmp	GETCH
 12738                                  
 12739                                  ;Skip one char in template
 12740                                  SKIPONE:
 12741 00001B04 38DF                    	cmp	bh,bl
 12742 00001B06 74F9                    	jz	short GETCH2		;At end of template
 12743 00001B08 FEC7                    	inc	bh			;Ahead in template
 12744 00001B0A 46                      	inc	si
 12745                                          ;jmp	GETCH
 12746                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12747 00001B0B EBF4                    	jmp	short GETCH2
 12748                                  
 12749                                  SKIPSTR:
 12750 00001B0D E80600                  	call	FINDOLD                 ;Find out how far to go
 12751 00001B10 01CE                            add	si,cx			;Go there
 12752 00001B12 00CF                            add	bh,cl
 12753                                          ;jmp	GETCH
 12754                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12755 00001B14 EBEB                    	jmp	short GETCH2
 12756                                  
 12757                                  ;Get the next user char, and look ahead in template for a match
 12758                                  ;CX indicates how many chars to skip to get there on output
 12759                                  ;NOTE: WARNING: If the operation cannot be done, the return
 12760                                  ;       address is popped off and a jump to GETCH is taken.
 12761                                  ;       Make sure nothing extra on stack when this routine
 12762                                  ;       is called!!! (no PUSHes before calling it).
 12763                                  
 12764                                  FINDOLD:
 12765 00001B16 E830FE                          call	_$STD_CON_INPUT_NO_ECHO
 12766                                  
 12767                                  	; STRIN.ASM (MSDOS 2.11, 19/07/2018) 
 12768                                  
 12769                                  	;CMP     AL,[SS:ESCCHAR]	
 12770                                  	;JNZ     SHORT FINDSETUP
 12771                                  
 12772                                  	; CPMIO.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0)
 12773                                  
 12774                                  ;hkn; ESCCHAR is in TABLE seg (DOSCODE), so CS override
 12775                                  
 12776 00001B19 2E3A06[960A]            	CMP	AL,[CS:ESCCHAR]		; did he type a function key?
 12777 00001B1E 7505                    	JNZ	SHORT FINDSETUP		; no, set up for scan
 12778                                  
 12779 00001B20 E826FE                  	CALL	_$STD_CON_INPUT_NO_ECHO	; eat next char
 12780 00001B23 EB1D                            JMP	SHORT NOTFND		; go try again
 12781                                  FINDSETUP:
 12782 00001B25 88D9                    	mov	cl,bl
 12783 00001B27 28F9                            sub	cl,bh		;CX is number of chars to end of template
 12784 00001B29 7417                    	jz	short NOTFND	;At end of template
 12785 00001B2B 49                              dec	cx		;Cannot point past end, limit search
 12786 00001B2C 7414                            jz	short NOTFND	;If only one char in template, forget it
 12787 00001B2E 06                      	push	es
 12788 00001B2F 1E                      	push	ds
 12789 00001B30 07                      	pop	es
 12790 00001B31 57                      	push	di
 12791 00001B32 89F7                    	mov	di,si		;Template to ES:DI
 12792 00001B34 47                      	inc	di
 12793 00001B35 F2AE                    	repne	scasb		;Look
 12794 00001B37 5F                      	pop	di
 12795 00001B38 07                      	pop	es
 12796 00001B39 7507                    	jnz	short NOTFND	;Didn't find the char
 12797 00001B3B F6D1                            not	cl		;Turn how far to go into how far we went
 12798 00001B3D 00D9                            add	cl,bl		;Add size of template
 12799 00001B3F 28F9                            sub	cl,bh		;Subtract current pos, result distance to skip
 12800                                  FINDOLD_RETN:
 12801 00001B41 C3                      	retn
 12802                                  
 12803                                  NOTFND:
 12804 00001B42 5D                      	pop	bp              ;Chuck return address
 12805                                  	;jmp	GETCH
 12806                                  	; 15/01/2024
 12807                                  GETCH2_j:
 12808 00001B43 EBBC                    	jmp	short GETCH2
 12809                                  
 12810                                  REEDIT:
 12811 00001B45 B040                    	mov	al,'@'		;Output re-edit character
 12812 00001B47 E8E900                  	call	OUTT
 12813 00001B4A 5F                      	pop	di
 12814 00001B4B 57                      	push	di
 12815 00001B4C 06                      	push	es

 12818 00001B51 1F                      	pop	ds

 12844                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12845                                  ;
 12846                                  ;**	$RAW_CON_IO - Do Raw Console I/O
 12847                                  ;
 12848                                  ;	Input or output raw character from console, no echo
 12849                                  ;
 12850                                  ;	ENTRY	DL = -1 if input
 12851                                  ;		   =  output character if output
 12852                                  ;	EXIT	(AL) = input character if input
 12853                                  ;	USES	all
 12854                                  ;
 12855                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12856                                  ; 20/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 12857                                  
 12858                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12859                                  ; DOSCODE:541Ch (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 12860                                  
 12861                                  ; 08/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 12862                                  ; DOSCODE:5408h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 12863                                  
 12864                                  _$RAW_CON_IO:			; System call 6
 12865                                  
 12866 00001B6F 88D0                            MOV	AL,DL
 12867 00001B71 3CFF                            CMP	AL,-1
 12868 00001B73 7541                    	JNZ	SHORT RAWOUT ; 16/12/2022
 12869                                  	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 12870                                  	;jz	short rci1
 12871                                  	;jmp	short RAWOUT
 12872                                  	; 16/12/202
 12873                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 12874                                  	;nop
 12875                                  rci1:
 12876                                  			; Get pointer to register save area
 12877 00001B75 36C43E[8405]            	LES	DI,[SS:USER_SP] ; 12/03/2018
 12878 00001B7A 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX
 12879                                      	;CALL	GET_IO_FCB	; MSDOS 2.11 (Retro DOS v2.0)
 12880 00001B7C E85A23                  	CALL	GET_IO_SFT	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 12881                                          ;JC	SHORT RET17
 12882 00001B7F 72C0                            jc	short FINDOLD_RETN
 12883 00001B81 B401                    	MOV	AH,1
 12884 00001B83 E8DB32                  	CALL	IOFUNC
 12885 00001B86 750B                    	JNZ	SHORT RESFLG
 12886 00001B88 E87F3F                  	CALL	SPOOLINT
 12887                                  	;OR	BYTE [ES:DI+16H],40H
 12888 00001B8B 26804D1640              	OR	BYTE [ES:DI+user_env.user_F],40H ; Set user's zero flag
 12889 00001B90 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL
 12890                                  RET17:
 12891 00001B92 C3                      	RETN
 12892                                  
 12893                                  RESFLG:
 12894                                  	;AND	BYTE [ES:DI+16H],0FFH-40H  ; 0BFh
 12895 00001B93 26806516BF              	AND	BYTE [ES:DI+user_env.user_F],0FFH-40H
 12896                                  				; Reset user's zero flag
 12897                                  ;RILP:
 12898                                  rci0:
 12899 00001B98 E86F3F                       	CALL	SPOOLINT
 12900                                  ;
 12901                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12902                                  ;
 12903                                  ;**	$Raw_CON_INPUT - Raw Console Input
 12904                                  ;
 12905                                  ;	Input raw character from console, no echo
 12906                                  ;
 12907                                  ;	ENTRY	none
 12908                                  ;	EXIT	(al) = character
 12909                                  ;	USES	all
 12910                                  ;
 12911                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12912                                  ;
 12913                                  
 12914                                  ;rci0:	invoke	SPOOLINT
 12915                                  
 12916                                  	;entry	$RAW_CON_INPUT
 12917                                  
 12918                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12919                                  
 12920                                  ; DOSCODE:544Bh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 12921                                  
 12922                                  	; 15/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 12923                                  
 12924                                  ; DOSCODE:5ACBh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 12925                                  
 12926                                  _$RAW_CON_INPUT:		; System call 7
 12927 00001B9B 53                      	push	bx
 12928 00001B9C 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX
 12929                                  	;CALL	GET_IO_FCB	; MSDOS 2.11 (Retro DOS v2.0)
 12930 00001B9E E83823                  	CALL	GET_IO_SFT	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 12931 00001BA1 5B                      	pop	bx
 12932 00001BA2 72EE                    	JC	SHORT RET17
 12933 00001BA4 B401                    	MOV	AH,1
 12934 00001BA6 E8B832                  	CALL	IOFUNC
 12935                                  	;JZ	SHORT RILP	; MSDOS 2.11
 12936                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 12937                                          ;CALL	IOFUNC
 12938                                          ;RETN
 12939 00001BA9 7506                    	jnz	short rci5	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 12940 00001BAB B484                    	MOV	AH,84h
 12941 00001BAD CD2A                    	INT	int_IBM  ; int 2Ah
 12942 00001BAF EBE7                    	JMP	short rci0
 12943                                  rci5:	
 12944 00001BB1 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 12945                                  	;CALL	IOFUNC
 12946                                  	;RETN
 12947                                  	; 18/12/2022
 12948 00001BB3 E9AB32                  	jmp	IOFUNC
 12949                                  
 12950                                  ;       Output the character in AL to stdout
 12951                                  ;
 12952                                  	;entry	RAWOUT
 12953                                  RAWOUT:
 12954 00001BB6 53                      	PUSH    BX

 13030                                  	;OR	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],CTRL_BREAK_FLAG ; 001000000000b

 13039 00001BFA E86432                  	CALL	IOFUNC
 13040 00001BFD 74ED                    	JZ	SHORT ROLP
 13041                                  
 13042                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 13043                                  ;SR;
 13044                                  ; IOFUNC now returns ax = 0ffffh if there was an I24 on a status call and
 13045                                  ;the user failed. We do not send a char if this happens. We however return
 13046                                  ;to the caller with carry clear because this DOS call does not return any
 13047                                  ;status. 
 13048                                  ;

 13087                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3 kernel) - Offset 2252h
 13088                                  
 13089                                  ;
 13090                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13091                                  ;
 13092                                  ; Inputs:
 13093                                  ;	AX=0 save the DEVCALL request packet
 13094                                  ;	  =1 restore the DEVCALL request packet
 13095                                  ; Function:
 13096                                  ;	save or restore the DEVCALL packet
 13097                                  ; Returns:
 13098                                  ;	none
 13099                                  ;
 13100                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13101                                  ;
 13102                                  
 13103                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13104                                  ; DOSCODE:54B9h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 13105                                  
 13106                                  ; 08/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 13107                                  ; DOSCODE:54A5h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 13108                                  
 13109                                  ; 12/05/2019
 13110                                  
 13111                                  	; 15/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 13112                                  	; DOSCODE:5B42h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 13113                                  
 13114                                  Save_Restore_Packet:
 13115 00001C0A 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 13116 00001C0B 06                      	PUSH	ES
 13117 00001C0C 56                      	PUSH	SI
 13118 00001C0D 57                      	PUSH	DI
 13119                                  
 13120                                  	; 16/12/2022
 13121                                  	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 13122                                  	; 09/09/2018
 13123 00001C0E BF[BD0D]                	mov	di,FAKE_STACK_2F 
 13124 00001C11 BE[5A03]                	mov	si,DEVCALL
 13125                                  	;
 13126                                  	; 21/09/2023
 13127 00001C14 09C0                    	or	ax,ax 
 13128                                  	;CMP	AX,0		; save packet
 13129 00001C16 7402                    	JZ	short save_packet ; 16/12/2022
 13130                                  	;je	short set_seg
 13131                                  
 13132                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 13133                                  restore_packet:
 13134                                  ;	MOV	SI,OFFSET DOSDATA:Packet_Temp	;source
 13135                                  ;	MOV	DI,OFFSET DOSDATA:DEVCALL	;destination
 13136                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 13137                                  	;mov	si,FAKE_STACK_2F ; DOS_TEMP ; Packed_Temp 
 13138                                  	;mov	di,DEVCALL  ; 09/09/2018
 13139                                  	;
 13140                                  	;JMP	short set_seg
 13141                                  
 13142                                  	; 16/12/2022	
 13143                                  	; 09/09/2018
 13144 00001C18 87F7                    	xchg	si,di  ; DI = offset DEVCALL, SI = offset FAKE_STACK_2F
 13145                                  
 13146                                  ; 16/12/2022
 13147                                  %if 0
 13148                                  	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 13149                                  	cmp	ax,0		; save packet
 13150                                  	jz	short save_packet
 13151                                  	mov	si,FAKE_STACK_2F ; 07/12/2022
 13152                                  	mov	di,DEVCALL 
 13153                                  	jmp	short set_seg
 13154                                  
 13155                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 13156                                  save_packet:
 13157                                  ;	MOV	DI,OFFSET DOSDATA:Packet_Temp	;destination
 13158                                  ;	MOV	SI,OFFSET DOSDATA:DEVCALL	;source
 13159                                  	; 09/09/2018
 13160                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 13161                                  	;mov	di,FAKE_STACK_2F ; DOS_TEMP ; Packed_Temp 
 13162                                  	;mov	si,DEVCALL ; 09/09/2018
 13163

 13165                                  	mov	di,FAKE_STACK_2F ; DOS_TEMP ; Packed_Temp 
 13166                                  	mov	si,DEVCALL
 13167                                  %endif
 13168                                  
 13169                                  ; 16/12/2022
 13170                                  save_packet:
 13171                                  ;set_seg:
 13172                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 13173                                  	;mov	ax,cs
 13174                                  
 13175                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 13176                                  	;MOV	AX,SS		; set DS,ES to DOSDATA
 13177                                  	;MOV	DS,AX
 13178                                  	;MOV	ES,AX
 13179                                  	; 15/01/2024

 13181 00001C1B 1F                      	pop	ds

 13604                                  ;			 MZ  6 June  1983 completion of functions
 13605                                  ;			 MZ 15 Dec   1983 Brain damaged programs close FCBs multiple

 13607                                  ;					  always returning OK.	Also, detect I/O to

 13614                                  ;Break <$Get_FCB_Position - set random record fields to current pos>
 13615                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13616                                  ;
 13617                                  ;   $Get_FCB_Position - look at an FCB, retrieve the current position from the
 13618                                  ;	extent and next record field and set the random record field to point
 13619                                  ;	to that record
 13620                                  ;
 13621                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a possible extended FCB
 13622                                  ;   Outputs:	The random record field of the FCB is set to the current record
 13623                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 13624                                  ;
 13625                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13626                                  ;
 13627                                  
 13628                                  _$GET_FCB_POSITION:
 13629 00001D4E E80A05                  	call	GetExtended		; point to FCB
 13630 00001D51 E8DB04                  	call	GetExtent		; DX:AX is current record
 13631                                  	;mov	[si+21h],ax
 13632 00001D54 894421                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR],AX 	; drop in low order piece
 13633                                  	;mov	[si+23h],dl
 13634 00001D57 885423                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+2],DL	; drop in high order piece
 13635                                  	;cmp	word [si+0Eh],64
 13636 00001D5A 837C0E40                	CMP	word [SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ],64
 13637 00001D5E 7303                    	JAE	short GetFCBBye
 13638                                  	;mov	[si+24h],dh
 13639 00001D60 887424                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+2+1],DH	; Set 4th byte only if record size < 64
 13640                                  GoodPath:	; 16/12/2022
 13641                                  GetFCBBye:
 13642 00001D63 E926E9                  	jmp	FCB_RET_OK
 13643                                  
 13644                                  ;Break <$FCB_Delete - remove several files that match the input FCB>
 13645                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13646                                  ;
 13647                                  ;**	$FCB_Delete - Delete from FCB Template
 13648                                  ;
 13649                                  ;	given an FCB, remove all directory entries in the current
 13650                                  ;	directory that have names that match the FCB's ?  marks.
 13651                                  ;
 13652                                  ;	ENTRY	(DS:DX) = address of FCB
 13653                                  ;	EXIT	entries matching the FCB are deleted
 13654                                  ;		(al) = ff iff no entries were deleted
 13655                                  ;	USES	all
 13656                                  ;
 13657                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13658                                  ;
 13659                                  	; 08/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 13660                                  
 13661                                  _$FCB_DELETE:		; System call 19
 13662                                  					; OpenBuf is in DOSDATA
 13663 00001D66 BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF 		; appropriate place 
 13664                                  
 13665 00001D69 E8AD57                  	call	TransFCB		; convert FCB to path
 13666 00001D6C 7207                    	JC	short BadPath 		; signal no deletions
 13667                                  
 13668 00001D6E 16                      	push	SS
 13669 00001D6F 1F                      	pop	DS			; SS is DOSDATA
 13670                                  
 13671 00001D70 E8FC0D                  	call	DOS_DELETE		; wham
 13672                                  	;JC	short BadPath
 13673                                  	; 16/12/2022
 13674 00001D73 73EE                    	jnc 	short GoodPath
 13675                                  ;GoodPath:
 13676                                  ;	;jmp	FCB_RET_OK		; do a good return
 13677                                  ;	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 13678                                  ;	jmp	short GetFCBBye
 13679                                  
 13680                                  BadPath:
 13681                                  	; Error code is in AX
 13682                                  
 13683 00001D75 E917E9                  	jmp	FCB_RET_ERR		; let someone else signal the error
 13684                                  
 13685                                  ;Break <$Get_FCB_File_Length - return the length of a file>
 13686                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13687                                  ;
 13688                                  ;   $Get_FCB_File_Length - set the random record field to the length of the
 13689                                  ;	file in records (rounded up if partial).
 13690                                  ;
 13691                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX - point to a possible extended FCB
 13692                                  ;   Outputs:	Random record field updated to reflect the number of records
 13693                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 13694                                  ;
 13695                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13696                                  ;

 13700                                  
 13701 00001D78 E8E004                  	call	GetExtended		; get real FCB pointer
 13702                                  					; DX points to Input FCB
 13703

 13705 00001D7B BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; appropriate buffer
 13706                                  
 13707 00001D7E 1E                      	push	ds			; save pointer to true FCB
 13708 00001D7F 56                      	push	si

 13710 00001D83 5E                      	pop	si
 13711 00001D84 1F                      	pop	ds

 13718 00001D8E 5E                      	pop	si			; get pointer back
 13719 00001D8F 1F                      	pop	ds
 13720 00001D90 72E3                    	JC	short BadPath 		; invalid something
 13721                                  	; 15/01/2024
 13722                                  	;MOV	DX,BX (*)		; get high order size
 13723                                  	;MOV	AX,DI (**)		; get low order size
 13724 00001D92 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx ; hw of file size
 13725                                  	;
 13726                                  	;mov	bx,[si+0Eh]
 13727 00001D94 8B5C0E                  	MOV	BX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ]	; get his record size
 13728 00001D97 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX			; empty record => 0 size for file
 13729 00001D99 7502                    	JNZ	short GetSize 		; not empty
 13730                                  	;MOV	BX,128
 13731 00001D9B B380                    	mov	bl,128	; 15/01/2024
 13732                                  GetSize:
 13733                                  	; 15/01/2024
 13734                                  	;MOV	DI,AX			; save low order word
 13735                                  	;MOV	AX,DX			; move high order for divide
 13736                                  	;xchg	ax,dx ; (*)
 13737                                  	; ax = hw of file size
 13738                                  
 13739 00001D9D 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX			; clear out high
 13740 00001D9F F7F3                    	DIV	BX			; wham
 13741 00001DA1 50                      	PUSH	AX			; save dividend
 13742 00001DA2 89F8                    	MOV	AX,DI ; (**)		; get low order piece
 13743 00001DA4 F7F3                    	DIV	BX			; wham
 13744 00001DA6 89D1                    	MOV	CX,DX			; save remainder
 13745 00001DA8 5A                      	POP	DX			; get high order dividend
 13746 00001DA9 E306                    	JCXZ	LengthStore		; no roundup
 13747 00001DAB 83C001                  	ADD	AX,1
 13748 00001DAE 83D200                  	ADC	DX,0			; 32-bit increment
 13749                                  LengthStore:
 13750                                  	;mov	[si+21h],ax
 13751 00001DB1 894421                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR],AX	; store low order
 13752                                  	;mov	[si+23h],dl
 13753 00001DB4 885423                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+2],DL	; store high order
 13754 00001DB7 08F6                    	OR	DH,DH
 13755 00001DB9 74A8                    	JZ	short GoodPath		; not storing insignificant zero
 13756                                  	;mov	[si+24h],dh
 13757 00001DBB 887424                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+3],DH	; save that high piece
 13758                                  	; 16/12/2022
 13759                                  GoodRet:
 13760                                  	;jmp	FCB_RET_OK
 13761 00001DBE EBA3                    	jmp	short GoodPath

 13763                                  ;Break <$FCB_Close - close a file>
 13764                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13765                                  ;
 13766                                  ;   $FCB_Close - given an FCB, look up the SFN and close it. Do not free it
 13767                                  ;	as the FCB may be used for further I/O
 13768                                  ;
 13769                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to FCB
 13770                                  ;   Outputs:	AL = FF if file was not found on disk
 13771                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 13772                                  ;
 13773                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13774                                  ;
 13775                                  	; 16/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 13776                                  
 13777                                  _$FCB_CLOSE:		; System call 16
 13778                                  
 13779 00001DC0 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL			; default search attributes
 13780 00001DC2 E89604                  	call	GetExtended		; DS:SI point to real FCB
 13781 00001DC5 7403                    	JZ	short NoAttr		; not extended
 13782 00001DC7 8A44FF                  	MOV	AL,[SI-1]		; get attributes
 13783                                  NoAttr:
 13784                                  					; SS override
 13785 00001DCA 36A2[6B05]              	MOV	[SS:ATTRIB],AL		; stash away found attributes
 13786 00001DCE E8DD03                  	call	SFTFromFCB
 13787 00001DD1 72EB                    	JC	short GoodRet 		; MZ 16 Jan Assume death
 13788                                  
 13789                                  	; If the sharer is present, then the SFT is not regenable. Thus, 
 13790                                  	; there is no need to set the SFT's attribute.
 13791

 13793                                  	;;; done
 13794                                  
 13795                                  	;mov	al,[es:di+4]
 13796 00001DD3 268A4504                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr]
 13797 00001DD7 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 13798 00001DD9 50                      	PUSH	AX
 13799

 13804 00001DDD 7508                    	JNZ	short NoStash
 13805 00001DDF 36A0[6B05]              	MOV	AL,[SS:ATTRIB]
 13806                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],al
 13807 00001DE3 26884504                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr],AL ; attempted attribute for close
 13808                                  NoStash:
 13809                                  
 13810                                  ; 16/01/2024
 13811                                  %if 0
 13812                                  	;mov	ax,[si+14h]
 13813                                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SYS_FCB.FDATE] ; move in the time and date
 13814                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Fh],ax
 13815                                  	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date],AX
 13816                                  	;mov	ax,[si+16h]

 13818                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Dh],ax
 13819                                  	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time],AX

 13823                                  	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size],AX

 13826                                  	;mov	[es:di+13h],ax

 13828                                  	;or	word [es:di+5],4000h

 13831                                  	;OR	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_close_nodate

 13834 00001DE7 1E                      	push	ds
 13835                                  	;lds	ax,[si+14h]
 13836 00001DE8 C54414                  	lds	ax,[si+SYS_FCB.FDATE]	; move in the time and date
 13837                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Fh],ax

 13846                                  	;mov	[es:di+13h],ds

 13848                                  	; 16/01/2024

 13852                                  %endif

 13890                                  ;
 13891                                  ;**	$FCB_Rename - Rename a File
 13892                                  ;
 13893                                  ;	$FCB_Rename - rename a file in place within a directory. Renames
 13894                                  ;	multiple files copying from the meta characters.
 13895                                  ;
 13896                                  ;	ENTRY	DS:DX point to an FCB. The normal name field is the source
 13897                                  ;		    name of the files to be renamed. Starting at offset 11h
 13898                                  ;		    in the FCB is the destination name.
 13899                                  ;	EXIT	AL = 0 -> no error occurred and all files were renamed
 13900                                  ;		AL = FF -> some files may have been renamed but:
 13901                                  ;			rename to existing file or source file not found
 13902                                  ;	USES	ALL
 13903                                  ;
 13904                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13905                                  ;
 13906                                  	; 08/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 13907                                  	; 16/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 13908                                  
 13909                                  _$FCB_RENAME:		; System call 23
 13910                                  
 13911 00001E2C E82C04                  	call	GetExtended		; get pointer to real FCB
 13912 00001E2F 52                      	push	dx
 13913 00001E30 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI] 		; get drive byte
 13914 00001E32 83C610                  	ADD	SI,10h			; point to destination
 13915                                  
 13916                                  					; RenBuf is in DOSDATA
 13917 00001E35 BF[3E04]                	MOV	DI,RENBUF		; point to destination buffer
 13918 00001E38 FF34                    	push	word [SI]
 13919 00001E3A 1E                      	push	ds
 13920                                  	;push	di			; save source pointer for TransFCB
 13921                                  	; 16/01/2024 (Retro DOS v4 BugFix!)
 13922 00001E3B 56                      	push	si
 13923 00001E3C 8804                    	MOV	[SI],AL			; drop in real drive
 13924 00001E3E 89F2                    	MOV	DX,SI			; let TransFCB know where the FCB is
 13925 00001E40 E8D656                  	call	TransFCB		; munch this pathname
 13926 00001E43 5E                      	pop	si
 13927 00001E44 1F                      	pop	ds	
 13928 00001E45 8F04                    	pop	WORD [SI]		; get path back
 13929 00001E47 5A                      	pop	dx			; Original FCB pointer
 13930 00001E48 72DF                    	JC	short fren90		; bad path -> error
 13931                                  
 13932                                  					; SS override for WFP_Start & Ren_WFP
 13933 00001E4A 368B36[B205]            	MOV	SI,[ss:WFP_START]	; get pointer
 13934 00001E4F 368936[B405]            	MOV	[ss:REN_WFP],SI		; stash it
 13935                                  
 13936                                  					; OpenBuf is in DOSDATA
 13937 00001E54 BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; appropriate spot
 13938 00001E57 E8BF56                  	call	TransFCB		; wham
 13939                                  					; NOTE that this call is pointing
 13940                                  					;  back to the ORIGINAL FCB so
 13941                                  					;  SATTRIB gets set correctly
 13942 00001E5A 72CD                    	JC	short fren90		; error
 13943                                  	;;;

 13957                                  
 13958                                  	; 16/12/2022
 13959                                  ;fren90:	
 13960                                  ;	;jmp	FCB_RET_ERR
 13961                                  ;	; 08/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 13962                                  ;	jmp	short fcb_close_err
 13963                                  
 13964                                  ;Break <Misbehavior fixers>
 13965                                  ;
 13966                                  ;   FCBs suffer from several problems. First, they are maintained in the
 13967                                  ;   user's space so he may move them at will. Second, they have a small
 13968                                  ;   reserved area that may be used for system information. Third, there was
 13969                                  ;   never any "rules for behavior" for FCBs; there was no protocol for their
 13970                                  ;   usage.
 13971                                  ;
 13972                                  ;   This results in the following misbehavior:
 13973                                  ;
 13974                                  ;	infinite opens of the same file:
 13975                                  ;
 13976                                  ;	While (TRUE) {			While (TRUE) {
 13977                                  ;	    FCBOpen (FCB);		    FCBOpen (FCB);
 13978                                  ;	    Read (FCB); 		    Write (FCB);
 13979                                  ;	    }				    }
 13980                                  ;
 13981                                  ;	infinite opens of different files:
 13982                                  ;
 13983                                  ;	While (TRUE) {			While (TRUE) {
 13984                                  ;	    FCBOpen (FCB[i++]); 	    FCBOpen (FCB[i++]);
 13985                                  ;	    Read (FCB); 		    Write (FCB);
 13986                                  ;	    }				    }
 13987                                  ;
 13988                                  ;	multiple closes of the same file:
 13989                                  ;
 13990                                  ;	FCBOpen (FCB);
 13991                                  ;	while (TRUE)
 13992                                  ;	    FCBClose (FCB);
 13993                                  ;
 13994                                  ;	I/O after closing file:
 13995                                  ;
 13996                                  ;	FCBOpen (FCB);
 13997                                  ;	while (TRUE) {
 13998                                  ;	    FCBWrite (FCB);
 13999                                  ;	    FCBClose (FCB);
 14000                                  ;	    }
 14001                                  ;
 14002                                  ;   The following is am implementation of a methodology for emulating the
 14003                                  ;   above with the exception of I/O after close. We are NOT attempting to
 14004                                  ;   resolve that particular misbehavior. We will enforce correct behaviour in
 14005                                  ;   FCBs when they refer to a network file or when there is file sharing on
 14006                                  ;   the local machine.
 14007                                  ;
 14008                                  ;   The reserved fields of the FCB (10 bytes worth) is divided up into various
 14009                                  ;   structures depending on the file itself and the state of operations of the
 14010                                  ;   OS. The information contained in this reserved field is enough to
 14011                                  ;   regenerate the SFT for the local non-shared file. It is assumed that this
 14012                                  ;   regeneration procedure may be expensive. The SFT for the FCB is
 14013                                  ;   maintained in a LRU cache as the ONLY performance inprovement.
 14014                                  ;
 14015                                  ;   No regeneration of SFTs is attempted for network FCBs.
 14016                                  ;
 14017                                  ;   To regenerate the SFT for a local FCB, it is necessary to determine if the
 14018                                  ;   file sharer is working. If the file sharer is present then the SFT is not
 14019                                  ;   regenerated.
 14020                                  ;
 14021                                  ;   Finally, if there is no local sharing, the full name of the file is no
 14022                                  ;   longer available. We can make up for this by using the following
 14023                                  ;   information:
 14024                                  ;
 14025                                  ;	The Drive number (from the DPB).
 14026                                  ;	The physical sector of the directory that contains the entry.
 14027                                  ;	The relative position of the entry in the sector.
 14028                                  ;	The first cluster field.
 14029                                  ;	The last used SFT.
 14030                                  ;      OR In the case of a device FCB
 14031                                  ;	The low 6 bits of sf_flags (indicating device type)
 14032                                  ;	The pointer to the device header
 14033                                  ;
 14034                                  ;   We read in the particular directory sector and examine the indicated
 14035                                  ;   directory entry. If it matches, then we are kosher; otherwise, we fail.
 14036                                  ;
 14037                                  ;   Some key items need to be remembered:
 14038                                  ;
 14039                                  ;	Even though we are caching SFTs, they may contain useful sharing
 14040                                  ;	information. We enforce good behavior on the FCBs.
 14041                                  ;
 14042                                  ;	Network support must not treat FCBs as impacting the ref counts on
 14043                                  ;	open VCs. The VCs may be closed only at process termination.
 14044                                  ;
 14045                                  ;	If this is not an installed version of the DOS, file sharing will
 14046                                  ;	always be present.
 14047                                  ;
 14048                                  ;	We MUST always initialize lstclus to = firclus when regenerating a
 14049                                  ;	file. Otherwise we start allocating clusters up the wazoo.
 14050                                  ;
 14051                                  ;	Always initialize, during regeneration, the mode field to both isFCB
 14052                                  ;	and open_for_both. This is so the FCB code in the sharer can find the
 14053                                  ;	proper OI record.
 14054                                  ;
 14055                                  ;   The test bits are:
 14056                                  ;
 14057                                  ;	00 -> local file
 14058                                  ;	40 -> sharing local
 14059                                  ;	80 -> network
 14060                                  ;	C0 -> local device
 14061                                  
 14062                                  ;Break	<SaveFCBInfo - store pertinent information from an SFT into the FCB>
 14063                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14064                                  ;
 14065                                  ;   SaveFCBInfo - given an FCB and its associated SFT, copy the relevant
 14066                                  ;	pieces of information into the FCB to allow for subsequent
 14067                                  ;	regeneration. Poke LRU also.
 14068                                  ;
 14069                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisSFT points to a complete SFT.
 14070                                  ;		DS:SI point to the FCB (not an extended one)
 14071                                  ;   Outputs:	The relevant reserved fields in the FCB are filled in.
 14072                                  ;		DS:SI preserved
 14073                                  ;		ES:DI point to sft
 14074                                  ;   Registers modified: All
 14075                                  ;
 14076                                  ;
 14077                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14078                                  ;
 14079

 14291                                  ;Break	<ResetLRU - reset overflowed lru counts>
 14292                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14293                                  ;
 14294                                  ;   ResetLRU - during lru updates, we may wrap at 64K. We must walk the
 14295                                  ;   entire set of SFTs and subtract 8000h from their lru counts and truncate
 14296                                  ;   at 0.
 14297                                  ;
 14298                                  ;   Inputs:	BX is offset into SFT field where lru firld is kept
 14299                                  ;		ES:DI point to SFT currently being updated
 14300                                  ;   Outputs:	All FCB SFTs have their lru fields truncated
 14301                                  ;		AX has 8000h
 14302                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 14303                                  ;
 14304                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14305                                  ;
 14306                                  
 14307                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14308                                  ResetLRU:
 14309                                  	; ResetLRU is only called from fcbio.asm. So SS can be assumed to be 
 14310                                  	; DOSDATA
 14311

 14314 00001F18 57                      	push	di

 14317                                  	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]

 14319                                  	;lea	di,[di+6]

 14321                                  ovScan:

 14373                                  ; 21/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 14374                                  ; LRUFCB for MSDOS 6.0 !
 14375                                  
 14376                                  ;Break	<LRUFCB - perform LRU on FCB sfts>
 14377                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14378                                  ;
 14379                                  ;   LRUFCB - find LRU fcb in cache. Set ThisSFT and return it. We preserve
 14380                                  ;	the first keepcount sfts if they are network sfts or if sharing is
 14381                                  ;	loaded.  If carry is set then NO BLASTING is NECESSARY.
 14382                                  ;
 14383                                  ;   Inputs:	none
 14384                                  ;   Outputs:	ES:DI point to SFT
 14385                                  ;		ThisSFT points to SFT
 14386                                  ;		SFT is zeroed
 14387                                  ;		Carry set of closes failed
 14388                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 14389                                  ;
 14390                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14391                                  ;
 14392                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 14393                                  ;IF 0	; rewritten this routine
 14394                                  ;
 14395                                  ;LRUFCB: ; MSDOS 3.3 - IBMDOS.COM (1987) - Offset 25ADh
 14396                                  ;	call	save_world
 14397                                  ;	
 14398                                  ; Find nth oldest NET/SHARE FCB. We want to find its age for the second scan
 14399                                  ; to find the lease recently used one that is younger than the open age.  We
 14400                                  ; operate be scanning the list n times finding the least age that is greater
 14401                                  ; or equal to the previous minimum age.
 14402                                  ;
 14403                                  ;   BP is the count of times we need to go through this loop.
 14404                                  ;   AX is the current acceptable minimum age to consider
 14405                                  ;
 14406                                  ;	mov	bp,[CS:KEEPCOUNT]	; k = keepcount;
 14407                                  ;	XOR	AX,AX			; low = 0;
 14408                                  ;
 14409                                  ; If we've scanned the table n times, then we are done.
 14410                                  ;
 14411                                  ;lru1:
 14412                                  ;	CMP	bp,0			; while (k--) {
 14413                                  ;	JZ	short lru75
 14414                                  ;	DEC	bp
 14415                                  ;
 14416                                  ; Set up for scan.
 14417                                  ;
 14418                                  ;   AX is the minimum age for consideration
 14419                                  ;   BX is the minimum age found during the scan
 14420                                  ;   SI is the position of the entry that corresponds to BX
 14421                                  ;
 14422                                  ;	MOV	BX,-1			;     min = 0xffff;
 14423                                  ;	MOV	si,BX			;     pos = 0xffff;
 14424                                  ;	LES	DI,[CS:SFTFCB]		;     for (CX=FCBCount; CX>0; CX--)
 14425                                  ;	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]
 14426                                  ;	MOV	CX,[ES:DI+SFT.SFCount]

 14430                                  ; Innermost loop.  If the current entry is free, then we are done.  Or, if the
 14431                                  ; current entry is busy (indicating a previous aborted allocation), then we
 14432                                  ; are done.  In both cases, we use the found entry.
 14433                                  ;

 14447                                  ;	JMP	short lru11		;	      goto got;

 14453                                  ;	    this entry becomes current minimum

 14466                                  ; current minimum.
 14467                                  ;

 14470                                  ;	MOV	DX,[ES:DI+sf_OpenAge]

 14472                                  ;	JB	short lru5
 14473                                  ;	CMP	DX,BX
 14474                                  ;	JAE	short lru5		;	      age[i] < min) {
 14475                                  ;
 14476                                  ; entry is new minimum.  Remember his age.
 14477                                  ;
 14478                                  ;	mov	bx,DX			;	      min = age[i];
 14479                                  ;	mov	si,di			;	      pos = i;
 14480                                  ;
 14481                                  ; End of loop.	gp back for more
 14482                                  ;
 14483                                  ;lru5:
 14484                                  ;	;add	di,53
 14485                                  ;	add	di,SF_ENTRY.size
 14486                                  ;	loop	lru2			;	      }
 14487                                  ;
 14488                                  ; The scan is complete. If we have successfully found a new minimum (pos != -1)
 14489                                  ; set then threshold value to this new minimum + 1. Otherwise, the scan is
 14490                                  ; complete.  Go find LRU.
 14491                                  ;
 14492                                  ;lru6:	
 14493                                  ;	cmp	si,-1			; position not -1?
 14494                                  ;	jz	short lru75		; no, done with everything
 14495                                  ;	lea	ax,[bx+1]		; set new threshold age
 14496                                  ;	jmp	short lru1		; go and loop for more
 14497                                  ;lru65:	
 14498                                  ;	stc
 14499                                  ;	jmp	short LRUDead		;	  return -1;
 14500                                  ;
 14501                                  ; Main loop is done. We have AX being the age+1 of the nth oldest sharer or
 14502                                  ; network entry. We now make a second pass through to find the LRU entry
 14503                                  ; that is local-no-share or has age >= AX
 14504                                  ;
 14505                                  ;lru75:
 14506                                  ;	mov	bx,-1			; min = 0xffff;
 14507                                  ;	mov	si,bx			; pos = 0xffff;
 14508                                  ;	LES	DI,[CS:SFTFCB]		; for (CX=FCBCount; CX>0; CX--)
 14509                                  ;	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]
 14510                                  ;	MOV	CX,[ES:DI+SFT.SFCount]
 14511                                  ;	;lea	di,[di+6]
 14512                                  ;	LEA	DI,[DI+SFT.SFTable]
 14513                                  ;
 14514                                  ; If this is is local-no-share then go check for LRU else if age >= threshold
 14515                                  ; then check for lru.
 14516                                  ;
 14517                                  ;lru8:
 14518                                  ;	;test	word [es:di+5],8000h
 14519                                  ;	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet
 14520                                  ;	jnz	short lru85		; is for network, go check age
 14521                                  ;	call	CheckShare		; sharer here?
 14522                                  ;	jz	short lru86		; no, go check lru
 14523                                  ;
 14524                                  ; Network or sharer.  Check age
 14525                                  ;
 14526                                  ;lru85:
 14527                                  ;	;cmp	[es:di+17h],ax
 14528                                  ;	cmp	[es:di+sf_OpenAge],ax
 14529                                  ;	jb	short lru9		; age is before threshold, skip it
 14530                                  ;
 14531                                  ; Check LRU
 14532                                  ;
 14533                                  ;lru86:
 14534                                  ;	;cmp	[es:di+15h],bx
 14535                                  ;	cmp	[es:di+sf_LRU],bx	; is LRU less than current LRU?
 14536                                  ;	jae	short lru9		; no, skip this
 14537                                  ;	mov	si,di			; remember position
 14538                                  ;	;mov	bx,[es:di+15h]
 14539                                  ;	mov	bx,[es:di+sf_LRU]	; remember new minimum LRU
 14540                                  ;
 14541                                  ; Done with this entry, go back for more.
 14542                                  ;
 14543                                  ;lru9:
 14544                                  ;	;add	di, 53
 14545                                  ;	add	di,SF_ENTRY.size
 14546                                  ;	loop	lru8
 14547                                  ;
 14548                                  ; Scan is complete. If we found NOTHING that satisfied us then we bomb
 14549                                  ; out. The conditions here are:
 14550                                  ;
 14551                                  ;  No local-no-shares AND all net/share entries are older than threshold
 14552                                  ;
 14553                                  ;lru10:
 14554                                  ;	cmp	si,-1			; if no one f
 14555                                  ;	jz	short lru65		;     return -1;
 14556                                  ;lru11:
 14557                                  ;	mov	di,si
 14558                                  ;	MOV	[CS:THISSFT],DI		; set thissft
 14559                                  ;	MOV	[CS:THISSFT+2],ES
 14560                                  ;
 14561                                  ; If we have sharing or thisSFT is a net sft, then close it until ref count
 14562                                  ; is 0.
 14563                                  ;
 14564                                  ;	;test	word [es:di+5],8000h
 14565                                  ;	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet
 14566                                  ;	JNZ	short LRUClose
 14567                                  ;IF INSTALLED
 14568                                  ;	call	CheckShare
 14569                                  ;	JZ	short LRUDone
 14570                                  ;ENDIF
 14571                                  ;
 14572                                  ; Repeat close until ref count is 0
 14573                                  ;
 14574                                  ;LRUClose:
 14575                                  ;	push	ss
 14576                                  ;	pop	ds
 14577                                  ;	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 14578                                  ;	cmp     word [es:di],0
 14579                                  ;	;CMP	word [ES:DI+SFT.sf_ref_count],0 ; is ref count still <> 0?
 14580                                  ;	JZ	short LRUDone 		; nope, all done
 14581                                  ;	call	DOS_CLOSE
 14582                                  ;	jnc	short LRUClose		; no error => clean up
 14583                                  ;	;cmp	al,6
 14584                                  ;	cmp	al,error_invalid_handle
 14585                                  ;	jz	short LRUClose
 14586                                  ;	stc
 14587                                  ;	JMP	short LRUDead
 14588                                  ;LRUDone:
 14589                                  ;	XOR	AL,AL
 14590                                  ;	call	BlastSFT		; fill SFT with 0 (AL), 'C' cleared
 14591                                  ;
 14592                                  ;LRUDead:
 14593                                  ;	call	restore_world
 14594                                  ;	LES     DI,[CS:THISSFT]
 14595                                  ;	jnc	short LRUFCB_retn
 14596                                  ;LRUFCB_err:
