 14603                                  
 14604                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14605                                  ; LRUFCB for MSDOS 6.0 !
 14606                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14607                                  ;
 14608                                  ; LruFCB -- allocate the LRU SFT from the SFT Table. The LRU scheme
 14609                                  ; maintains separate counts for net/Share and local SFTs. We allocate a 
 14610                                  ; net/Share SFT only if we do not find a local SFT. This helps keep
 14611                                  ; net/Share SFTs which cannot be regenerated for as long as possible. We
 14612                                  ; optimize regeneration operations by keeping track of the current local
 14613                                  ; SFT. This avoids scanning of the SFTs as long as we have at least one 
 14614                                  ; local SFT in the SFT Block.
 14615                                  ;
 14616                                  ; Inputs: al = 0 => Regenerate SFT operation
 14617                                  ;	    = 1 => Allocate new SFT for Open/Create
 14618                                  ;
 14619                                  ; Outputs: Carry clear
 14620                                  ;	 	es:di = Address of allocated SFT
 14621                                  ;	  	ThisSFT = Address of allocated SFT
 14622                                  ;
 14623                                  ;	  carry set if closes of net/Share files failed 
 14624                                  ;		al = error_FCB_unavailable
 14625                                  ;
 14626                                  ; Registers affected: None
 14627                                  ;
 14628                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14629                                  
 14630                                  ;LruFCB	PROC	NEAR
 14631                                  LRUFCB:
 14632                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14633                                  	; DOSCODE:5805h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 14634                                  
 14635                                  	; 08/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 14636                                  	; DOSCODE:57F1h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 14637                                  
 14638                                  	; 20/01/2024 Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMMDOS.COM)
 14639                                  	; DOSCODE:5E7Ch (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 14640                                  
 14641 00001F38 06                      	push	es	; * (MSDOS 6.21)
 14642                                  	
 14643 00001F39 E81CE5                  	call	save_world
 14644                                  	
 14645                                  	;getdseg <ds>		;ds = DOSDATA
 14646 00001F3C 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 14647                                  
 14648 00001F41 08C0                    	or	al,al		;Check if regenerate allocation
 14649 00001F43 7516                    	jnz	short lru1	;Try to find SFT to use
 14650                                  
 14651                                  	; This is a regen call. If LocalSFT contains the address of a valid 
 14652                                  	; local SFT, just return that SFT to reuse
 14653                                  
 14654                                  	; 20/01/2024
 14655                                  	;mov	di,[LocalSFT]
 14656                                  	;or	di,[LocalSFT+2]	;is address == 0?
 14657                                  	;jz	short lru1	;invalid local SFT, find one
 14658                                  
 14659                                  	; We have found a valid local SFT. Recycle this SFT
 14660                                  
 14661 00001F45 C43E[A710]              	les	di,[LocalSFT]
 14662                                  
 14663                                  	; 20/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 14664 00001F49 8CC1                    	mov	cx,es
 14665 00001F4B 09F9                    	or	cx,di		; is address == 0?
 14666 00001F4D 740C                    	jz	short lru1	; invalid local SFT, find one
 14667                                  
 14668                                  gotlocalSFT:
 14669 00001F4F 893E[9E05]              	mov	[THISSFT],di
 14670 00001F53 8C06[A005]              	mov	[THISSFT+2],es
 14671 00001F57 F8                      	clc
 14672 00001F58 E9A900                  	jmp	LRUDone		;clear up SFT and return
 14673                                  
 14674                                  lru1:
 14675 00001F5B C43E[4000]              	les	di,[SFTFCB]	;es:di = SF Table for FCBs
 14676                                  	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]
 14677 00001F5F 268B4D04                	mov	cx,[es:di+SFT.SFCount]	;cx = number of SFTs
 14678                                  	;lea	di,[di+6]
 14679 00001F63 8D7D06                  	lea	di,[di+SFT.SFTable]	;es:di = first SFT
 14680                                  
 14681                                  	; We scan through all the SFTs scanning for a free one. It also 
 14682                                  	; remembers the LRU SFT for net/Share SFTs and local SFTs separately. 
 14683                                  	; bx = min. LRU for local SFTs
 14684                                  	; si = pos. of local SFT with min. LRU
 14685                                  	; dx = min. LRU for net/Share SFTs
 14686                                  	; bp = pos. of net/Share SFT with min. LRU
 14687                                  
 14688 00001F66 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,-1		; init. to 0xffff ( max. LRU value )
 14689 00001F69 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 14690 00001F6B 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 14691 00001F6D 89DD                    	mov	bp,bx
 14692                                  
 14693                                  findSFT:
 14694                                  	;See if this SFT is a free one. If so, return it
 14695 00001F6F 26830D00                	or	word [es:di],0
 14696                                  	;or	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0 ;reference count = 0 ?
 14697 00001F73 744C                    	jz	short gotSFT	;yes, SFT is free
 14698                                  	;;cmp	word [es:di],-1
 14699                                  	;cmp	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],sf_busy ;Is it busy?
 14700 00001F75 26833DFF                	cmp	word [es:di],sf_busy ; -1 
 14701 00001F79 7446                    	jz	short gotSFT	;no, can use it
 14702                                  
 14703                                  	; Check if this SFT is local and store its address in LocalSFT. Can be 
 14704                                  	; used for a later regen.
 14705                                  
 14706                                  	; 16/12/2022
 14707                                  	; 08/11/2022
 14708                                  	;test	byte [es:di+6],80h
 14709 00001F7B 26F6450680              	test	byte [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags+1],(sf_isnet>>8) ; 80h
 14710                                  	; 08/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 14711                                  	;;test	word [es:di+5],8000h
 14712                                  	;test	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet ; network SFT?
 14713 00001F80 7531                    	jnz	short lru5	;yes, get net/Share LRU
 14714                                  
 14715                                  ;IF installed
 14716 00001F82 E8C05D                  	call	CheckShare	;Share present?
 14717                                  ;ENDIF
 14718 00001F85 752C                    	jnz	short lru5	;yes, get net/Share LRU
 14719                                  
 14720                                  	;Local SFT, register its address
 14721                                  
 14722                                  	; !!HACK!!!
 14723                                  	; There is a slightly dirty hack out here in a desperate bid to save  
 14724                                  	; code space. There is similar code duplicated at label 'gotSFT'. We 
 14725                                  	; enter from there if al = 0, update the LocalSFT variable, and since 
 14726                                  	; al = 0, we jump out of the loop to the exit point. I have commented 
 14727                                  	; out the code that previously existed at label 'gotSFT'
 14728                                  
 14729                                  hackpoint:
 14730 00001F87 893E[A710]              	mov	[LocalSFT],di
 14731 00001F8B 8C06[A910]              	mov	[LocalSFT+2],es	;store local SFT address
 14732                                  
 14733 00001F8F 08C0                    	or	al,al		;Is operation = REGEN?
 14734 00001F91 74BC                    	jz	short gotlocalSFT ;yes, return this SFT for reuse
 14735                                  
 14736                                  	;Get LRU for local files
 14737                                  	
 14738                                  	;cmp	[es:di+15h],bx
 14739 00001F93 26395D15                	cmp	[es:di+sf_LRU],bx ;SFT.LRU < min?
 14740 00001F97 7306                    	jae	short lru4	;no, skip 
 14741                                  
 14742                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+15h]
 14743 00001F99 268B5D15                	mov	bx,[es:di+sf_LRU] ;yes, store new minimum
 14744 00001F9D 89FE                    	mov	si,di		;store SFT position
 14745                                  lru4:
 14746                                  	;add	di,59
 14747 00001F9F 83C73B                  	add	di,SF_ENTRY.size ;go to next SFT
 14748 00001FA2 E2CB                    	loop	findSFT
 14749                                  	
 14750                                  	; 20/01/2024
 14751 00001FA4 49                      	dec	cx ; -1
 14752                                  
 14753                                  	; Check whether we got a net/Share or local SFT. If local SFT
 14754                                  	; available, we will reuse it instead of net/Share LRU
 14755                                  
 14756 00001FA5 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 14757                                  	;cmp	si,-1		;local SFT available?
 14758 00001FA7 39CE                    	cmp	si,cx ; 20/01/2024
 14759 00001FA9 7516                    	jnz	short gotSFT	;yes, return it
 14760                                  
 14761                                  	;No local SFT, see if we got a net/Share SFT
 14762                                  
 14763 00001FAB 89EF                    	mov	di,bp
 14764                                  
 14765 00001FAD 39CD                    	cmp	bp,cx ; -1 ; 20/01/2024
 14766                                  	;cmp	bp,-1		;net/Share SFT available?
 14767 00001FAF 752D                    	jnz	short gotnetSFT	;yes, return it
 14768                                  noSFT:
 14769                                  	; NB: This error should never occur. We always must have an LRU SFT.
 14770                                  	; This error can occur only if the SFT has been corrupted or the LRU
 14771                                  	; count is not maintained properly.
 14772                                  
 14773 00001FB1 EB4E                    	jmp	short errorbadSFT ;error, no FCB available.
 14774                                  
 14775                                  	; Handle the LRU for net/Share SFTs
 14776                                  lru5:
 14777                                  	;cmp	[es:di+15h],dx
 14778 00001FB3 26395515                	cmp	[es:di+sf_LRU],dx ;SFT.LRU < min?
 14779 00001FB7 73E6                    	jae	short lru4	;no, skip
 14780                                  
 14781                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+15h]
 14782 00001FB9 268B5515                	mov	dx,[es:di+sf_LRU] ;yes, store new minimum
 14783                                  
 14784 00001FBD 89FD                    	mov	bp,di		;store SFT position
 14785 00001FBF EBDE                    	jmp	short lru4	;continue with next SFT
 14786                                  
 14787                                  gotSFT:
 14788 00001FC1 08C0                    	or	al,al
 14789 00001FC3 74C2                    	jz	short hackpoint	;save es:di in LocalSFT
 14790                                  
 14791                                  	; HACK!!!
 14792                                  	; The code here differs from the code at 'hackpoint' only in the 
 14793                                  	; order of the check for al. If al = 0, we can jump to 'hackpoint'
 14794                                  	; and then from there jump out to 'gotlocalSFT'. The original code
 14795                                  	; has been commented out below and replaced by the code just above.
 14796                                  
 14797                                  ;If regen, then this SFT can be registered as a local one ( even if free ).
 14798                                  ;
 14799                                  ;	or	al,al		  ;Regen?
 14800                                  ;	jnz	short notlocaluse ;yes, register it and return
 14801                                  ;
 14802                                  ;Register this SFT as a local one
 14803                                  ;
 14804                                  ;	mov	[LocalSFT],di
 14805                                  ;	mov	[LocalSFT+2],es
 14806                                  ;	jmp	gotlocalSFT	;return to caller
 14807                                  ;
 14808                                  ;notlocaluse:
 14809                                  
 14810                                  	; The caller is probably going to use this SFT for a net/Share file.
 14811                                  	; We will come here only on a Open/Create when the caller($FCB_OPEN)
 14812                                  	; does not really know whether it is a local file or not. We
 14813                                  	; invalidate LocalSFT if the SFT we are going to use was previously
 14814                                  	; registered as a local SFT that can be recycled.
 14815                                  
 14816 00001FC5 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 14817 00001FC7 393E[A710]              	cmp	[LocalSFT],di		;Offset same?
 14818 00001FCB 750E                    	jne	short notinvalid
 14819 00001FCD 3906[A910]              	cmp	[LocalSFT+2],ax		;Segments same?
 14820                                  	;je	short zerolocalSFT	;no, no need to invalidate
 14821                                  	; 20/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 14822 00001FD1 7508                    	jne	short notinvalid
 14823                                  zerolocalSFT:	
 14824 00001FD3 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 14825 00001FD5 A3[A710]                	mov	[LocalSFT],ax
 14826 00001FD8 A3[A910]                	mov	[LocalSFT+2],ax
 14827                                  	
 14828                                  notinvalid:
 14829 00001FDB E971FF                  	jmp	gotlocalSFT
 14830                                  
 14831                                  	; The SFT we are going to use was registered in the LocalSFT variable.
 14832                                  	; Invalidate this variable i.e LocalSFT = NULL
 14833                                  
 14834                                  ;zerolocalSFT:
 14835                                  	;xor	ax,ax ; 0
 14836                                  	;mov	[LocalSFT],ax
 14837                                  	;mov	[LocalSFT+2],ax
 14838                                  	;
 14839                                  	;jmp	gotlocalSFT
 14840                                  
 14841                                  gotnetSFT:
 14842                                  	; We have an SFT that is currently net/Share. If it is going to be
 14843                                  	; used for a regen, we know it has to be a local SFT. Update the
 14844                                  	; LocalSFT variable
 14845                                  
 14846 00001FDE 08C0                    	or	al,al
 14847 00001FE0 7508                    	jnz	short closenet
 14848                                  
 14849 00001FE2 893E[A710]              	mov	[LocalSFT],di
 14850 00001FE6 8C06[A910]              	mov	[LocalSFT+2],es	;store local SFT address
 14851                                  closenet:
 14852 00001FEA 893E[9E05]              	mov	[THISSFT],di	; set thissft
 14853 00001FEE 8C06[A005]              	mov	[THISSFT+2],es	
 14854                                  
 14855                                  	; If we have sharing or thisSFT is a net sft, then close it until ref
 14856                                  	; count is 0.
 14857                                  	; NB: We come here only if it is a net/Share SFT that is going to be
 14858                                  	; recycled -- no need to check for this.
 14859                                  
 14860                                  LRUClose:
 14861 00001FF2 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0
 14862                                  	;cmp	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0 ; is ref count still <> 0?
 14863 00001FF6 740C                    	jz	short LRUDone	; nope, all done
 14864                                  
 14865 00001FF8 E83017                  	call	DOS_CLOSE
 14866 00001FFB 73F5                    	jnc	short LRUClose	; no error => clean up
 14867                                  
 14868                                  	; Bugbug: I dont know why we are trying to close after we get an
 14869                                  	; error closing. Seems like we could have a potential infinite loop
 14870                                  	; here. This has to be verified.
 14871                                  
 14872 00001FFD 3C06                    	cmp	al,error_invalid_handle ; 6
 14873 00001FFF 74F1                    	je	short LRUClose
 14874                                  errorbadSFT:
 14875 00002001 F9                      	stc
 14876 00002002 EB05                    	JMP	short LRUDead
 14877                                  LRUDone:
 14878 00002004 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL
 14879 00002006 E81F01                  	call	BlastSFT		; fill SFT with 0 (AL), 'C' cleared
 14880                                  
 14881                                  LRUDead:
 14882 00002009 E835E4                  	call	restore_world		; use macro
 14883                                  	
 14884 0000200C 07                      	pop	es ; * (MSDOS 6.21)
 14885                                  
 14886                                  	;getdseg <es>
 14887 0000200D 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 14888 00002012 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]		;es:di points at allocated SFT
 14889                                  
 14890                                  	;;retnc
 14891                                  	;jc	short LruFCB_err
 14892                                  	;retn

 14911                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14912                                  ;**** RegenCopyName -- This function copies the filename from the FCB to
 14913                                  ; SFT and also to DOS local buffers. There was duplicate code in FCBRegen
 14914                                  ; to copy the name to different destinations
 14915                                  ;
 14916                                  ; Inputs: ds:si = source string
 14917                                  ;	 es:di = destination string
 14918                                  ;	 cx = length of string
 14919                                  ;
 14920                                  ; Outputs: String copied to destination
 14921                                  ;
 14922                                  ; Registers affected: cx,di,si
 14923                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14924                                  
 14925                                  RegenCopyName:
 14926                                  CopyName:
 14927 0000201C AC                      	lodsb			;load character
 14928 0000201D E8F939                  	call	UCase		; convert char to upper case
 14929                                  StuffChar2:
 14930 00002020 AA                      	STOSB			;store converted character
 14931 00002021 E2F9                    	LOOP	CopyName	;
 14932                                  DoneName:
 14933 00002023 C3                      	retn
 14934                                  
 14935                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14936                                  
 14937                                  	; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 14938                                  	; 21/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 14939                                  
 14940                                  FCBRegen:
 14941                                  	; called from SFTFromFCB. SS already DOSDATA
 14942                                  
 14943                                  	; General data filling. Mode is sf_isFCB + open_for_both, date/time 
 14944                                  	; we do not fill, size we do no fill, position we do not fill,
 14945                                  	; bit 14 of flags = TRUE, other bits = FALSE
 14946                                  
 14947                                  	;mov	al,[si+19h]
 14948 00002024 8A4419                  	MOV	AL,[SI+fcb_l_drive]
 14949                                  
 14950                                  	; We discriminate based on the first two bits in the reserved field.
 14951                                  	
 14952                                  	;test	al,80h
 14953 00002027 A880                    	test	AL,FCBSPECIAL		; check for no sharing test
 14954 00002029 741C                    	JZ	short RegenNoSharing	; yes, go regen from no sharing
 14955                                  
 14956                                  	; The FCB is for a network or a sharing based system. At this point 
 14957                                  	; we have already closed the SFT for this guy and reconnection is 
 14958                                  	; impossible.
 14959                                  	;
 14960                                  	; Remember that he may have given us a FCB with bogus information in
 14961                                  	; it. Check to see if sharing is present or if the redir is present.
 14962                                  	; If either is around, presume that we have cycled out the FCB and 
 14963                                  	; give the hard error. Otherwise, just return with carry set.
 14964                                  
 14965 0000202B E8175D                  	call	CheckShare		; test for sharer
 14966 0000202E 7509                    	JNZ	short RegenFail		; yep, fail this.
 14967                                  	
 14968                                  	;mov	ax,1100h
 14969 00002030 B80011                  	MOV	AX,MultNET<<8		; install check on multnet
 14970 00002033 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - INSTALLATION CHECK
 14971                                  			; Return: AL = 00h  not installed, OK to install
 14972                                  			; 01h  not installed, not OK to install
 14973                                  			; FFh  installed
 14974 00002035 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL			; is it there?
 14975 00002037 740C                    	JZ	short RegenDead		; no, just fail the operation
 14976                                  RegenFail:
 14977                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14978                                  	;MOV	AX,[CS:USER_IN_AX]	; SS override
 14979 00002039 36A1[3A03]              	mov	ax,[SS:USER_IN_AX] ; MSDOS 6.0

 15206                                  ;**	BlastSFT - FIll SFT with Garbage
 15207                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15208                                  ;	BlastSFT is used when an SFT is no longer needed; it's called with
 15209                                  ;	various garbage values to put into the SFT.  I don't know why,
 15210                                  ;	presumably to help with debugging (jgl).  We clear the few fields
 15211                                  ;	necessary to show that the SFT is free after filling it.
 15212                                  ;
 15213                                  ;	ENTRY	(es:di) = address of SFT
 15214                                  ;		(al) = fill character
 15215                                  ;	EXIT	(ax) = -1
 15216                                  ;		'C' clear
 15217                                  ;	USES	AX, CX, Flags
 15218                                  
 15219                                  BlastSFT:
 15220                                  	; 21/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 15221                                  	;;;
 15222 00002128 E8B927                  	call	SFT_FREE
 15223                                  	;;;
 15224 0000212B 57                      	push	di
 15225                                  	;mov	cx,53 ; MSDOS 3.3
 15226                                  	;mov	cx,59 ; MSDOS 6.0
 15227 0000212C B93B00                  	mov	cx,SF_ENTRY.size
 15228 0000212F F3AA                    	rep	stosb
 15229 00002131 5F                      	pop	di
 15230 00002132 29C0                    	sub	ax,ax	; 0		; clear 'C'-----------------;
 15231 00002134 268905                  	mov	[es:di],ax
 15232                                  	;mov	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],ax ; set ref count    ;
 15233                                  	;mov	[es:di+15h],ax
 15234 00002137 26894515                	mov	[es:di+sf_LRU],ax	; set lru		    ;
 15235 0000213B 48                      	dec	ax	; -1					    ;
 15236                                  	;mov	[es:di+17h],ax ; 0FFFFh ; -1
 15237 0000213C 26894517                	mov	[es:di+sf_OpenAge],ax	; set open age to -1	    ;
 15238                                  BlastSFT_retn:
 15239 00002140 C3                      	retn				; return with 'C' clear     ;

 15241                                  ;Break	<CheckFCB - see if the SFT pointed to by the FCB is still OK>
 15242                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15243                                  ;
 15244                                  ;   CheckFCB - examine an FCB and its contents to see if it needs to be
 15245                                  ;   regenerated.
 15246                                  ;
 15247                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to FCB (not extended)
 15248                                  ;		AL is SFT index
 15249                                  ;   Outputs:	Carry Set - FCB needs to be regened
 15250                                  ;		Carry clear - FCB is OK. ES:DI point to SFT
 15251                                  ;   Registers modified: AX and BX
 15252                                  ;
 15253                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15254                                  
 15255                                  	; 09/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 15256                                  	; DOSCODE:59F0h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 15257                                  
 15258                                  	; 21/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 15259                                  	; DOSCODE:607Eh (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 15260                                  CheckFCB:
 15261                                  		
 15262                                  	; called from $fcb_open and sftfromfcb. SS already set up to DOSDATA
 15263                                  
 15264                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 15265                                  
 15266                                  	; LES	DI,[CS:SFTFCB]
 15267                                  
 15268                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 15269                                  	
 15270                                  	; SR;
 15271                                  	; We check if the given FCB is for a local file. If so, we return a 
 15272                                  	; bad SFT status forcing the caller to regenerate the SFT.
 15273                                  
 15274                                  	;test	byte [si+19h],0C0h
 15275 00002141 F64419C0                	test	byte [si+fcb_l_drive],FCBNETWORK|FCBSHARE|FCBDEVICE
 15276 00002145 7447                    	jz	short BadSFT		;Local file, return bad SFT
 15277 00002147 36C43E[4000]            	LES     DI,[SS:SFTFCB]		; SS override
 15278                                  
 15279                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 15280                                  	;cmp	[es:di+4],al
 15281 0000214C 26384504                	CMP	[ES:DI+SFT.SFCount],AL
 15282 00002150 723C                    	JC	short BadSFT
 15283                                  	;;mov	bl,53 ; MSDOS 3.3
 15284                                  	;mov	bl,59 ; MSDOS 6.0
 15285 00002152 B33B                    	MOV	BL,SF_ENTRY.size
 15286 00002154 F6E3                    	MUL	BL
 15287                                  	;lea	di,[di+6]
 15288 00002156 8D7D06                  	LEA	DI,[DI+SFT.SFTable]
 15289 00002159 01C7                    	ADD	DI,AX
 15290                                  	;MOV	AX,[CS:PROC_ID]	; MSDOS 3.3
 15291 0000215B 36A1[3C03]              	mov	ax,[SS:PROC_ID] ; MSDOS 6.0  ; SS override
 15292                                  	;cmp	[es:di+31h],ax
 15293 0000215F 26394531                	CMP	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_PID],AX
 15294 00002163 7529                    	JNZ	short BadSFT		; must match process
 15295 00002165 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0
 15296                                  	;CMP	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0
 15297 00002169 7423                    	JZ	short BadSFT		; must also be in use
 15298                                  	;mov	al,[si+19h]
 15299 0000216B 8A4419                  	MOV	AL,[SI+fcb_l_drive]
 15300                                  	;test	al,80h
 15301 0000216E A880                    	test	AL,FCBSPECIAL		; a special FCB?
 15302 00002170 7428                    	JZ	short CheckNoShare	; No. try local or device
 15303                                  
 15304                                  	; Since we are a special FCB, try NOT to use a bogus test instruction.
 15305                                  	; FCBSHARE is a superset of FCBNETWORK.
 15306                                  
 15307 00002172 50                      	PUSH	AX
 15308                                  	;and	al,0C0h
 15309 00002173 24C0                    	AND	AL,FCBMASK
 15310                                  	;cmp	al,0C0h
 15311 00002175 3CC0                    	CMP	AL,FCBSHARE		; net FCB?
 15312 00002177 58                      	POP	AX
 15313 00002178 7516                    	JNZ	short CheckNet		; no
 15314                                  					; yes
 15315                                  ;
 15316                                  ;----- In share support -----
 15317                                  ;

 15320 0000217F 720D                    	JC	short BadSFT
 15321

 15323                                  %if 0

 15326                                  ;----- End in share support -----
 15327                                  ;
 15328                                  	; 09/11/2022

 15330                                  	;  which calls or jumps to CheckFirClus here)
 15331                                  	;;;
 15332                                  CheckFirClus:

 15457                                  ;Break	<SFTFromFCB - take a FCB and obtain a SFT from it>
 15458                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15459                                  ;
 15460                                  ;   SFTFromFCB - the workhorse of this compatability crap. Check to see if
 15461                                  ;	the SFT for the FCB is Good. If so, make ThisSFT point to it. If not
 15462                                  ;	good, get one from the cache and regenerate it. Overlay the LRU field
 15463                                  ;	with PID
 15464                                  ;
 15465                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to FCB
 15466                                  ;   Outputs:	ThisSFT point to appropriate SFT
 15467                                  ;		Carry clear -> OK ES:DI -> SFT
 15468                                  ;		Carry set -> error in ax
 15469                                  ;   Registers modified: ES,DI, AX
 15470                                  ;
 15471                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15472                                  
 15473                                  SFTFromFCB:
 15474                                  	; called from fcbio and $fcb_close. SS already set up to DOSDATA
 15475                                  
 15476                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15477                                  
 15478 000021AE 50                      	push	ax
 15479 000021AF 53                      	push	bx
 15480                                  	;mov	al,[si+18h]

 15483 000021B6 5B                      	pop	bx
 15484 000021B7 58                      	pop	ax

 15486                                  	;MOV	[CS:THISSFT+2],ES
 15487 000021B8 36893E[9E05]            	MOV	[SS:THISSFT],DI		; SS override
 15488 000021BD 368C06[A005]            	MOV	[SS:THISSFT+2],ES
 15489 000021C2 7311                    	JNC	short Set_SFT		; no problems, just set thissft
 15490

 15501 000021D3 72C4                    	jc	short CheckNet_retn

 15589                                  ;	Revision history:
 15590                                  ;
 15591                                  ;		Created: ARR 4 April 1983
 15592                                  ;			 MZ  6 June  1983 completion of functions
 15593                                  ;			 MZ 15 Dec   1983 Brain damaged programs close FCBs multiple
 15594                                  ;				  times.  Change so successive closes work by
 15595                                  ;				  always returning OK.	Also, detect I/O to
 15596                                  ;				  already closed FCB and return EOF.
 15597                                  ;		 MZ 16 Jan   1984 More braindamage.  Need to separate info
 15598                                  ;				  out of sft into FCB for reconnection

 15602                                  ; Defintions for FCBOp flags
 15603                                  
 15604                                  RANDOM	equ 2				; random operation
 15605                                  FCBREAD equ 4				; doing a read
 15606                                  BLOCK	equ 8				; doing a block I/O
 15607                                  
 15608                                  ;Break <GetRR - return the random record field in DX:AX>
 15609                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15610                                  ;
 15611                                  ;   GetRR - correctly load DX:AX with the random record field (3 or 4 bytes)
 15612                                  ;	from the FCB pointed to by DS:SI
 15613                                  ;
 15614                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to an FCB
 15615                                  ;		BX has record size
 15616                                  ;   Outputs:	DX:AX contain the contents of the random record field
 15617                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 15618                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15619                                  
 15620                                  GetRR:
 15621                                  	;mov	ax,[si+21h]
 15622 00002221 8B4421                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RR]	; get low order part
 15623                                  	;mov	dx,[si+23h]
 15624 00002224 8B5423                  	MOV	DX,[SI+SYS_FCB.RR+2]	; get high order part
 15625 00002227 83FB40                  	CMP	BX,64			; ignore MSB of RR if recsiz > 64
 15626 0000222A 7202                    	JB	short GetRRBye
 15627                                  GetExtent_bye:	; 21/01/2024
 15628 0000222C 30F6                    	XOR	DH,DH
 15629                                  GetRRBye:
 15630 0000222E C3                      	retn
 15631                                  
 15632                                  ;Break <GetExtent - retrieve next location for sequential IO>
 15633                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15634                                  ;
 15635                                  ;   GetExtent - Construct the next record to perform I/O from the EXTENT and
 15636                                  ;	NR fields in the FCB.
 15637                                  ;
 15638                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI - point to FCB
 15639                                  ;   Outputs:	DX:AX contain the contents of the random record field
 15640                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 15641                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15642                                  
 15643                                  GetExtent:
 15644                                  	;mov	al,[si+20h]
 15645 0000222F 8A4420                  	MOV	AL,[SI+SYS_FCB.NR]	; get low order piece
 15646                                  	;mov	dx,[si+0Ch]
 15647 00002232 8B540C                  	MOV	DX,[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT]	; get high order piece
 15648 00002235 D0E0                    	SHL	AL,1
 15649 00002237 D1EA                    	SHR	DX,1
 15650 00002239 D0D8                    	RCR	AL,1	; move low order bit of DL to high order of AH
 15651 0000223B 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 15652 0000223D 88F2                    	MOV	DL,DH
 15653                                  	; 21/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 15654                                  	;XOR	DH,DH
 15655                                  	;retn
 15656 0000223F EBEB                    	jmp	short GetExtent_bye
 15657                                  
 15658                                  ;Break <SetExtent - update the extent/NR field>
 15659                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15660                                  ;
 15661                                  ;   SetExtent - change the position of an FCB by filling in the extent/NR
 15662                                  ;	fields
 15663                                  ;
 15664                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to FCB
 15665                                  ;		DX:AX is a record location in file
 15666                                  ;   Outputs:	Extent/NR fields are filled in
 15667                                  ;   Registers modified: CX
 15668                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15669                                  
 15670                                  SetExtent:
 15671 00002241 50                      	push	ax
 15672 00002242 52                      	push	dx
 15673 00002243 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX
 15674 00002245 247F                    	AND	AL,7FH			; next rec field
 15675                                  	;mov	[si+20h],al
 15676 00002247 884420                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.NR],AL
 15677 0000224A 80E180                  	AND	CL,80H			; save upper bit
 15678 0000224D D1E1                    	SHL	CX,1
 15679 0000224F D1D2                    	RCL	DX,1			; move high bit of CX to low bit of DX
 15680 00002251 88E8                    	MOV	AL,CH
 15681 00002253 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 15682                                  	;mov	[si+0Ch], ax
 15683 00002255 89440C                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.EXTENT],AX	; all done
 15684 00002258 5A                      	pop	dx
 15685 00002259 58                      	pop	ax
 15686 0000225A C3                      	retn
 15687                                  
 15688                                  ;Break <GetExtended - find FCB in potential extended fcb>
 15689                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15690                                  ;
 15691                                  ;   GetExtended - Make DS:SI point to FCB from DS:DX
 15692                                  ;
 15693                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a possible extended FCB
 15694                                  ;   Outputs:	DS:SI point to the FCB part
 15695                                  ;		zeroflag set if not extended fcb
 15696                                  ;   Registers modified: SI
 15697                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15698                                  
 15699                                  GetExtended:
 15700 0000225B 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; point to Something
 15701 0000225D 803CFF                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],-1		; look for extention
 15702 00002260 7503                    	JNZ	short GetBye		; not there
 15703 00002262 83C607                  	ADD	SI,7			; point to FCB
 15704                                  GetBye:
 15705 00002265 39D6                    	CMP	SI,DX			; set condition codes
 15706                                  getextd_retn:
 15707 00002267 C3                      	retn
 15708                                  
 15709                                  ;Break <GetRecSize - return in BX the FCB record size>
 15710                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15711                                  ;
 15712                                  ;   GetRecSize - return in BX the record size from the FCB at DS:SI
 15713                                  ;
 15714                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI point to a non-extended FCB
 15715                                  ;   Outputs:	BX contains the record size
 15716                                  ;   Registers modified: None
 15717                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15718                                  
 15719                                  	; 22/01/2024

 15729 0000226F B380                    	mov	bl,128	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 15730                                  	;mov	[si+0Eh],bx
 15731 00002271 895C0E                  	MOV	[SI+SYS_FCB.RECSIZ],BX	; stuff it back
 15732 00002274 C3                      	retn

 15742                                  ;   $FCB_Random_Write_Block - retrieve a location from the FCB, seek to it

 15839                                  ;BREAK <FCBIO - do internal FCB I/O>
 15840                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15841                                  ;
 15842                                  ;   FCBIO - look at FCBOP and merge all FCB operations into a single routine.
 15843                                  ;
 15844                                  ;   Inputs:	FCBOP flags which operations need to be performed

 16188                                  ;Break <$FCB_Open - open an old-style FCB>
 16189                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16190                                  ;
 16191                                  ;   $FCB_Open - CPM compatability file open. The user has formatted an FCB
 16192                                  ;	for us and asked to have the rest filled in.
 16193                                  ;
 16194                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an unopenned FCB
 16195                                  ;   Outputs:	AL indicates status 0 is ok FF is error
 16196                                  ;		FCB has the following fields filled in:
 16197                                  ;		    Time/Date Extent/NR Size
 16198                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16199                                  
 16200                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 16201                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:6362h
 16202                                  
 16203                                  _$FCB_OPEN:			; System call 15
 16204                                  	
 16205                                  	;mov	ax,2 
 16206 00002422 B80200                  	MOV	AX,SHARING_COMPAT+open_for_both
 16207                                  
 16208                                  ;hkn; DOS_Open is in DOSCODE
 16209 00002425 B9[0632]                	MOV	CX,DOS_OPEN
 16210                                  
 16211                                  ; The following is common code for Creation and openning of FCBs. AX is
 16212                                  ; either attributes (for create) or open mode (for open)... DS:DX points to
 16213                                  ; the FCB
 16214                                  
 16215                                  DoAccess:
 16216 00002428 1E                      	push	ds
 16217 00002429 52                      	push	dx
 16218 0000242A 51                      	push	cx
 16219 0000242B 50                      	push	ax			; save FCB pointer away
 16220                                  
 16221                                  ;hkn; 	OpenBuf is in DOSDATA
 16222 0000242C BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF
 16223 0000242F E8E750                  	call	TransFCB		; crunch the fcb
 16224 00002432 58                      	pop	ax
 16225 00002433 59                      	pop	cx
 16226 00002434 5A                      	pop	dx
 16227 00002435 1F                      	pop	ds			; get fcb
 16228 00002436 7303                    	JNC	short FindFCB		; everything seems ok
 16229                                  FCBOpenErr:
 16230                                  	; AL has error code
 16231 00002438 E954E2                  	jmp	FCB_RET_ERR
 16232                                  FindFCB:
 16233 0000243B E81DFE                  	call	GetExtended		; DS:SI will point to FCB
 16234                                  
 16235                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 16236                                  
 16237                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 16238                                  	;call	LRUFCB
 16239                                  	;jc	short HardMessage
 16240                                  
 16241                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 16242 0000243E 50                      	push	ax
 16243 0000243F B001                    	mov	al,1			;indicate Open/Create operation
 16244 00002441 E8F4FA                  	call	LRUFCB			; get a sft entry (no error)
 16245 00002444 58                      	pop	ax
 16246 00002445 722A                    	jc	short HardMessage
 16247                                  	
 16248                                  	;mov	word [es:di+2],8000h
 16249 00002447 26C745020080            	mov	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB
 16250 0000244D 1E                      	push	ds
 16251 0000244E 56                      	push	si	
 16252 0000244F 53                      	push	bx			; save fcb pointer
 16253 00002450 89CE                    	MOV	SI,CX
 16254                                  
 16255                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 16256 00002452 16                      	push	ss
 16257 00002453 1F                      	pop	ds			    ; let DOS_Open see variables
 16258 00002454 FFD6                    	CALL	SI ; DOS_OPEN or DOS_CREATE ; go open the file
 16259 00002456 5B                      	pop	bx
 16260 00002457 5E                      	pop	si
 16261 00002458 1F                      	pop	ds			; get fcb
 16262                                  
 16263                                  ;hkn; SS override
 16264 00002459 36C43E[9E05]            	LES	DI,[SS:THISSFT]		; get sf pointer
 16265 0000245E 7318                    	JNC	short FCBOK		; operation succeeded
 16266                                  failopen:
 16267 00002460 50                      	PUSH	AX
 16268 00002461 B052                    	MOV	AL,"R"	; 52h		; clear out field (free sft)
 16269 00002463 E8C2FC                  	call	BlastSFT
 16270 00002466 58                      	POP	AX
 16271                                  	;cmp	ax,4
 16272 00002467 83F804                  	CMP	AX,error_too_many_open_files
 16273 0000246A 7405                    	JZ	short HardMessage
 16274                                  	;cmp	ax,24h
 16275 0000246C 83F824                  	CMP	AX,error_sharing_buffer_exceeded
 16276 0000246F 7505                    	jnz	short DeadFCB

 16408                                  
 16409                                  ; We must scan the set of FCB SFTs for one that appears to match the current
 16410                                  ; one.	We cheat and use CheckFCB to match the FCBs.
 16411                                  
 16412                                  ;hkn; 	SS override
 16413 000024E8 36C43E[4000]            	LES	DI,[SS:SFTFCB]		; get the pointer to head of the list
 16414                                  	;mov	ah,[es:di+4]
 16415 000024ED 268A6504                	MOV	AH,[ES:DI+SFT.SFCount]	; get number of SFTs to scan
 16416                                  OpenScan:
 16417                                  	;cmp	al,[si+18h]
 16418 000024F1 3A4418                  	CMP	AL,[SI+fcb_sfn]		; don't compare ourselves
 16419 000024F4 7407                    	JZ	short SkipCheck
 16420 000024F6 50                      	push	ax			; preserve count
 16421 000024F7 E847FC                  	call	CheckFCB		; do they match
 16422 000024FA 58                      	pop	ax			; get count back
 16423 000024FB 7309                    	JNC	short OpenFound		; found a match!
 16424                                  SkipCheck:
 16425 000024FD FEC0                    	INC	AL			; advance to next FCB
 16426 000024FF 38E0                    	CMP	AL,AH			; table full?
 16427 00002501 75EE                    	JNZ	short OpenScan		; no, go for more
 16428                                  OpenDone:
 16429 00002503 30C0                    	xor	al,al			; return success
 16430 00002505 C3                      	retn
 16431                                  
 16432                                  ; The SFT at ES:DI is the one that is already in use for this FCB. We set the
 16433                                  ; FCB to use this one. We increment its ref count. We do NOT close it at all.
 16434                                  ; Consider:
 16435                                  ;
 16436                                  ;   open (foo)	delete (foo) open (bar)
 16437                                  ;
 16438                                  ; This causes us to recycle (potentially) bar through the same local SFT as
 16439                                  ; foo even though foo is no longer needed; this is due to the server closing
 16440                                  ; foo for us when we delete it. Unfortunately, we cannot see this closure.
 16441                                  ; If we were to CLOSE bar, the server would then close the only reference to
 16442                                  ; bar and subsequent I/O would be lost to the redirector.
 16443                                  ;
 16444                                  ; This gets solved by NOT closing the sft, but zeroing the ref count
 16445                                  ; (effectively freeing the SFT) and informing the sharer (if relevant) that
 16446                                  ; the SFT is no longer in use. Note that the SHARER MUST keep its ref counts
 16447                                  ; around. This will allow us to access the same file through multiple network
 16448                                  ; connections and NOT prematurely terminate when the ref count on one
 16449                                  ; connection goes to zero.
 16450                                  
 16451                                  OpenFound:
 16452                                  	;mov	[si+18h],al
 16453 00002506 884418                  	MOV	[SI+fcb_sfn],AL 	; assign with this
 16454 00002509 26FF05                  	inc	word [es:di]
 16455                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 16456                                  					; remember this new invocation
 16457                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 16458                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 16459                                  	;;;
 16460 0000250C E88123                  	call	set_sftfcb_entry
 16461                                  	;;;
 16462                                  
 16463                                  	; 24/01/2024
 16464 0000250F 16                      	push	ss
 16465 00002510 1F                      	pop	ds
 16466                                  	
 16467                                  	;MOV	AX,[SS:FCBLRU]		; update LRU counts
 16468 00002511 A1[1000]                	mov	ax,[FCBLRU] ; 24/01/2024
 16469                                  	;mov	[es:di+15h],ax
 16470 00002514 26894515                	MOV	[ES:DI+sf_LRU],AX
 16471                                  ;
 16472                                  ; We have an FCB sft that is now of no use. We release sharing info and then
 16473                                  ; blast it to prevent other reuse.
 16474                                  ;
 16475                                  	;push	ss
 16476                                  	;pop	ds
 16477                                  	
 16478 00002518 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 16479 0000251C 26FF0D                  	dec	word [es:di]
 16480                                  	;DEC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 16481                                  					; free the newly allocated SFT
 16482 0000251F E85B58                  	call	ShareEnd
 16483 00002522 B043                    	MOV	AL,'C'	 ; 43h
 16484 00002524 E801FC                  	call	BlastSFT
 16485 00002527 EBDA                    	JMP	short OpenDone

 16491                                  ;	FCB for us and asked to have the rest filled in.

 16507                                  DoAccessJ:

 16511                                  ; SEARCH.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 16512                                  ;============================================================================

 16517

 16520                                  
 16521                                  ;**	Search.asm
 16522                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16523                                  ;	Directory search system calls.
 16524                                  ;	These will be passed direct text of the pathname from the user. 
 16525                                  ;	They will need to be passed through the macro expander prior to
 16526                                  ;	being sent through the low-level stuff. 
 16527                                  ;	I/O specs are defined in DISPATCH. The system calls are:
 16528                                  ;
 16529                                  ;	$Dir_Search_First	  written
 16530                                  ;	$Dir_Search_Next	  written
 16531                                  ;	$Find_First	  written
 16532                                  ;	$Find_Next		  written
 16533                                  ;	PackName		  written
 16534                                  ;
 16535                                  ;	Modification history:
 16536                                  ;
 16537                                  ;	  Created: ARR 4 April 1983
 16538                                  
 16539                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16540                                  ; Procedure Name : $DIR_SEARCH_FIRST
 16541                                  ;
 16542                                  ; Inputs:
 16543                                  ;	DS:DX Points to unopenned FCB
 16544                                  ; Function:
 16545                                  ;	Directory is searched for first matching entry and the directory
 16546                                  ;	entry is loaded at the disk transfer address
 16547                                  ; Returns:
 16548                                  ;	AL = -1 if no entries matched, otherwise 0
 16549                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16550                                  
 16551                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 2B88h
 16552                                  	
 16553                                  	; 24/01/2024
 16554                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:5DCBh
 16555                                  	; MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:5DDFh
 16556                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:647Bh
 16557                                  	; Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:61E5h
 16558                                  
 16559                                  _$DIR_SEARCH_FIRST:
 16560 00002539 368916[A605]            	MOV	[SS:THISFCB],DX
 16561 0000253E 368C1E[A805]            	MOV	[SS:THISFCB+2],DS
 16562 00002543 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX
 16563 00002545 803CFF                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0FFH
 16564 00002548 7503                    	JNZ	short NORMFCB4
 16565 0000254A 83C607                  	ADD	SI,7			; Point to drive select byte
 16566                                  NORMFCB4:
 16567 0000254D FF34                    	push	word [SI]		; Save original drive byte for later
 16568                                  
 16569 0000254F 16                      	push	ss
 16570 00002550 07                      	pop	es			; get es to address DOSGroup
 16571                                  
 16572 00002551 BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; appropriate buffer
 16573 00002554 E8C24F                  	call	TransFCB		; convert the FCB, set SATTRIB EXTFCB
 16574 00002557 7304                    	JNC	short SearchIt		; no error, go and look
 16575 00002559 5B                      	pop	bx			; Clean stack
 16576                                  
 16577                                  ; Error code is in AX
 16578                                  
 16579                                  	; 09/11/2022
 16580                                  dcf_errj:
 16581 0000255A E932E1                  	jmp	FCB_RET_ERR		; error
 16582                                  
 16583                                  SearchIt:
 16584 0000255D 16                      	push	ss
 16585 0000255E 1F                      	pop	ds			; get ready for search
 16586                                  	;push	word [DMAADD]
 16587                                  	;push	word [DMAADD+2]
 16588                                  	; 24/01/2024
 16589 0000255F C43E[2C03]              	les	di,[DMAADD]
 16590 00002563 57                      	push	di
 16591 00002564 06                      	push	es
 16592 00002565 C706[2C03][BE04]        	MOV	WORD [DMAADD],SEARCHBUF
 16593 0000256B 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	WORD [DMAADD+2],DS
 16594                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 16595                                  	;call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 16596                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 16597 0000256F E8B70F                  	call	GET_FAST_SEARCH		; search
 16598 00002572 8F06[2E03]              	pop	word [DMAADD+2]
 16599 00002576 8F06[2C03]              	pop	word [DMAADD]
 16600 0000257A 735A                    	JNC	short SearchSet		; no error, transfer info
 16601 0000257C 5B                      	pop	bx			; Clean stack
 16602                                  
 16603                                  ; Error code is in AX
 16604                                  
 16605                                  	; 09/11/2022
 16606                                  	;jmp	FCB_RET_ERR
 16607 0000257D EBDB                    	jmp	short dcf_errj
 16608                                  
 16609                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16610                                  ;
 16611                                  ; Procedure Name : $DIR_SEARCH_NEXT
 16612                                  ;
 16613                                  ; Inputs:
 16614                                  ;	DS:DX points to unopenned FCB returned by $DIR_SEARCH_FIRST
 16615                                  ; Function:
 16616                                  ;	Directory is searched for the next matching entry and the directory
 16617                                  ;	entry is loaded at the disk transfer address
 16618                                  ; Returns:
 16619                                  ;	AL = -1 if no entries matched, otherwise 0
 16620                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16621                                  
 16622                                  	; 24/01/2024
 16623                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:5E5Fh
 16624                                  	; MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:5E73h
 16625                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:6517h
 16626                                  	; Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:6273h
 16627                                  
 16628                                  _$DIR_SEARCH_NEXT:
 16629 0000257F 368916[A605]            	MOV	[SS:THISFCB],DX
 16630 00002584 368C1E[A805]            	MOV	[SS:THISFCB+2],DS
 16631                                  	; 24/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16632                                  	;MOV	byte [SS:SATTRIB],0
 16633                                  	;MOV	byte [SS:EXTFCB],0
 16634 00002589 B000                    	mov	al,0
 16635 0000258B 36A2[6D05]              	mov	[SS:SATTRIB],al ; 0
 16636 0000258F 36A2[6D05]              	mov	[SS:SATTRIB],al ; 0
 16637                                  
 16638 00002593 16                      	push	ss
 16639 00002594 07                      	pop	es
 16640                                  
 16641 00002595 BF[BE04]                	MOV	DI,SEARCHBUF
 16642                                  
 16643 00002598 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX
 16644 0000259A 803CFF                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0FFh
 16645 0000259D 750D                    	JNZ	short NORMFCB6
 16646 0000259F 83C606                  	ADD	SI,6
 16647 000025A2 AC                      	LODSB
 16648                                  
 16649 000025A3 36A2[6D05]              	MOV	[SS:SATTRIB],AL
 16650 000025A7 36FE0E[6C05]            	DEC	byte [SS:EXTFCB]
 16651                                  NORMFCB6:
 16652 000025AC AC                      	LODSB				; Get original user drive byte
 16653 000025AD 50                      	push	ax			; Put it on stack
 16654 000025AE 8A4414                  	MOV	AL,[SI+20]		; Get correct search contin drive byte
 16655 000025B1 AA                      	STOSB				; Put in correct place
 16656 000025B2 B90A00                  	MOV	CX,20/2
 16657 000025B5 F3A5                    	REP	MOVSW			; Transfer in rest of search contin info
 16658                                  
 16659 000025B7 16                      	push	ss
 16660 000025B8 1F                      	pop	ds
 16661                                  
 16662                                  	;push	word [DMAADD]
 16663                                  	;push	word [DMAADD+2]
 16664                                  	; 24/01/2024
 16665 000025B9 C43E[2C03]              	les	di,[DMAADD]
 16666 000025BD 57                      	push	di
 16667 000025BE 06                      	push	es
 16668 000025BF C706[2C03][BE04]        	MOV	WORD [DMAADD],SEARCHBUF
 16669 000025C5 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	WORD [DMAADD+2],DS
 16670 000025C9 E85D10                  	call	DOS_SEARCH_NEXT 	; Find it
 16671 000025CC 8F06[2E03]              	pop	word [DMAADD+2]
 16672 000025D0 8F06[2C03]              	pop	word [DMAADD]
 16673 000025D4 724A                    	JC	short SearchNoMore
 16674                                  	; 24/01/2024
 16675                                  	;JMP	SearchSet		; Ok set return
 16676                                  
 16677                                  ;;;	; 24/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 16678                                  
 16679                                  ; The search was successful (or the search-next). We store the information
 16680                                  ; into the user's FCB for continuation.
 16681                                  
 16682                                  SearchSet:
 16683 000025D6 BE[BE04]                	MOV	SI,SEARCHBUF
 16684 000025D9 C43E[A605]              	LES	DI,[THISFCB]		; point to the FCB
 16685 000025DD F606[6C05]FF            	TEST	byte [EXTFCB],0FFh
 16686 000025E2 7403                    	JZ	short NORMFCB1
 16687 000025E4 83C707                  	ADD	DI,7			; Point past the extension
 16688                                  NORMFCB1:
 16689 000025E7 5B                      	pop	bx			; Get original drive byte
 16690 000025E8 08DB                    	OR	BL,BL
 16691 000025EA 7506                    	JNZ	short SearchDrv
 16692 000025EC 8A1E[3603]              	MOV	BL,[CURDRV]
 16693 000025F0 FEC3                    	INC	BL
 16694                                  SearchDrv:
 16695 000025F2 AC                      	LODSB				; Get correct search contin drive byte
 16696 000025F3 86C3                    	XCHG	AL,BL			; Search byte to BL, user byte to AL
 16697 000025F5 47                      	INC	DI
 16698                                  	;STOSB				; Store the correct "user" drive byte
 16699                                  					;  at the start of the search info
 16700 000025F6 B90A00                  	MOV	CX,20/2
 16701 000025F9 F3A5                    	REP	MOVSW			; Rest of search cont info, SI -> entry
 16702 000025FB 86C3                    	XCHG	AL,BL			; User drive byte back to BL, search
 16703                                  					;   byte to AL
 16704 000025FD AA                      	STOSB				; Search contin drive byte at end of
 16705                                  					;   contin info
 16706 000025FE C43E[2C03]              	LES	DI,[DMAADD]
 16707 00002602 F606[6C05]FF            	TEST	byte [EXTFCB],0FFh
 16708 00002607 740D                    	JZ	short NORMFCB2
 16709 00002609 B0FF                    	MOV	AL,0FFh
 16710 0000260B AA                      	STOSB
 16711 0000260C FEC0                    	INC	AL
 16712                                  	;MOV	CX,5
 16713                                  	; 17/12/2022
 16714 0000260E B105                    	mov	cl,5
 16715 00002610 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 16716 00002612 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 16717 00002615 AA                      	STOSB
 16718                                  NORMFCB2:
 16719 00002616 88D8                    	MOV	AL,BL			; User Drive byte
 16720 00002618 AA                      	STOSB
 16721                                  	;MOV	CX,16			; 32 / 2 words of dir entry
 16722                                  	; 17/12/2022
 16723 00002619 B110                    	mov	cl,16
 16724 0000261B F3A5                    	REP	MOVSW
 16725 0000261D E96CE0                  	jmp	FCB_RET_OK
 16726                                  ;;;
 16727                                  
 16728                                  SearchNoMore:

 16882                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16883                                  ;**	PackName - Convert file names from FCB to ASCIZ format.
 16884                                  ;
 16885                                  ;	PackName transfers a file name from DS:SI to ES:DI and converts it to
 16886                                  ;	the ASCIZ format.
 16887                                  ;
 16888                                  ;	ENTRY	(DS:SI) = 11 character FCB or dir entry name
 16889                                  ;		(ES:DI) = destination area (13 bytes)
 16890                                  ;	EXIT	(ds:SI) and (es:DI) advanced
 16891                                  ;	USES	al, CX, SI, DI, Flags  (BUGBUG - not verified - jgl)
 16892                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16893                                  
 16894                                  	; 25/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 16895                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:6627h
 16896                                  
 16897                                  PackName:
 16898                                  ;	Move over 8 characters to cover the name component, then trim it's
 16899                                  ;	trailing blanks.
 16900                                  
 16901                                  	;MOV	CX,8			; Pack the name
 16902                                  	;REP	MOVSB			; Move all of it
 16903                                  	; 25/01/2024
 16904 000026B9 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 16905 000026BC F3A5                    	rep	movsw
 16906                                  main_kill_tail:
 16907 000026BE 26807DFF20              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1]," "
 16908 000026C3 7507                    	JNZ	short find_check_dot
 16909 000026C5 4F                      	DEC	DI			; Back up over trailing space
 16910 000026C6 41                      	INC	CX
 16911 000026C7 83F908                  	CMP	CX,8
 16912 000026CA 72F2                    	JB	short main_kill_tail
 16913                                  find_check_dot:
 16914                                  	;CMP	WORD [SI],(" " << 8) | " "
 16915 000026CC 813C2020                	cmp     word [si],2020h 
 16916 000026D0 7506                    	JNZ	short got_ext 		; Some chars in extension
 16917 000026D2 807C0220                	CMP	BYTE [SI+2]," "
 16918 000026D6 740F                    	JZ	short find_done		; No extension
 16919                                  got_ext:
 16920 000026D8 B02E                    	MOV	AL,"."	; 2Eh
 16921 000026DA AA                      	STOSB
 16922                                  	;MOV	CX,3
 16923                                  	;; 18/12/2022
 16924                                  	;;mov	cl,3
 16925                                  	;;REP	MOVSB
 16926                                  	;movsb
 16927                                  	;movsb
 16928                                  	;movsb
 16929                                  	; 25/01/2024
 16930 000026DB A5                      	movsw
 16931 000026DC A4                      	movsb
 16932                                  ext_kill_tail:
 16933 000026DD 26807DFF20              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1]," "
 16934 000026E2 7503                    	JNZ	short find_done
 16935 000026E4 4F                      	DEC	DI			; Back up over trailing space
 16936 000026E5 EBF6                    	JMP	short ext_kill_tail
 16937                                  find_done:

 16939 000026E9 AA                      	STOSB				; NUL terminate
 16940 000026EA C3                      	retn

 16966                                  ; DOSCODE:5FB0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 16967                                  
 16968                                  ;**	Directory related system calls. These will be passed direct text of the
 16969                                  ;	pathname from the user. They will need to be passed through the macro
 16970                                  ;	expander prior to being sent through the low-level stuff. I/O specs are
 16971                                  ;	defined in DISPATCH. The system calls are:
 16972                                  ;
 16973                                  ;	$CURRENT_DIR  Written
 16974                                  ;	$RMDIR	  Written
 16975                                  ;	$CHDIR	  Written
 16976                                  ;	$MKDIR	  Written
 16977                                  ;
 16978                                  ;
 16979                                  ;	Modification history:
 16980                                  ;
 16981                                  ;	    Created: ARR 4 April 1983
 16982                                  ;		 MZ 10 May 1983     CurrentDir implemented
 16983                                  ;		 MZ 11 May 1983     RmDir, ChDir, MkDir implemented
 16984                                  ;		 EE 19 Oct 1983     RmDir no longer allows you to delete a
 16985                                  ;				    current directory.
 16986                                  ;		 MZ 19 Jan 1983     Brain damaged applications rely on success
 16987

 16997                                  ;BREAK <$CURRENT_DIR - dump the current directory into user space>

 17001                                  ;

 17004                                  ;		MOV	DL,drive

 17007                                  ;	    ; current directory.
 17008                                  ;   Error returns:
 17009                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_drive
 17010                                  ;
 17011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 17013                                  	; 06/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 17014                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 2D4Eh

 17140                                  ;BREAK <$RmDir -- Remove a directory>
 17141                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17142                                  ;
 17143                                  ; Procedure Name : $RmDir
 17144                                  ;
 17145                                  ; Inputs:
 17146                                  ;	DS:DX Points to asciz name
 17147                                  ; Function:
 17148                                  ;	Delete directory if empty
 17149                                  ; Returns:
 17150                                  ;	STD XENIX Return
 17151                                  ;	AX = error_path_not_found If path bad
 17152                                  ;	AX = error_access_denied If
 17153                                  ;		Directory not empty
 17154                                  ;		Path not directory
 17155                                  ;		Root directory specified
 17156                                  ;		Directory malformed (. and .. not first two entries)
 17157                                  ;		User tries to delete a current directory
 17158                                  ;	AX = error_current_directory
 17159                                  ;
 17160                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17161                                  
 17162                                  	; 10/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 17163                                  	; DOSCODE:6015h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 17164                                  
 17165                                  	; 25/01/2025 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 17166                                  	; DOSCODE:66C8h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 17167                                  
 17168                                  _$RMDIR:

 17170 00002750 1E                      	push	ds
 17171 00002751 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; Load ptr into si
 17172 00002753 BF[BE03]                	mov	di,OPENBUF		; di = ptr to buf for trans name
 17173 00002756 57                      	push	di
 17174 00002757 E82D4E                  	call	TransPathNoSet		; Translate the name
 17175 0000275A 5F                      	pop	di			; di = ptr to buf for trans name
 17176 0000275B 7306                    	jnc	short rmlset		; If transpath succeeded, continue
 17177 0000275D 1F                      	pop	ds
 17178 0000275E 5A                      	pop	dx			; Restore the name
 17179                                  	;mov	al,3
 17180 0000275F B003                    	mov	al,error_path_not_found ; Otherwise, return an error
 17181                                  	; 16/12/2022
 17182                                  rmdir_errj: ; 10/08/2018
