 23086                                  ;**	DOS_Commit - UPdate Directory Entries
 23087                                  ;
 23088                                  ;	ENTRY	same as DOS_CLOSE (??? BUGBUG - update this jgl)

 23101                                  DOS_COMMIT:
 23102                                  	;hkn; called from srvcall. DS already set up.
 23103 000038DE C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 23104                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+5]
 23105 000038E2 268B5D05                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags]
 23106                                  	;test	bx,0C0h

 23109                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device ;Clears carry
 23110 000038E9 75F2                    	jnz	short PopDone_retn
 23111                                  	;test	bx,8000h
 23112                                  	; 17/12/2022
 23113                                  	;test	bh,80h
 23114 000038EB F6C780                  	test	bh,(sf_isnet>>8) ; 80h
 23115                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_isnet ; 8000h
 23116 000038EE 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_COMMIT
 23117                                  
 23118                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 23119                                  ;	transfer NET_COMMIT
 23120                                  ;ELSE
 23121                                  	;mov	ax,1107h
 23122 000038F0 B80711                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|7
 23123 000038F3 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - COMMIT REMOTE FILE
 23124                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 23125                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 23126                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 23127                                  			; CF clear if successful
 23128                                  localcommit_retn: ; 18/12/2022	
 23129 000038F5 C3                      	retn
 23130                                  ;ENDIF
 23131                                  
 23132                                  ; Perform local commit operation by doing a close but not releaseing the SFT.
 23133                                  ; There are three ways we can do this. One is to enter a critical section to
 23134                                  ; protect a potential free. The second is to increment the ref count to mask
 23135                                  ; the close decrementing.
 23136                                  ;
 23137                                  ; The proper way is to let the caller's of close decide if a decrement should
 23138                                  ; be done. We do this by providing another entry into close after the
 23139                                  ; decrement and after the share information release.
 23140                                  
 23141                                  ; DOSCODE:6FA0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23142                                  ; DOSCODE:6F8Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 23143                                  
 23144                                  LOCAL_COMMIT:
 23145 000038F6 E8F0DF                  	call	ECritDisk
 23146                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 23147 000038F9 E8EDDF                  	call	ECritDisk	;PTM.
 23148 000038FC E80E00                  	call	SetSFTTimes
 23149 000038FF B8FFFF                  	MOV	AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 23150 00003902 E84BFE                  	call	CloseEntry
 23151                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 23152 00003905 9C                      	PUSHF			;PTM.				;AN000;
 23153 00003906 E8A916                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT	;PTM.  increment device count	;AN000;
 23154 00003909 9D                      	POPF			;PTM.				;AN000;
 23155                                  	;call	LCritDisk	;PTM.				;AN000;
 23156                                  	; 18/12/2022
 23157 0000390A E909E0                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 23158                                  ;localcommit_retn:
 23159                                  ;	retn

 23167                                  ;   Reflect these times in other SFT's for the same file.
 23168                                  ;
 23169                                  ;   Inputs:	ES:DI point to SFT
 23170                                  ;		BX = sf_flags set appropriately
 23171                                  ;   Outputs:	Set sft times to current time if File & dirty & !nodate
 23172                                  ;   Registers modified: All except ES:DI, BX, AX
 23173                                  ;
 23174                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23175

 23177                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM

 23179                                  SetSFTTimes:
 23180                                  
 23181                                  ; 04/02/2024

 23184

 23188                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device
 23189                                  	;retnz				; clean or device => no timestamp
 23190                                  	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 23191

 23193

 23196                                  	;test	bh,40h

 23198                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_close_nodate
 23199                                  	;retnz				; nodate => no timestamp
 23200                                  	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 23201                                  %else
 23202                                  	; 04/02/2024
 23203                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23204                                  	;test	bx,40C0h
 23205 0000390D F7C3C040                	test	bx,sf_close_nodate+devid_file_clean+devid_device
 23206 00003911 75E2                    	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 23207                                  %endif
 23208                                  
 23209 00003913 50                      	push	ax
 23210 00003914 53                      	push	bx
 23211 00003915 E84AD2                  	call	DATE16			; Date/Time to AX/DX
 23212                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Fh],ax
 23213 00003918 2689450F                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date],AX
 23214                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Dh],dx
 23215 0000391C 2689550D                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time],DX
 23216 00003920 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 23217                                  ;if installed
 23218                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 23219 00003922 FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]	; 14 = ShSU
 23220                                  ;else
 23221                                  ;	call	ShSU
 23222                                  ;endif
 23223 00003926 5B                      	pop	bx
 23224 00003927 58                      	pop	ax

 23235                                  ;TITLE DIRCALL - Directory manipulation internal calls
 23236                                  ;NAME  DIRCALL
 23237                                  
 23238                                  ;**	Low level directory manipulation routines for making removing and
 23239                                  ;	  verifying local or NET directories
 23240                                  ;
 23241                                  ;	DOS_MKDIR
 23242                                  ;	DOS_CHDIR

 23244                                  ;
 23245                                  ;	Modification history:
 23246                                  ;
 23247                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 23248                                  
 23249                                  ;BREAK <DOS_MkDir - Make a directory entry>
 23250                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23251                                  ;
 23252                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_MkDir
 23253                                  ;
 23254                                  ; Inputs:
 23255                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 23256                                  ;		terminated)
 23257                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 23258                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 23259                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 23260                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 23261                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 23262                                  ; Function:
 23263                                  ;	Make a new directory
 23264                                  ; Returns:
 23265                                  ;	Carry Clear
 23266                                  ;		No error
 23267                                  ;	Carry Set
 23268                                  ;	    AX is error code
 23269                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 23270                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 23271                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 23272                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 23273                                  ;		error_access_denied
 23274                                  ;			Already exists, device name
 23275                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 23276                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23277                                  
 23278                                  ;hkn; called from path.asm. DS already set up.
 23279                                  
 23280                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23281                                  ; DOSCODE:6FC6h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 23282                                  
 23283                                  ; 04/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23284                                  ; DOSCODE:78FFh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 23285                                  
 23286                                  DOS_MKDIR:

 23532                                  ;BREAK <DOS_ChDir -- Verify a directory>
 23533                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23534                                  ;
 23535                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_ChDir
 23536                                  ;
 23537                                  ; Inputs:
 23538                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 23539                                  ;		terminated)
 23540                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 23541                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 23542                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 23543                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used May not be NUL
 23544                                  ; Function:
 23545                                  ;	Validate the path for potential new current directory
 23546                                  ; Returns:
 23547                                  ;	NOTE:
 23548                                  ;	    [SATTRIB] is modified by this call
 23549                                  ;	Carry Clear
 23550                                  ;	    CX is cluster number of the DIR, LOCAL CDS ONLY
 23551                                  ;		Caller must NOT set ID fields on a NET CDS.
 23552                                  ;	Carry Set
 23553                                  ;	    AX is error code
 23554                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 23555                                  ;			Bad path
 23556                                  ;		error_access_denied
 23557                                  ;			device or file name
 23558                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 23559                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23560                                  
 23561                                  ;hkn; called from path.asm and dir2.asm. DS already set up.

 23565

 23567                                  ; DOSCODE:70C6h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 23568                                  
 23569                                  ; 04/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23570                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7A23h
 23571

 23573                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:70DAh)

 23643                                  ;BREAK <DOS_RmDir -- Remove a directory>

 23645                                  ;
 23646                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_RmDir
 23647                                  ;
 23648                                  ; Inputs:
 23649                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 23650                                  ;		terminated)
 23651                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 23652                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else

 23655                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))

 23657                                  ;	Remove a directory

 23660                                  ;	NOTE:

 23893                                  ;	TITLE	DISK - Disk utility routines
 23894                                  ;	NAME	Disk
 23895                                  
 23896                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs
 23897                                  ;
 23898                                  ;	SWAPCON
 23899                                  ;	SWAPBACK
 23900                                  ;	DOS_READ
 23901                                  ;	DOS_WRITE
 23902                                  ;	get_io_sft
 23903                                  ;	DirRead
 23904                                  ;	FIRSTCLUSTER
 23905                                  ;	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 23906                                  ;	FATSecRd
 23907                                  ;	DREAD
 23908                                  ;	CHECK_WRITE_LOCK
 23909                                  ;	CHECK_READ_LOCK
 23910                                  ;
 23911                                  ;	Revision history:
 23912                                  ;
 23913                                  ;		A000   version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 23914                                  ;
 23915                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23916                                  ;
 23917                                  ; M065 : B#5276. On raw read/write of a block of characters if a critical
 23918                                  ;		error happens, DOS retries the entire block assuming that
 23919                                  ;		zero characters were transferred. Modified the code to take
 23920                                  ;		into account the number of characters transfered before
 23921                                  ;		retrying the operation.
 23922                                  ;
 23923                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23924                                  ;
 23925                                  
 23926                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 23927                                  
 23928                                  ;Break	<SwapCon, Swap Back - Old-style I/O to files>
 23929                                  
 23930                                  ; **** Drivers for file input from devices ****
 23931                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23932                                  ;   Indicate that there is no more I/O occurring through another SFT outside
 23933                                  ;   of handles 0 and 1
 23934                                  ;
 23935                                  ;   Inputs:	DS is DOSDATA
 23936                                  ;   Outputs:	CONSWAP is set to false.
 23937                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 23938                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23939                                  
 23940                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 3CF8h
 23941                                  
 23942                                  ; DOSCODE:71E3h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23943                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23944                                  
 23945                                  ; DOSCODE:71CFh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 23946                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23947                                  
 23948                                  SWAPBACK:
 23949 00003B6B C606[5703]00            	MOV	BYTE [CONSWAP],0	; signal no conswaps
 23950 00003B70 C3                      	retn
 23951                                  
 23952                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23953                                  ;
 23954                                  ; Procedure Name : SWAPCON
 23955                                  ;
 23956                                  ;   Copy ThisSFT to CONSFT for use by the 1-12 primitives.
 23957                                  ;
 23958                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisSFT as the sft of the desired file
 23959                                  ;		DS is DOSDATA
 23960                                  ;   Outputs:	CONSWAP is set.  CONSFT = ThisSFT.
 23961                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 23962                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23963                                  
 23964                                  SWAPCON:
 23965                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 23966                                  	;push	es
 23967                                  	;push	di
 23968                                  	;mov	byte [CONSWAP],1
 23969                                  	;les	di,[THISSFT]
 23970                                  	;mov	word [CONSFT],di
 23971                                  	;mov	word [CONSFT+2],es
 23972                                  	;pop	di
 23973                                  	;pop	es
 23974                                  	;retn
 23975                                  
 23976                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 23977 00003B71 C606[5703]01            	mov	byte [CONSWAP],1	; ConSwap = TRUE
 23978 00003B76 50                      	push	ax
 23979 00003B77 A1[9E05]                	mov	ax,[THISSFT]
 23980 00003B7A A3[E605]                	mov	[CONSFT],ax
 23981 00003B7D A1[A005]                	mov	ax,[THISSFT+2]
 23982 00003B80 A3[E805]                	mov	[CONSFT+2],ax
 23983 00003B83 58                      	pop	ax
 23984 00003B84 C3                      	retn
 23985                                  
 23986                                  ; DOSCODE:71FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23987                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23988                                  
 23989                                  ;Break	<DOS_READ -- MAIN READ ROUTINE AND DEVICE IN ROUTINES>
 23990                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23991                                  ;
 23992                                  ; Inputs:
 23993                                  ;	ThisSFT set to the SFT for the file being used
 23994                                  ;	[DMAADD] contains transfer address
 23995                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes to read
 23996                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 23997                                  ; Function:
 23998                                  ;	Perform read operation
 23999                                  ; Outputs:
 24000                                  ;    Carry clear
 24001                                  ;	SFT Position and cluster pointers updated
 24002                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes read
 24003                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24004                                  ;    Carry set
 24005                                  ;	AX is error code
 24006                                  ;	CX = 0
 24007                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24008                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed
 24009                                  ;
 24010                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24011                                  
 24012                                  ;hkn; called from fcbio.asm, handle.asm and dev.asm. DS is be set up.
 24013                                  
 24014                                  ; DOSCODE:71E9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24015                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24016                                  
 24017                                  ; 07/02/2024
 24018                                  ; 06/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24019                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7B76h
 24020                                  
 24021                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7997h)
 24022                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:71FDh)
 24023                                  
 24024                                  DOS_READ:
 24025 00003B85 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 24026                                  
 24027                                  ; Verify that the sft has been opened in a mode that allows reading.
 24028                                  
 24029                                  	;mov	al,[es:di+2]
 24030 00003B89 268A4502                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 24031                                  	;;and	al,0Fh	; (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.22)
 24032                                  	;AND	AL,access_mask
 24033                                  	; 06/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 24034                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 & Win Me)
 24035 00003B8D 2403                    	and	al,3	; open_mode_mask ?
 24036                                  
 24037                                  	;cmp	al,1
 24038 00003B8F 3C01                    	CMP	AL,open_for_write
 24039 00003B91 7503                    	JNE	short READ_NO_MODE	; Is read or both
 24040 00003B93 E9DC05                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR
 24041                                  
 24042                                  READ_NO_MODE:
 24043 00003B96 E8B904                  	call	SETUP
 24044 00003B99 E30B                    	JCXZ	NoIORet 		; no bytes to read - fast return
 24045 00003B9B E8A2DC                  	call	IsSFTNet
 24046 00003B9E 7408                    	JZ	short LOCAL_READ
 24047                                  
 24048                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 24049                                  ;	transfer NET_READ
 24050                                  ;ELSE
 24051                                  	;mov	ax,1108h
 24052 00003BA0 B80811                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|8
 24053 00003BA3 CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - READ FROM REMOTE FILE
 24054                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 24055                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 24056                                  			; CX = number of bytes, SS = DOS CS, SDA DTA field -> user buffer
 24057                                  			; Return: CF set on error, CX = bytes read
 24058 00003BA5 C3                      	retn
 24059                                  ;ENDIF
 24060                                  
 24061                                  ; The user ended up requesting 0 bytes of input. We do nothing for this case
 24062                                  ; except return immediately.
 24063                                  
 24064                                  NoIORet:
 24065 00003BA6 F8                      	CLC
 24066 00003BA7 C3                      	retn
 24067                                  
 24068                                  LOCAL_READ:
 24069                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],80h
 24070                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device  ; Check for named device I/O
 24071 00003BA8 26F6450580              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device ; 02/06/2019
 24072 00003BAD 750E                    	JNZ	short READDEV
 24073                                  
 24074                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2
 24075 00003BAF C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 24076 00003BB4 E832DD                  	call	ECritDisk
 24077 00003BB7 E87305                  	call	DISKREAD
 24078                                  
 24079                                  critexit:
 24080                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 24081                                  	;retn
 24082                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24083 00003BBA E959DD                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 24084                                  
 24085                                  ; We are reading from a device. Examine the status of the device to see if we
 24086                                  ; can short-circuit the I/O. If the device in the EOF state or if it is the
 24087                                  ; null device, we can safely indicate no transfer.
 24088                                  
 24089                                  READDEV:
 24090                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],4
 24091 00003BBD C606[2303]04            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_SerDev
 24092                                  	;mov	bl,[es:di+5]
 24093 00003BC2 268A5D05                	MOV	BL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags]
 24094 00003BC6 C43E[2C03]              	LES	DI,[DMAADD]
 24095                                  	;test	bl,40h
 24096 00003BCA F6C340                  	test	BL,devid_device_EOF	; End of file?
 24097 00003BCD 7407                    	JZ	short ENDRDDEVJ3
 24098                                  	;test	bl,4
 24099 00003BCF F6C304                  	test	BL,devid_device_null	; NUL device?
 24100 00003BD2 7405                    	JZ	short TESTRAW 		; NO
 24101 00003BD4 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL			; Indicate EOF by setting zero
 24102                                  ENDRDDEVJ3:
 24103                                  	; 17/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility!)
 24104                                  	;JMP	short ENDRDDEVJ2
 24105                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24106 00003BD6 E93F01                  	jmp	ENDRDDEV ; 04/05/2019
 24107                                  
 24108                                  ; We need to hit the device. Figure out if we do a raw read or we do the
 24109                                  ; bizarre std_con_string_input.
 24110                                  
 24111                                  TESTRAW:
 24112                                  	;test	bl,20h
 24113 00003BD9 F6C320                  	test	BL,devid_device_raw	; Raw mode?
 24114 00003BDC 7508                    	JNZ	short DVRDRAW 		; Yes, let the device do all local editing
 24115                                  	;test	bl,1
 24116 00003BDE F6C301                  	test	BL,devid_device_con_in	; Is it console device?
 24117 00003BE1 7458                    	JZ	short NOTRDCON
 24118 00003BE3 E96701                  	JMP	READCON
 24119                                  
 24120                                  DVRDRAW:
 24121 00003BE6 06                      	PUSH	ES
 24122 00003BE7 1F                      	POP	DS			; Xaddr to DS:DI
 24123                                  
 24124                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24125                                  
 24126                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24127                                  ;SR;
 24128                                  ;Check for win386 presence -- if present, do polled read of characters
 24129                                  
 24130 00003BE8 36F606[A110]01          	test	byte [ss:IsWin386],1 ; 19/05/2019
 24131 00003BEE 7408                    	jz	short ReadRawRetry	;not present
 24132 00003BF0 F6C301                  	test	bl,devid_device_con_in	;is it console device?
 24133 00003BF3 7403                    	jz	short ReadRawRetry	;no, do normal read
 24134 00003BF5 E9A800                  	jmp	do_polling		;yes, do win386 polling loop
 24135                                  
 24136                                  ReadRawRetry:
 24137                                  
 24138                                  ; 07/02/2024
 24139                                  %if 0
 24140                                  	MOV	BX,DI			; DS:BX transfer addr
 24141                                  	; 06/02/2024 ; *
 24142                                  	;XOR	AX,AX			; Media Byte, unit = 0
 24143                                  	;;MOV	DX,AX			; Start at 0
 24144                                  	;; 06/02/2024
 24145                                  	;cwd
 24146                                  	;call	SETREAD
 24147                                  	; 06/02/2024 ; *
 24148                                  	call	SETREAD_X
 24149                                  %else
 24150 00003BF8 E8B114                  	call	SETREAD_XJ
 24151                                  %endif
 24152                                  
 24153 00003BFB 1E                      	PUSH	DS			; Save Seg part of Xaddr
 24154                                  
 24155                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24156 00003BFC 36C536[9E05]            	LDS	SI,[SS:THISSFT]
 24157 00003C01 E82F14                  	call	DEVIOCALL
 24158 00003C04 89FA                    	MOV	DX,DI			; DS:DX is preserved by INT 24
 24159 00003C06 B486                    	MOV	AH,86H			; Read error
 24160                                  
 24161                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24162 00003C08 368B3E[5D03]            	MOV	DI,[SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 24163                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 24164                                  	;test	di,8000h
 24165                                  	;jz	short CRDROK
 24166                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24167 00003C0D 09FF                    	or	di,di
 24168 00003C0F 7920                    	jns	short CRDROK		; no errors
 24169                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 24170 00003C11 E89220                  	call	CHARHARD
 24171                                  
 24172                                  ; 06/02/2024 - Retrro DOS v5.0
 24173                                  %if 0
 24174                                  	MOV	DI,DX			; DS:DI is Xaddr
 24175                                  	; 04/05/2019
 24176                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24177                                  	add	di,[ss:CALLSCNT]	; update ptr and count to reflect the	M065
 24178                                  	sub	cx,[ss:CALLSCNT]	; number of chars xferred		M065
 24179                                  %else
 24180 00003C14 368B3E[6C03]            	mov	di,[ss:CALLSCNT]
 24181 00003C19 29F9                    	sub	cx,di			; update transfer count
 24182 00003C1B 01D7                    	add	di,dx			; update pointer
 24183                                  %endif
 24184                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 24185 00003C1D 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24186 00003C1F 7410                    	JZ	short CRDROK		; Ignore
 24187 00003C21 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3
 24188 00003C23 7403                    	JZ	short CRDFERR 		; fail.
 24189 00003C25 1F                      	POP	DS			; Recover saved seg part of Xaddr
 24190 00003C26 EBD0                    	JMP	short ReadRawRetry	; Retry
 24191                                  
 24192                                  ; We have encountered a device-driver error. We have informed the user of it
 24193                                  ; and he has said for us to fail the system call.
 24194                                  
 24195                                  CRDFERR:
 24196 00003C28 5F                      	POP	DI			; Clean stack
 24197                                  DEVIOFERR:
 24198                                  
 24199                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24200 00003C29 36C43E[9E05]            	LES	DI,[SS:THISSFT]
 24201 00003C2E E93F05                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 24202                                  
 24203                                  CRDROK:
 24204 00003C31 5F                      	POP	DI			; Chuck saved seg of Xaddr
 24205 00003C32 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 24206                                  
 24207                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24208 00003C34 36033E[6C03]            	ADD	DI,[ss:CALLSCNT]	; Amount transferred
 24209                                  	;JMP	SHORT ENDRDDEVJ3
 24210                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24211 00003C39 EB63                    	jmp	short ENDRDDEVJ2
 24212                                  
 24213                                  ; We are going to do a cooked read on some character device. There is a
 24214                                  ; problem here, what does the data look like? Is it a terminal device, line
 24215                                  ; CR line CR line CR, or is it file data, line CR LF line CR LF? Does it have
 24216                                  ; a ^Z at the end which is data, or is the ^Z not data?  In any event we're
 24217                                  ; going to do this: Read in pieces up to CR (CRs included in data) or ^z (^z
 24218                                  ; included in data). this "simulates" the way con works in cooked mode
 24219                                  ; reading one line at a time. With file data, however, the lines will look
 24220                                  ; like, LF line CR. This is a little weird.
 24221                                  
 24222                                  NOTRDCON:
 24223                                  	;MOV	AX,ES
 24224                                  	;MOV	DS,AX
 24225                                  	; 07/02/2024
 24226 00003C3B 06                      	push	es

 24554                                  ;Break	<DOS_WRITE -- MAIN WRITE ROUTINE AND DEVICE OUT ROUTINES>
 24555                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24556                                  ;
 24557                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_WRITE
 24558                                  ;
 24559                                  ; Inputs:
 24560                                  ;	ThisSFT set to the SFT for the file being used
 24561                                  ;	[DMAADD] contains transfer address
 24562                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes to write
 24563                                  ; Function:
 24564                                  ;	Perform write operation
 24565                                  ;	NOTE: If CX = 0 on input, file is truncated or grown
 24566                                  ;		to current sf_position
 24567                                  ; Outputs:
 24568                                  ;    Carry clear
 24569                                  ;	SFT Position and cluster pointers updated
 24570                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes written
 24571                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24572                                  ;    Carry set
 24573                                  ;	AX is error code
 24574                                  ;	CX = 0
 24575                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24576                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed
 24577                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24578                                  
 24579                                  ;hkn; called from fcbio2.asm, handle.asm and dev.asm. DS is set up at this 
 24580                                  ;hkn; point to DOSDATA.
 24581                                  
 24582                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24583                                  ; DOSCODE:742Ch (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24584                                  
 24585                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24586                                  ; DOSCODE:7418h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24587                                  
 24588                                  ; 07/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24589                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7D8Fh
 24590                                  
 24591                                  ; burada kaldým... 07/02/2024
 24592                                  
 24593                                  DOS_WRITE:
 24594 00003D86 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 24595                                  	;mov	al,[ES:DI+2]
 24596 00003D8A 268A4502                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 24597                                  	;and	al,0Fh
 24598 00003D8E 240F                    	AND	AL,access_mask
 24599                                  	;cmp	al,0
 24600 00003D90 3C00                    	CMP	AL,open_for_read
 24601 00003D92 7503                    	JNE	short Check_FCB_RO		 ;Is write or both
 24602                                  BadMode:
 24603 00003D94 E9DB03                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR
 24604                                  
 24605                                  ; NOTE: The following check for writting to a Read Only File is performed
 24606                                  ;	    ONLY on FCBs!!!!
 24607                                  ;	We ALLOW writes to Read Only files via handles to allow a CREATE
 24608                                  ;	    of a read only file which can then be written to.
 24609                                  ;	This is OK because we are NOT ALLOWED to OPEN a RO file via handles
 24610                                  ;	    for writting, or RE-CREATE an EXISTING RO file via handles. Thus,
 24611                                  ;	    CREATing a NEW RO file, or RE-CREATing an existing file which
 24612                                  ;	    is NOT RO to be RO, via handles are the only times we can write
 24613                                  ;	    to a read-only file.
 24614                                  
 24615                                  Check_FCB_RO:
 24616                                  	;;test	word [es:di+2],8000h
 24617                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB
 24618                                  	;JZ	short WRITE_NO_MODE	; Not an FCB
 24619                                  	
 24620                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 24621 00003D97 26F6450380              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],(sf_isFCB>>8)
 24622 00003D9C 7407                    	JZ	short WRITE_NO_MODE	; Not an FCB
 24623                                  
 24624                                  	;test	byte [es:di+4],1
 24625 00003D9E 26F6450401              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr],attr_read_only
 24626 00003DA3 75EF                    	JNZ	short BadMode 		; Can't write to Read_Only files via FCB
 24627                                  WRITE_NO_MODE:
 24628 00003DA5 E8AA02                  	call	SETUP
 24629 00003DA8 E895DA                  	call	IsSFTNet
 24630 00003DAB 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_WRITE
 24631                                  
 24632                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 24633                                  ;	transfer NET_WRITE
 24634                                  ;ELSE
 24635                                  	;mov	ax,1109h
 24636 00003DAD B80911                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|9
 24637 00003DB0 CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - WRITE TO REMOTE FILE
 24638                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 24639                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 24640                                  			; CX = number of bytes, SS = DOS CS, SDA DTA field -> user buffer
 24641                                  			; Return: CF set on error, CX = bytes written
 24642 00003DB2 C3                      	retn
 24643                                  ;ENDIF
 24644                                  
 24645                                  LOCAL_WRITE:
 24646                                  	;;test	word [es:di+5],80h
 24647                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device
 24648                                  	;jnz	short WRTDEV
 24649                                  
 24650                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],80h
 24651 00003DB3 26F6450580              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device ; Check for named device I/O

 24665

 24667

 24675

 24680                                  ; Extended Open
 24681                                  	;call	LCritDisk

 24686                                  DVWRTRAW:

 24878                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24879                                  ;
 24880                                  ; Procedure Name : get_io_sft
 24881                                  ;
 24882                                  ;   Convert JFN number in BX to sf_entry in DS:SI We get the normal SFT if
 24883                                  ;   CONSWAP is FALSE or if the handle desired is 2 or more. Otherwise, we
 24884                                  ;   retrieve the sft from ConSFT which is set by SwapCon.
 24885                                  ;
 24886                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24887                                  
 24888                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24889                                  ; DOSCODE:7583h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24890                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24891                                  ; DOSCODE:756Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)

 24899 00003EE2 1F                      	pop	ds

 24907                                  RET44P:

 24919                                  ;Break	<DIRREAD -- READ A DIRECTORY SECTOR>
 24920                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24921                                  ;
 24922                                  ; Procedure Name : DIRREAD
 24923                                  ;
 24924                                  ; Inputs:
 24925                                  ;	AX = Directory block number (relative to first block of directory)
 24926                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 24927                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = First sector of first cluster of directory
 24928                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster
 24929                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 24930                                  ; Function:
 24931                                  ;	Read the directory block into [CURBUF].
 24932                                  ; Outputs:
 24933                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM] = Next cluster (after the one skipped to)
 24934                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] Set
 24935                                  ;	ES:BP unchanged
 24936                                  ;	[CURBUF] Points to Buffer with dir sector
 24937                                  ;	Carry set if error (user said FAIL to I 24)
 24938                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed.
 24939                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24940                                  
 24941                                  ;hkn; called from dir.asm. DS already set up to DOSDATA.
 24942                                  
 24943                                  DIRREAD:
 24944                                  
 24945                                  ; Note that ClusFac is the sectors per cluster. This is NOT necessarily
 24946                                  ; the same as what is in the DPB! In the case of the root directory, we have
 24947                                  ; ClusFac = # sectors in the root directory. The root directory is detected
 24948                                  ; by DIRStart = 0.
 24949                                  
 24950 00003EFF 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 24951                                  	;CMP	word [DIRSTART],0
 24952                                  	; 21/09/2023
 24953 00003F01 3916[C205]              	cmp	[DIRSTART],dx ; 0
 24954 00003F05 7503                    	jnz	short SubDir
 24955 00003F07 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 24956 00003F08 EB0C                    	JMP	short DoRead
 24957                                  
 24958                                  ; Convert the sector number in AX into cluster and sector-within-cluster pair
 24959                                  
 24960                                  SubDir:
 24961 00003F0A 88C2                    	MOV	DL,AL
 24962                                  	;and	dl,[es:bp+4]
 24963 00003F0C 26225604                	AND	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 24964                                  
 24965                                  ;	(DX) = sector-in-cluster
 24966                                  
 24967                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 24968 00003F10 268A4E05                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 24969 00003F14 D3E8                    	SHR	AX,CL
 24970                                  
 24971                                  ;	(DX) = position in cluster
 24972                                  ;	(AX) = number of clusters to skip
 24973                                  
 24974                                  DoRead:
 24975 00003F16 8816[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],DL
 24976 00003F1A 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX
 24977 00003F1C 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 24978                                  
 24979                                  ;	(CX) = number of clusters to skip.
 24980                                  ;	(AH) = remainder
 24981                                  
 24982                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24983                                  	 
 24984                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24985                                  	;MOV	DX,[DIRSEC+2]	     	  ;>32mb
 24986                                  	;MOV	[HIGH_SECTOR],DX	  ;>32mb
 24987                                  	;MOV	DX,[DIRSEC]
 24988                                  	;ADD	DL,AH
 24989                                  	;ADC	DH,0
 24990                                  	;ADC	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0	  ;>32mb
 24991                                  	; 21/09/2023
 24992 00003F1E 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 24993 00003F20 8B16[BE05]              	mov	dx,[DIRSEC]
 24994 00003F24 00E2                    	add	dl,ah
 24995 00003F26 10DE                    	adc	dh,bl ; 0
 24996 00003F28 131E[C005]              	adc	bx,[DIRSEC+2]
 24997 00003F2C 891E[0706]              	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],bx
 24998                                  
 24999 00003F30 8B1E[BC05]              	MOV	BX,[CLUSNUM]
 25000 00003F34 891E[DC05]              	MOV	[NXTCLUSNUM],BX
 25001 00003F38 E319                    	JCXZ	FIRSTCLUSTER
 25002                                  SKPCLLP:
 25003 00003F3A E8D41F                  	call	UNPACK
 25004 00003F3D 72BF                    	jc	short get_io_sft_retn
 25005 00003F3F 87DF                    	XCHG	BX,DI
 25006 00003F41 E8B61F                  	call	IsEOF			; test for eof based on fat size
 25007 00003F44 7302                    	JAE	short HAVESKIPPED
 25008 00003F46 E2F2                    	LOOP	SKPCLLP
 25009                                  HAVESKIPPED:
 25010 00003F48 891E[DC05]              	MOV	[NXTCLUSNUM],BX
 25011 00003F4C 89FA                    	MOV	DX,DI
 25012 00003F4E 88E3                    	MOV	BL,AH
 25013 00003F50 E86718                  	call	FIGREC
 25014                                  
 25015                                  	;entry	FIRSTCLUSTER
 25016

 25019                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h

 25021                                  	;XOR	AL,AL ; *	; Indicate pre-read

 25096                                  ;Break	<DREAD -- DO A DISK READ>
 25097                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25098                                  ;
 25099                                  ; Procedure Name : DREAD
 25100                                  ;
 25101                                  ; Inputs:
 25102                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25103                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25104                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	      (LOW)
 25105                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25106                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25107                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case call to HARDERR needed
 25108                                  ; Function:
 25109                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk read. If BIOS reports
 25110                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 25111                                  ; Outputs:
 25112                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILED to INT 24)
 25113                                  ; DS,ES:BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 25114                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25115                                  
 25116                                  	;entry	DREAD
 25117                                  DREAD:
 25118 00003F91 E84D00                  	call	DSKREAD
 25119 00003F94 74CE                    	jz	short dirread_retn	; Carry clear
 25120                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25121 00003F96 36C606[7505]00          	MOV	BYTE [SS:READOP],0
 25122 00003F9C E89A00                  	call	HARDERRRW
 25123 00003F9F 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1			; Check for retry
 25124 00003FA1 74EE                    	JZ	short DREAD
 25125 00003FA3 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3			; Check for FAIL
 25126 00003FA5 F8                      	CLC
 25127 00003FA6 7501                    	JNZ	short NO_CAR		; Ignore
 25128 00003FA8 F9                      	STC
 25129                                  NO_CAR:
 25130 00003FA9 C3                      	retn
 25131                                  RET41P: 
 25132 00003FAA 5A                      	POP	DX
 25133 00003FAB C3                      	retn

 25144                                  ;	ES:DI -> SFT
 25145                                  ; Function:

 25156                                  CHECK_WRITE_LOCK:
 25157                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25158                                  	;test	byte [es:di+4],8
 25159 00003FAC 26F6450408              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr],attr_volume_id ;volume id

 25165                                  	;jz	short write_cont
 25166                                  	;jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25167                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25168 00003FB1 7403                    	JZ	short write_cont
 25169                                  	;call	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25170                                  	;retn
 25171                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25172 00003FB3 E9BA01                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25173                                  
 25174                                  write_cont:				;
 25175 00003FB6 51                      	PUSH	CX			;save reg
 25176 00003FB7 09C9                    	OR	CX,CX			;
 25177 00003FB9 7501                    	JNZ	short Not_Truncate	;
 25178 00003FBB 49                      	dec	cx			;(cx) = -1; check for lock on whole file
 25179                                  Not_Truncate:				;
 25180 00003FBC B080                    	MOV	AL,80H			;check write access
 25181 00003FBE E8483D                  	call	LOCK_CHECK		;check lock
 25182 00003FC1 59                      	POP	CX			;restore reg
 25183 00003FC2 7305                    	JNC	short WRITE_OK		;lock ok
 25184 00003FC4 E85F01                  	call	WRITE_LOCK_VIOLATION	;issue I24
 25185 00003FC7 73ED                    	JNC	short write_cont	;retry
 25186                                  WRITE_OK:				;

 25235                                  ;	TITLE	DISK2 - Disk utility routines
 25236                                  ;	NAME	Disk2
 25237                                  
 25238                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs
 25239                                  ;
 25240                                  ;	DskRead
 25241                                  ;	DWRITE
 25242                                  ;	DSKWRITE

 25255                                  ;	Revision history:
 25256                                  ;
 25257                                  ;		AN000 version 4.00 Jan. 1988
 25258                                  ;		M039 DB 10/17/90 - Disk read/write optimization
 25259                                  
 25260                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25261                                  ; DOSCODE:7699h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25262                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25263                                  ; DOSCODE:7685h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25264                                  
 25265                                  ;Break	<DSKREAD -- PHYSICAL DISK READ>
 25266                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25267                                  ;
 25268                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKREAD
 25269                                  ;
 25270                                  ; Inputs:
 25271                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25272                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25273                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25274                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25275                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25276                                  ; Function:
 25277                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25278                                  ; Outputs:
 25279                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25280                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25281                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25282                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25283                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25284                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25285                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25286                                  
 25287                                  DSKREAD:
 25288 00003FE1 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25289                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25290 00003FE2 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25291                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25292 00003FE6 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25293 00003FEA 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25294 00003FEB 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25295 00003FEC E8CB10                  	call	SETREAD
 25296 00003FEF EB27                    	JMP	short DODSKOP
 25297                                  
 25298                                  ;Break	<DWRITE -- SEE ABOUT WRITING>
 25299                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25300                                  ;
 25301                                  ; Procedure Name : DWRITE
 25302                                  ;
 25303                                  ; Inputs:
 25304                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25305                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25306                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25307                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25308                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25309                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case HARDERR called
 25310                                  ; Function:
 25311                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk write. If BIOS reports
 25312                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 25313                                  ; Output:
 25314                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently, user FAILed to I 24)
 25315                                  ; BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 25316                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25317                                  
 25318                                  	;entry	DWRITE
 25319                                  DWRITE:
 25320 00003FF1 E81600                  	CALL	DSKWRITE
 25321 00003FF4 7413                    	jz	short dw_ret_label	; Carry clear (retz)
 25322                                  
 25323                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25324 00003FF6 36C606[7505]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:READOP],1
 25325 00003FFC E83A00                  	call	HARDERRRW
 25326 00003FFF 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1		; Check for retry
 25327 00004001 74EE                    	JZ	short DWRITE
 25328 00004003 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3		; Check for FAIL
 25329 00004005 F8                      	CLC
 25330 00004006 7501                    	JNZ	short NO_CAR2 	; Ignore
 25331 00004008 F9                      	STC
 25332                                  NO_CAR2:
 25333                                  dw_ret_label:
 25334 00004009 C3                      	retn
 25335                                  
 25336                                  ;Break	<DSKWRITE -- PHYSICAL DISK WRITE>
 25337                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25338                                  ;
 25339                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKWRITE
 25340                                  ;
 25341                                  ; Inputs:
 25342                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25343                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25344                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25345                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25346                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25347                                  ; Function:
 25348                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25349                                  ; Outputs:
 25350                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25351                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25352                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25353                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25354                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25355                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25356                                  ;
 25357                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25358                                  
 25359                                  	;entry	DSKWRITE
 25360                                  DSKWRITE:
 25361 0000400A 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25362                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25363 0000400B 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25364                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25365 0000400F 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25366 00004013 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25367 00004014 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25368 00004015 E8D510                  	call	SETWRITE
 25369                                  DODSKOP:
 25370 00004018 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS		; Save DS
 25371 0000401A 1F                      	POP	DS		; DS:BP points to DPB
 25372 0000401B 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 25373                                  
 25374                                  	;lds	si,[ds:bp+13h] ; 04/05/2019
 25375 0000401C 3EC57613                	LDS	SI,[ds:BP+DPB.DRIVER_ADDR] ; 07/09/2018
 25376 00004020 E81310                  	call	DEVIOCALL2
 25377                                  
 25378 00004023 8ED9                    	MOV	DS,CX		; Restore DS
 25379 00004025 07                      	POP	ES		; Restore ES
 25380 00004026 5B                      	POP	BX
 25381                                  
 25382                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25383 00004027 368B0E[6C03]            	MOV	CX,[SS:CALLSCNT] ; Number of sectors transferred
 25384 0000402C 5F                      	POP	DI
 25385 0000402D 29F9                    	SUB	CX,DI
 25386 0000402F F7D9                    	NEG	CX		; Number of sectors not transferred
 25387                                  
 25388                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25389 00004031 36A1[5D03]              	MOV	AX,[SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 25390                                  	;test	ax,8000h
 25391                                  	; 17/12/2022
 25392                                  	;test	ah,80h
 25393 00004035 F6C480                  	test	ah,(STERR>>8)
 25394                                  	;test	AX,STERR
 25395 00004038 C3                      	retn
 25396                                  
 25397                                  ;Break	<HardErrRW - map extended errors and call harderr>
 25398                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25399                                  ;
 25400                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErrRW
 25401                                  ;
 25402                                  ; Inputs:
 25403                                  ;	AX is error code from read or write
 25404                                  ;	Other registers set as per HARDERR
 25405                                  ; Function:
 25406                                  ;	Checks the error code for special extended
 25407                                  ;	errors and maps them if needed. Then invokes
 25408                                  ;	Harderr
 25409                                  ; Outputs:
 25410                                  ;	Of HARDERR
 25411                                  ; AX may be modified prior to call to HARDERR.
 25412                                  ; No other registers altered.
 25413                                  ;
 25414                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25415

 25419 00004039 3C0F                    	CMP	AL,error_I24_wrong_disk
 25420 0000403B 7512                    	JNZ	short DO_ERR			; Nothing to do
 25421

 25423                                  	;push	ds
 25424                                  	;push	si
 25425                                  	;lds	si,[ss:CALLVIDRW]

 25427                                  	;mov	[ss:EXTERRPT], si
 25428                                  	;pop	si
 25429                                  	;pop	ds
 25430                                  
 25431                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25432 0000403D 50                      	push	ax
 25433 0000403E 36A1[7003]              	mov	ax,[SS:CALLVIDRW]		; get ptr lo  ;smr;SS Override
 25434 00004042 36A3[2803]              	mov	[ss:EXTERRPT],ax		; set ext err ptr lo
 25435 00004046 36A1[7203]              	mov	ax,[SS:CALLVIDRW+2]		; get ptr hi from dev
 25436 0000404A 36A3[2A03]              	mov	[ss:EXTERRPT+2],ax		; set ext err ptr hi
 25437 0000404E 58                      	pop	ax
 25438                                  DO_ERR:
 25439                                  	;;call	HARDERR
 25440                                  	;;retn

 25445                                  	;call	HARDERR

 25450                                  ;Break	<SETUP -- SETUP A DISK READ OR WRITE FROM USER>
 25451                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25452                                  ;
 25453                                  ; Procedure Name : SETUP
 25454                                  ;
 25455                                  ; Inputs:
 25456                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT (value also in THISSFT)
 25457                                  ;	DMAAdd contains transfer address
 25458                                  ;	CX = Byte count
 25459                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25460                                  ;   WARNING Stack must be clean, two ret addrs on stack, 1st of caller,
 25461                                  ;		2nd of caller of caller.
 25462                                  ; Outputs:
 25463                                  ;	    CX = byte count
 25464                                  ;	    [THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters if file
 25465                                  ;		      = Pointer to device header if device or NET
 25466                                  ;	    ES:DI Points to SFT
 25467                                  ;	    [NEXTADD] = Displacement of disk transfer within segment
 25468                                  ;	    [TRANS] = 0 (No transfers yet)
 25469                                  ;	    BytPos = Byte position in file
 25470                                  ;
 25471                                  ;	The following fields are relevant to local files (not devices) only:
 25472                                  ;
 25473                                  ;	    SecPos = Position of first sector (local files only)
 25474                                  ;	    [BYTSECPOS] = Byte position in first sector (local files only)
 25475                                  ;	    [CLUSNUM] = First cluster (local files only)
 25476                                  ;	    [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector within first cluster (local files only)
 25477                                  ;	    [THISDRV] = Physical unit number (local files only)
 25478                                  ;
 25479                                  ;      RETURNS ONE LEVEL UP WITH:
 25480                                  ;	   CX = 0
 25481                                  ;	   CARRY = Clear
 25482                                  ;	IF AN ERROR IS DETECTED
 25483                                  ; All other registers destroyed
 25484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25485                                  
 25486                                  ;hkn; called from disk.asm. DS has been set up to DOSDATA.
 25487                                  
 25488                                  ; DOSCODE:770Bh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25489                                  
 25490                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25491                                  ; DOSCODE:76F7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25492                                  
 25493                                  SETUP:
 25494                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 411Bh
 25495                                  
 25496                                  	;lds 	si,[es:di+7]
 25497 00004052 26C57507                	LDS	SI,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr]
 25498                                  
 25499                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25500 00004056 368C1E[8C05]            	MOV	[SS:THISDPB+2],DS
 25501                                  
 25502                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 25503 0000405B 16                      	push	ss
 25504 0000405C 1F                      	pop	ds
 25505                                  
 25506 0000405D 8936[8A05]              	MOV	[THISDPB],SI
 25507                                  
 25508 00004061 8B1E[2C03]              	MOV	BX,[DMAADD]
 25509 00004065 891E[B805]              	MOV	[NEXTADD],BX		;Set NEXTADD to start of Xaddr
 25510 00004069 C606[7405]00            	MOV	BYTE [TRANS],0		;No transferes
 25511                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+15h]
 25512 0000406E 268B4515                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position]
 25513                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+17h]
 25514 00004072 268B5517                	MOV	DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position+2]
 25515 00004076 8916[D005]              	MOV	[BYTPOS+2],DX		;Set it
 25516 0000407A A3[CE05]                	MOV	[BYTPOS],AX
 25517                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],8080h
 25518 0000407D 26F745058080            	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet+devid_device
 25519 00004083 753C                    	JNZ	short NOSETSTUFF	;Following not done on devs or NET
 25520 00004085 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25521 00004086 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		;Point at the DPB
 25522                                  
 25523                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25524                                  	;;mov	bl,[es:bp+0]
 25525                                  	;MOV	BL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 25526                                  	; 05/12/2022
 25527 0000408A 268A5E00                	mov	bl,[es:bp]
 25528                                  	
 25529 0000408E 881E[7605]              	MOV	[THISDRV],BL		;Set THISDRV
 25530                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 25531 00004092 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 25532                                  
 25533                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3
 25534                                  	;cmp	dx,bx
 25535                                  	;jnb	short EOFERR
 25536                                  	;div	bx
 25537                                  	;mov	[SECPOS],ax
 25538                                  	;mov	[BYTSECPOS],dx
 25539                                  	;mov	dx,ax
 25540                                  	;;and	al,[es:bp+4]
 25541                                  	;AND	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 25542                                  	;mov	[SECCLUSPOS],al
 25543                                  	;mov	ax,cx
 25544                                  	;;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 25545                                  	;MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 25546                                  	;shr	dx,cl
 25547                                  	;mov	[CLUSNUM],dx
 25548                                  	;pop	es
 25549                                  	;mov	cx,ax
 25550                                  
 25551                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25552                                  
 25553                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25554                                  ;M039: Optimized this section.
 25555 00004096 51                              PUSH    CX			;SHR32 and DIV32 use CX.
 25556 00004097 E83505                  	call	DIV32			;DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem)
 25557 0000409A 8916[CC05]              	MOV	[BYTSECPOS],DX
 25558 0000409E A3[C405]                	MOV	[SECPOS],AX
 25559 000040A1 890E[C605]              	MOV	[SECPOS+2],CX
 25560 000040A5 89CA                    	MOV	DX,CX
 25561                                  
 25562 000040A7 89C3                    	MOV	BX,AX
 25563                                  	;and	bl,[es:bp+4]
 25564 000040A9 26225E04                	AND	BL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 25565 000040AD 881E[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],BL
 25566                                  
 25567 000040B1 E84205                  	call	SHR32			;(DX:AX SHR dpb_cluster_shift)
 25568 000040B4 59                      	POP	CX			;CX = byte count.
 25569 000040B5 751F                    	JNZ	short EOFERR		;cluster number above 64k
 25570                                  	;cmp	ax,[es:bp+0Dh]
 25571 000040B7 263B460D                	CMP	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER] ;>32mb  if > disk size ;AN000;
 25572 000040BB 7719                    	JA	short EOFERR		   ;>32mb  then EOF       ;AN000;
 25573                                  
 25574 000040BD A3[BC05]                	MOV	[CLUSNUM],AX
 25575 000040C0 07                      	POP	ES			; ES:DI point to SFT
 25576                                  ;M039
 25577                                  
 25578                                  NOSETSTUFF:
 25579 000040C1 89C8                    	MOV	AX,CX		; AX = Byte count.
 25580 000040C3 0306[2C03]              	ADD	AX,[DMAADD]	; See if it will fit in one segment
 25581 000040C7 730C                    	JNC	short setup_OK	; Must be less than 64
 25582 000040C9 A1[2C03]                	MOV	AX,[DMAADD]
 25583 000040CC F7D8                    	NEG	AX		; Amount of room left in segment (know
 25584                                  				;    less than 64K since max value of CX
 25585                                  				;    is FFFF).
 25586 000040CE 7501                    	JNZ	short NoDec
 25587 000040D0 48                      	DEC	AX
 25588                                  NoDec:
 25589 000040D1 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX		; Can do this much
 25590 000040D3 E304                    	JCXZ	NOROOM		; Silly user gave Xaddr of FFFF in segment
 25591                                  setup_OK:
 25592 000040D5 C3                      	retn
 25593                                  
 25594                                  EOFERR:

 25596 000040D7 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX		; No bytes read
 25597                                  ;;;;;;;;;;; 7/18/86
 25598                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 25599                                  	;MOV	BYTE [DISK_FULL],1 ; set disk full flag
 25600                                  ;;;;;;;;;;;
 25601                                  NOROOM:
