 25603 000040DA F8                      	CLC
 25604 000040DB C3                      	retn			; RETURN TO CALLER OF CALLER
 25605                                  
 25606                                  ;Break	<BREAKDOWN -- CUT A USER READ OR WRITE INTO PIECES>
 25607                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25608                                  ;
 25609                                  ; Procedure Name : BREAKDOWN
 25610                                  ;
 25611                                  ; Inputs:
 25612                                  ;	CX = Length of disk transfer in bytes
 25613                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25614                                  ;	[BYTSECPOS] = Byte position within first sector
 25615                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25616                                  ; Outputs:
 25617                                  ;	[BYTCNT1] = Bytes to transfer in first sector
 25618                                  ;	[SECCNT] = No. of whole sectors to transfer
 25619                                  ;	[BYTCNT2] = Bytes to transfer in last sector
 25620                                  ; AX, BX, DX destroyed. No other registers affected.
 25621                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25622                                  
 25623                                  BREAKDOWN:
 25624 000040DC A1[CC05]                	MOV	AX,[BYTSECPOS]
 25625 000040DF 89CB                    	MOV	BX,CX
 25626 000040E1 09C0                    	OR	AX,AX
 25627 000040E3 740E                    	JZ	short SAVFIR	; Partial first sector?
 25628                                  	;sub	ax,[es:bp+2]
 25629 000040E5 262B4602                	SUB	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 25630 000040E9 F7D8                    	NEG	AX		; Max number of bytes left in first sector
 25631 000040EB 29C3                    	SUB	BX,AX		; Subtract from total length
 25632 000040ED 7304                    	JAE	short SAVFIR
 25633 000040EF 01D8                    	ADD	AX,BX		; Don't use all of the rest of the sector
 25634 000040F1 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX		; And no bytes are left
 25635                                  SAVFIR:
 25636 000040F3 A3[D205]                	MOV	[BYTCNT1],AX
 25637 000040F6 89D8                    	MOV	AX,BX
 25638 000040F8 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 25639                                  	;div	word [ES:BP+2]
 25640 000040FA 26F77602                	DIV	word [ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; How many whole sectors?
 25641 000040FE A3[D605]                	MOV	[SECCNT],AX
 25642 00004101 8916[D405]              	MOV	[BYTCNT2],DX	; Bytes remaining for last sector
 25643                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 25644                                  	;OR	DX,[BYTCNT1]	; SMR ONESECTORFIX BUGBUG
 25645                                  	;retnz			; NOT (BYTCNT1 = BYTCNT2 = 0)
 25646                                  	;CMP	AX,1
 25647                                  	;retnz
 25648                                  	;MOV	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Buffer EXACT one sector I/O
 25649                                  	;MOV	[BYTCNT2],AX
 25650                                  	;MOV	[SECCNT],DX	; DX = 0
 25651                                  _RET45:
 25652 00004105 C3                      	retn
 25653                                  
 25654                                  ; DOSCODE:77BFh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25655                                  
 25656                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25657                                  ;
 25658                                  ; Procedure Name : READ_LOCK_VIOLATION
 25659                                  ;
 25660                                  ; ES:DI points to SFT. This entry used by NET_READ
 25661                                  ; Carry set if to return error (CX=0,AX=error_sharing_violation).
 25662                                  ; Else do retrys.
 25663                                  ; ES:DI,DS,CX preserved
 25664                                  ;
 25665                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25666                                  
 25667                                  READ_LOCK_VIOLATION:
 25668 00004106 C606[7505]00            	MOV	byte [READOP],0
 25669                                  ERR_ON_CHECK:
 25670                                  	;;test	word [es:di+2],8000h
 25671                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB
 25672                                  	;JNZ	short HARD_ERR
 25673

 26099                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 26100                                  ;Break   <DskRdBufScan -- Disk Read Buffer Scan>
 26101                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26102                                  ;
 26103                                  ; Procedure Name : DskRdBufScan
 26104                                  ;
 26105                                  ; Inputs:
 26106                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors read. (These constitute a block of
 26107                                  ;            sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 26108                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 26109                                  ;       [TEMP_VAR2]:[TEMP_VAR] = Transfer address (destination data address).
 26110                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 26111                                  ;
 26112                                  ; Function:
 26113                                  ;	The Buffer Queue is scanned: the contents of any dirty buffers are
 26114                                  ;	"read" into the transfer memory block, so that the transfer memory
 26115                                  ;	reflects the most recent data.
 26116                                  ;
 26117                                  ; Outputs:
 26118                                  ;       Transfer memory updated as required.
 26119                                  ;
 26120                                  ; Uses:
 26121                                  ;       DS,AX,BX,CX,SI,DI destroyed.
 26122                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 26123                                  ;
 26124                                  ; Notes:
 26125                                  ;       FIRST_BUFF_ADDR is set-up to contain the LAST buffer to check, rather
 26126                                  ;	than the FIRST.
 26127                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26128                                  ;M039: Created
 26129                                  
 26130                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26131                                  ; DOSCODE:78F0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26132                                  
 26133                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26134                                  ; DOSCODE:78DCh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 26135                                  
 26136                                  ;procedure DskRdBufScan,NEAR
 26137                                  ;
 26138                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 26139                                  
 26140                                  DskRdBufScan:
 26141 00004232 36833E[7100]00          	cmp	word [ss:DirtyBufferCount],0 ; Any dirty buffers?
 26142 00004238 743C                    	je	short bufx		     ; -no, skip all work.
 26143                                  
 26144 0000423A 368B1E[0706]            	mov     bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 26145 0000423F 89DE                    	mov     si,bx
 26146 00004241 01D1                    	add     cx,dx
 26147 00004243 83D600                  	adc     si,0
 26148                                  
 26149 00004246 E88F20                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> 1st buf in queue.
 26150                                  	;mov	ax,[di+2]
 26151 00004249 8B4502                  	mov     ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]
 26152 0000424C 36A3[A512]              	mov     [ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],ax
 26153                                  		
 26154                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26155                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 26156                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 26157                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26158 00004250 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 26159                                  
 26160                                  ;       BX:DX = Extent start.
 26161                                  ;       SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 26162                                  ;          AL = Drive #.
 26163                                  ;       DS:DI-> 1st buffer in queue.
 26164                                  ;[FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] = Address offset of last buffer in queue.
 26165                                  
 26166                                  bufq:	
 26167                                  	;cmp	al,[di+4]
 26168 00004254 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 26169 00004257 7514                    	jne	short bufq1        	;  -no, jump.
 26170                                  
 26171                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26172                                  ;       ja	short bufq1		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 26173                                  
 26174                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 26175 00004259 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26176 0000425C 7503                    	jne	short bufq01
 26177                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]

 26615                                  
 26616                                  ;M039
 26617                                  ;       DI = Next physical cluster.
 26618                                  ;       AX = # sectors remaining.
 26619                                  ;       [DMAADD+2]:BX = transfer address (source data address).
 26620                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors to write. (These constitute a block of
 26621                                  ;	     sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 26622                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 26623                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 26624                                  ;
 26625                                  ;       Purge the Buffer Queue and the Secondary Cache of any buffers which
 26626                                  ;	are in Extent; they are being over-written.
 26627                                  
 26628 00004417 57                      	push    di

 26973                                  
 26974                                  ;Break   <DskWrtBufPurge -- Disk Write Buffer Purge>
 26975                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26976                                  ;
 26977                                  ; Procedure Name : DskWrtBufPurge
 26978                                  ;
 26979                                  ; Inputs:
 26980                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors to write. (These constitute a block of
 26981                                  ;	     sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 26982                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 26983                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 26984                                  ;
 26985                                  ; Function:
 26986                                  ;       Purge the Buffer Queue and the Secondary Cache of any buffers which
 26987                                  ;	are in Extent; they are being over-written.
 26988                                  ;
 26989                                  ; Outputs:
 26990                                  ;       (Same as Input.)
 26991                                  ; Uses:
 26992                                  ;       All registers except DS,AX,SI,DI preserved.
 26993                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 26994                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26995                                  ;M039: Created
 26996                                  
 26997                                  ;procedure   DskWrtBufPurge,NEAR
 26998                                  ;
 26999                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 27000                                  
 27001                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27002                                  ; DOSCODE:7C0Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27003                                  
 27004                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27005                                  ; DOSCODE:7BD4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27006                                  
 27007                                  DskWrtBufPurge:
 27008                                  	;SaveReg <bx,cx>
 27009 00004549 53                      	push	bx
 27010 0000454A 51                      	push	cx
 27011                                  
 27012 0000454B 368B1E[0706]            	mov	bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	;BX:DX = Extent start (sector #).
 27013 00004550 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 27014 00004552 01D1                    	add	cx,dx
 27015 00004554 83D600                  	adc	si,0                    ;SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27016                                  
 27017                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27018                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 27019                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 27020                                  	; 15/12/2022
 27021 00004557 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 27022                                  
 27023                                  ;	BX:DX = Extent start.
 27024                                  ;	SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27025                                  ;	AL = Drive #
 27026                                  
 27027 0000455B 36833E[7700]00          	cmp	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0 ;Secondary cache in-use?
 27028 00004561 7431                    	je	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27029                                  
 27030                                  ;	If any of the sectors to be written are in the secondary cache (SC),
 27031                                  ;	invalidate the entire SC. (This is an optimization; we really only
 27032                                  ;	need to invalidate those sectors which intersect, but that's slower.)
 27033                                  
 27034 00004563 363A06[9C12]            	cmp	al,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	;Same drive?
 27035 00004568 752A                    	jne	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27036                                  
 27037 0000456A 50                      	push    ax
 27038 0000456B 36A1[010E]              	mov     ax,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]
 27039 0000456F 368B3E[030E]            	mov     di,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]	;DI:AX = SC start.
 27040                                  
 27041                                  	;Cmp32	si,cx,di,ax		;Extent end < SC start?
 27042                                  	;jbe	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27043                                  
 27044 00004574 39FE                    	cmp	si,di
 27045 00004576 7502                    	jne	short sc01
 27046 00004578 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 27047                                  sc01: 
 27048 0000457A 7617                    	jbe	short sc5	
 27049                                  
 27050 0000457C 360306[7700]            	add	ax,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]
 27051 00004581 83D700                  	adc	di,0                    ;DI:AX = SC end + 1.
 27052                                  	
 27053                                  	;Cmp32	bx,dx,di,ax             ;Extent start > SC end?
 27054                                  	;jae	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27055                                  
 27056 00004584 39FB                    	cmp	bx,di
 27057 00004586 7502                    	jne	short sc02
 27058 00004588 39C2                    	cmp	dx,ax
 27059                                  sc02:
 27060 0000458A 7307                    	jnb	short sc5
 27061                                  
 27062 0000458C 36C706[050E]0000        	mov	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	;Extent intersects SC: invalidate SC.
 27063                                  sc5:	
 27064 00004593 58                      	pop     ax
 27065                                  
 27066                                  ;	Free any buffered sectors which are in Extent; they are being over-
 27067                                  ;	written.
 27068                                  
 27069                                  nosc:	
 27070 00004594 E8411D                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> first buffer in queue.
 27071                                  
 27072                                  _bufq:	
 27073                                  	;cmpo	al,[di+4]
 27074 00004597 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 27075 0000459A 7527                    	jne	short bufq5		; -no, jump.
 27076                                  
 27077                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27078                                  ;       ja	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 27079                                  
 27080                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 27081 0000459C 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27082 0000459F 7503                    	jne	short bufq04
 27083                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 27084 000045A1 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27085                                  bufq04:
 27086 000045A4 771D                    	ja	short bufq5
 27087                                  
 27088                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27089                                  ;       jbe	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent end < buffer sector.
 27090                                  
 27091                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 27092 000045A6 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27093 000045A9 7503                    	jne	short bufq05
 27094                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 27095 000045AB 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27096                                  bufq05:
 27097 000045AE 7613                    	jbe	short bufq5
 27098                                  
 27099                                  ;	Buffer's sector is in Extent, so free it; it is being over-written.
 27100                                  
 27101                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 27102 000045B0 F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 27103 000045B4 7403                    	jz	short bufq4		; -no, jump.
 27104 000045B6 E8AC1F                  	call	DEC_DIRTY_COUNT		; -yes, decrement dirty count.
 27105                                  bufq4:
 27106                                  	;mov	word [di+4],20FFh
 27107 000045B9 C74504FF20              	mov     word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID],((buf_visit<<8)|0FFh)
 27108                                  
 27109 000045BE E8291D                  	call	SCANPLACE
 27110 000045C1 EB02                    	jmp     short bufq6
 27111                                  bufq5: 
 27112 000045C3 8B3D                    	mov     di,[di]
 27113                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next]
 27114                                  bufq6: 
 27115 000045C5 363B3E[A512]            	cmp	di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 27116 000045CA 75CB                    	jne	short _bufq		; --no, go do next buffer.
 27117                                  	
 27118                                  	;RestoreReg <cx,bx>
 27119 000045CC 59                      	pop	cx
 27120 000045CD 5B                      	pop	bx
 27121 000045CE C3                      	retn
 27122                                  
 27123                                  ;EndProc DskWrtBufPurge
 27124                                  
 27125                                  ;Break   <DIV32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT DIVIDE>
 27126                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27127                                  ;
 27128                                  ; Procedure Name : DIV32
 27129                                  ;
 27130                                  ; Inputs:
 27131                                  ;       DX:AX = 32 bit dividend   BX= divisor
 27132                                  ; Function:
 27133                                  ;       Perform 32 bit division:  DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem.)
 27134                                  ; Outputs:
 27135                                  ;       CX:AX = quotient , DX= remainder
 27136                                  ; Uses:
 27137                                  ;       All registers except AX,CX,DX preserved.
 27138                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27139                                  ;M039: DIV32 optimized for divisor of 512 (common sector size).
 27140                                  
 27141                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27142                                  ; DOSCODE:7C94h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27143                                  
 27144                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27145                                  ; DOSCODE:7C5Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27146                                  
 27147                                  DIV32:
 27148 000045CF 81FB0002                	cmp	bx,512
 27149 000045D3 7515                    	jne	short div5
 27150                                  
 27151 000045D5 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 27152 000045D7 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax           ; CX:AX = Dividend
 27153 000045D9 81E2FF01                	and	dx,(512-1)      ; DX = Remainder
 27154 000045DD 88E0                    	mov	al,ah
 27155 000045DF 88CC                    	mov	ah,cl
 27156 000045E1 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 27157 000045E3 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch
 27158 000045E5 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 27159 000045E7 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 27160 000045E9 C3                      	retn
 27161                                  div5:	
 27162 000045EA 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 27163 000045EC 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 27164 000045EE 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 27165 000045F0 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; 0:AX/BX
 27166 000045F2 91                      	xchg	cx,ax
 27167 000045F3 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; DX:AX/BX
 27168 000045F5 C3                      	retn
 27169                                  
 27170                                  ;Break   <SHR32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT SHIFT RIGHT>
 27171                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27172                                  ;
 27173                                  ; Procedure Name : SHR32
 27174                                  ;
 27175                                  ; Inputs:
 27176                                  ;	DX:AX = 32 bit sector number
 27177                                  ; Function:
 27178                                  ;       Perform 32 bit shift right
 27179                                  ; Outputs:
 27180                                  ;	AX = cluster number
 27181                                  ;	ZF = 1 if no error
 27182                                  ;	   = 0 if error (cluster number > 64k)
 27183                                  ; Uses:
 27184                                  ;       DX,CX
 27185                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27186                                  ; M017	- SHR32 rewritten for better performance
 27187                                  ; M039	- Additional optimization
 27188                                  
 27189                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27190                                  ; DOSCODE:7CBBh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27191                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27192                                  ; DOSCODE:7C81h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27193                                  
 27194                                  SHR32:
 27195                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 27196 000045F6 268A4E05                	mov	cl,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 27197 000045FA 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch	    ;ZF=1
 27198 000045FC E306                    	jcxz	norota
 27199                                  
 27200                                  rotashft2:
 27201 000045FE D1EA                    	shr	dx,1	    ;ZF reflects state of DX.
 27202 00004600 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1	    ;ZF not affected.
 27203 00004602 E2FA                    	loop	rotashft2
 27204                                  norota:
 27205 00004604 C3                      	retn
 27206                                  
 27207                                  ;============================================================================
 27208                                  ; DIR.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 27209                                  ;============================================================================
 27210                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27211                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 27212                                  
 27213                                  ;	TITLE	DIR - Directory and path cracking
 27214                                  ;	NAME	Dir
 27215                                  
 27216                                  ;Break	<FINDENTRY -- LOOK FOR AN ENTRY>
 27217                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27218                                  ;
 27219                                  ; Procedure Name : FINDENTRY,SEARCH
 27220                                  ;
 27221                                  ; Inputs:
 27222                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 27223                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 27224                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Starting directory sector number
 27225                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster of directory
 27226                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 27227                                  ;	[NAME1] = Name to look for
 27228                                  ; Function:
 27229                                  ;	Find file name in disk directory.
 27230                                  ;	"?" matches any character.
 27231                                  ; Outputs:
 27232                                  ;	Carry set if name not found
 27233                                  ;	ELSE
 27234                                  ;	Zero set if attributes match (always except when creating)
 27235                                  ;	AH = Device ID (bit 7 set if not disk)
 27236                                  ;	[THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters
 27237                                  ;	DS = DOSGROUP
 27238                                  ;	ES = DOSGROUP
 27239                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer into directory buffer
 27240                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI = Pointer to First Cluster field in directory entry
 27241                                  ;	[CURBUF] has directory record with match
 27242                                  ;	[NAME1] has file name
 27243                                  ;	[LASTENT] is entry number of the entry
 27244                                  ; All other registers destroyed.
 27245                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27246                                  
 27247                                  ;hkn; called from rename.asm and dir2.asm. DS must be already set up at
 27248                                  ;hkn; this point.
 27249                                  
 27250                                  SEARCH:
 27251                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27252                                  	; DOSCODE:7C90h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27253                                  
 27254                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27255                                  	; DOSCODE:7CCA (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27256                                  
 27257                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27258                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 45B3h 
 27259                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 27260                                  
 27261                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27262                                  
 27263                                  	;entry	FindEntry
 27264                                  FINDENTRY:
 27265 00004605 E87005                  	call	STARTSRCH
 27266 00004608 A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 27267                                  	;and	al,9Eh
 27268 0000460B 24DE                    	AND	AL,~attr_ignore		; Ignore useless bits
 27269                                  	;cmp	al,8
 27270 0000460D 3C08                    	CMP	AL,attr_volume_id	; Looking for vol ID only ?
 27271 0000460F 7503                    	JNZ	short NOTVOLSRCH	; No
 27272 00004611 E8EB01                  	CALL	SETROOTSRCH		; Yes force search of root
 27273                                  NOTVOLSRCH:
 27274 00004614 E8FA00                  	CALL	GETENTRY
 27275                                  	;JNC	short SRCH
 27276                                  	;JMP	SETESRET
 27277                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27278 00004617 723F                    	jc	short SETESRET
 27279                                  
 27280                                  	;entry	Srch
 27281                                  SRCH:
 27282 00004619 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 27283 0000461A 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 27284                                  
 27285                                  ;	(DS:BX) = directory entry address
 27286                                  
 27287 0000461E 8A27                    	mov	ah,[BX]
 27288                                  	;MOV	AH,[BX+dir_entry.dir_name] ; mov ah,[bx+0]
 27289 00004620 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; End of directory?
 27290 00004622 7437                    	JZ	short FREE
 27291                                  
 27292                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27293 00004624 363A26[7F05]            	CMP	AH,[SS:DELALL]		; Free entry?
 27294 00004629 7430                    	JZ	short FREE
 27295                                  	;test	byte [bx+0Bh],8
 27296 0000462B F6470B08                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_volume_id
 27297                                  					; Volume ID file?
 27298 0000462F 7405                    	JZ	short CHKFNAM 		; NO
 27299                                  
 27300                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27301 00004631 36FE06[7B05]            	INC	BYTE [SS:VOLID]
 27302                                  CHKFNAM:
 27303                                  ;	Context ES
 27304 00004636 8CD6                    	MOV	SI,SS
 27305 00004638 8EC6                    	MOV	ES,SI
 27306 0000463A 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 27307                                  
 27308                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 27309 0000463C BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 27310                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 27311                                  
 27312                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 27313                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SS:NAME1],0E5H	; special char check
 27314                                  	;JNZ	short NO_E5
 27315                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:NAME1],05H
 27316                                  	; 22/09/2023
 27317 0000463F 26803DE5                	cmp	byte [es:di],0E5h
 27318 00004643 7504                    	jnz	short NO_E5
 27319 00004645 26C60505                	mov	byte [es:di],05h
 27320                                  NO_E5:
 27321                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 27322 00004649 E86100                  	CALL	MetaCompare
 27323 0000464C 7429                    	JZ	short FOUND
 27324 0000464E 1F                      	POP	DS
 27325                                  
 27326                                  	;entry	NEXTENT
 27327                                  NEXTENT:
 27328 0000464F C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 27329 00004653 E86600                  	CALL	NEXTENTRY
 27330 00004656 73C1                    	JNC	short SRCH
 27331                                  	;JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 27332                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27333                                  SETESRET:
 27334 00004658 16                      	PUSH	SS
 27335 00004659 07                      	POP	ES
 27336 0000465A C3                      	retn
 27337                                  FREE:
 27338 0000465B 1F                      	POP	DS
 27339 0000465C 8B0E[4803]              	MOV	CX,[LASTENT]
 27340 00004660 3B0E[D805]              	CMP	CX,[ENTFREE]
 27341 00004664 7304                    	JAE	short TSTALL
 27342 00004666 890E[D805]              	MOV	[ENTFREE],CX
 27343                                  TSTALL:
 27344 0000466A 3A26[7F05]              	CMP	AH,[DELALL]		; At end of directory?
 27345                                  NEXTENTJ:
 27346 0000466E 74DF                    	je	short NEXTENT 		; No - continue search
 27347 00004670 890E[DA05]              	MOV	[ENTLAST],CX
 27348 00004674 F9                      	STC
 27349 00004675 EBE1                    	JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 27350                                  
 27351                                  FOUND:
 27352                                  ; We have a file with a matching name. We must now consider the attributes:
 27353                                  ; ATTRIB	Action
 27354                                  ; ------	------
 27355                                  ; Volume_ID	Is Volume_ID in test?
 27356                                  ; Otherwise	If no create then Is ATTRIB+extra superset of test?
 27357                                  ;		If create then Is ATTRIB equal to test?
 27358                                  
 27359 00004677 8A2C                    	MOV	CH,[SI] 		; Attributes of file
 27360 00004679 1F                      	POP	DS
 27361 0000467A 8A26[6B05]              	MOV	AH,[ATTRIB]		; Attributes of search
 27362                                  	;and	ah,9Eh
 27363 0000467E 80E4DE                  	AND	AH,~attr_ignore
 27364                                  	;lea	si,[si+15]
 27365 00004681 8D740F                  	LEA	SI,[SI+dir_entry.dir_first-dir_entry.dir_attr]
 27366                                  					; point to first cluster field
 27367                                  	;test	ch,8
 27368 00004684 F6C508                  	TEST	CH,attr_volume_id	; Volume ID file?
 27369 00004687 7409                    	JZ	short check_one_volume_id ; Nope check other attributes
 27370                                  	;test	ah,8
 27371 00004689 F6C408                  	TEST	AH,attr_volume_id	; Can we find Volume ID?
 27372                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Nope, (not even $FCB_CREATE)
 27373                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27374 0000468C 74C1                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 27375                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27376                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 27377 0000468E 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; Set zero flag for $FCB_CREATE
 27378 00004690 EB11                    	JMP	SHORT RETFF		; Found Volume ID
 27379                                  check_one_volume_id:
 27380                                  	;CMP	ah,8
 27381 00004692 80FC08                  	CMP	AH,attr_volume_id	; Looking only for Volume ID?
 27382                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Yes, continue search
 27383                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27384 00004695 74B8                    	je	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 27385                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 27386 00004697 E8F204                  	CALL	MatchAttributes
 27387 0000469A 7407                    	JZ	SHORT RETFF
 27388 0000469C F606[7E05]FF            	TEST	BYTE [CREATING],-1	; Pass back mismatch if creating
 27389                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27390                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Otherwise continue searching
 27391 000046A1 74AC                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 27392                                  RETFF:
 27393 000046A3 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 27394                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27395                                  	;MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]  ; mov ah,[es:bp+0]
 27396                                  	; 15/12/2022
 27397 000046A7 268A6600                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP]
 27398                                  ;SETESRET:
 27399                                  	;PUSH	SS
 27400                                  	;POP	ES
 27401                                  	;retn
 27402                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27403 000046AB EBAB                    	jmp	short SETESRET
 27404                                  
 27405                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27406                                  ;
 27407                                  ; Procedure Name : MetaCompare
 27408                                  ;
 27409                                  ; Inputs:
 27410                                  ;	DS:SI -> 11 character FCB style name NO '?'
 27411                                  ;	    Typically this is a directory entry. It MUST be in upper case
 27412                                  ;	ES:DI -> 11 character FCB style name with possible '?'
 27413                                  ;	    Typically this is a FCB or SFT. It MUST be in upper case
 27414                                  ; Function:
 27415                                  ;	Compare FCB style names allowing for ? match to any char
 27416                                  ; Outputs:
 27417                                  ;	Zero if match else NZ
 27418                                  ; Destroys CX,SI,DI all others preserved
 27419                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27420                                  
 27421                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27422                                  	; DOSCODE:7D3Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27423                                  
 27424                                  MetaCompare:
 27425 000046AD B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 27426                                  WILDCRD:
 27427 000046B0 F3A6                    	REPE	CMPSB
 27428 000046B2 7407                    	JZ	short MetaRet 		; most of the time we will fail.
 27429                                  CHECK_META:
 27430 000046B4 26807DFF3F              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1],"?"
 27431 000046B9 74F5                    	JZ	short WILDCRD
 27432                                  MetaRet:
 27433 000046BB C3                       	retn				; Zero set, Match
 27434                                  
 27435                                  ;Break	<NEXTENTRY -- STEP THROUGH DIRECTORY>
 27436                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27437                                  ;
 27438                                  ; Procedure Name : NEXTENTRY
 27439                                  ;
 27440                                  ; Inputs:
 27441                                  ;	Same as outputs of GETENTRY, above
 27442                                  ; Function:
 27443                                  ;	Update BX, and [LASTENT] for next directory entry.
 27444                                  ;	Carry set if no more.
 27445                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27446                                  
 27447                                  NEXTENTRY:
 27448                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27449                                  	; DOSCODE:7D4Eh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27450                                  
 27451                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27452                                  	; DOSCODE:7D88h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27453                                  
 27454                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27455                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 4671h 
 27456                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 27457                                  
 27458 000046BC A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 27459 000046BF 3B06[DA05]              	CMP	AX,[ENTLAST]
 27460 000046C3 7422                    	JZ	short NONE
 27461 000046C5 40                      	INC	AX
 27462                                  	;ADD	BX,32
 27463 000046C6 8D5F20                  	LEA	BX,[BX+32]
 27464 000046C9 39D3                    	CMP	BX,DX
 27465                                  	; 21/11/2022 - MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS (DOSCODE:7D5Dh)
 27466                                  	;JB	short HAVIT ; MSDOS 6.0 src (dir.asm)
 27467                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27468 000046CB 751C                    	jne	short HAVIT ; MSDOS 6.21 (DOSCODE:7D97h)
 27469 000046CD 8A1E[7305]              	MOV	BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 27470 000046D1 FEC3                    	INC	BL
 27471 000046D3 3A1E[7705]              	CMP	BL,[CLUSFAC]
 27472 000046D7 7215                    	JB	short SAMECLUS
 27473 000046D9 8B1E[DC05]              	MOV	BX,[NXTCLUSNUM]
 27474 000046DD E81A18                  	call	IsEOF
 27475 000046E0 7305                    	JAE	short NONE
 27476                                  	; 23/07/2019
 27477 000046E2 83FB02                  	CMP	BX,2
 27478                                  	;JB	short NONE
 27479                                  	;JMP	short GETENT
 27480                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27481 000046E5 732D                    	jnb	short GETENT
 27482                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27483                                  	;JB	short NONE
 27484                                  	;JMP	short GETENT
 27485                                  NONE:
 27486 000046E7 F9                      	STC
 27487 000046E8 C3                      	retn
 27488                                  HAVIT:
 27489 000046E9 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 27490 000046EC F8                      	CLC
 27491                                  nextentry_retn:
 27492 000046ED C3                      	retn
 27493                                  SAMECLUS:
 27494 000046EE 881E[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],BL
 27495 000046F2 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 27496 000046F5 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 27497 000046F6 C53E[E205]              	LDS	DI,[CURBUF]
 27498                                  	; 19/05/2019
 27499                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27500                                  	;;mov	dx,[di+8]
 27501                                  	; 23/09/2023
 27502                                  	;MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]	;AN000; >32mb
 27503                                  ;hkn; SS override

 27507                                  	
 27508                                  	;mov	dx,[di+6]
 27509 000046FD 8B5506                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]	;AN000; >32mb

 27511                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 27513                                  	;ADC	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR],0 	;AN000; >32mb

 27518                                  	;inc	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR]
 27519                                  nextexntry_fc:

 27521 00004704 368936[0706]            	mov	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],si
 27522                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 27523 00004709 1F                      	POP	DS
 27524 0000470A E846F8                  	call	FIRSTCLUSTER
 27525 0000470D 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX
 27526 0000470F EB23                    	JMP	short SETENTRY
 27527                                  
 27528                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27529                                  ;
 27530                                  ; Procedure Name : GETENTRY
 27531                                  ;
 27532                                  ; Inputs:
 27533                                  ;	[LASTENT] has directory entry
 27534                                  ;	ES:BP points to drive parameters
 27535                                  ;	[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[ENTLAST] set for DIR involved
 27536                                  ; Function:
 27537                                  ;	Locates directory entry in preparation for search
 27538                                  ;	GETENT provides entry for passing desired entry in AX
 27539                                  ; Outputs:
 27540                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer to next directory entry in CURBUF
 27541                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:DX = Pointer to first byte after end of CURBUF
 27542                                  ;	[LASTENT] = New directory entry number
 27543                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS] set via DIRREAD
 27544                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27545                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27546                                  
 27547                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27548                                  GETENTRY:
 27549                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27550 00004711 A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 27551                                  
 27552                                  	;entry	GETENT
 27553                                  GETENT:
 27554 00004714 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 27555                                  ;
 27556                                  ; Convert the entry number in AX into a byte offset from the beginning of the
 27557                                  ; directory.
 27558                                  ;
 27559 00004717 B105                    	mov	cl,5			; shift left by 5 = mult by 32
 27560 00004719 D3C0                    	rol	ax,cl			; keep hight order bits
 27561 0000471B 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax
 27562                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27563                                  	;and	ax,0FFE0h
 27564                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27565                                  	;and	ax,~(32-1)		; mask off high order bits
 27566                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27567 0000471D 24E0                    	and	al,0E0h ; ~31
 27568 0000471F 83E21F                  	and	dx,1Fh
 27569                                  	;and	dx,32-1			; mask off low order bits
 27570                                  ;
 27571                                  ; DX:AX contain the byte offset of the required directory entry from the
 27572                                  ; beginning of the directory. Convert this to a sector number. Round the
 27573                                  ; sector size down to a multiple of 32.
 27574                                  ;
 27575                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 27576 00004722 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 27577 00004726 80E3E0                  	and	bl,0E0h
 27578                                  	;AND	BL,255-31		; Must be multiple of 32
 27579 00004729 F7F3                    	DIV	BX
 27580 0000472B 89D3                    	MOV	BX,DX			; Position within sector
 27581 0000472D 53                      	PUSH	BX
 27582 0000472E E8CEF7                  	call	DIRREAD
 27583 00004731 5B                      	POP	BX
 27584                                  	;retc
 27585 00004732 72B9                    	jc	short nextentry_retn	
 27586                                  SETENTRY:
 27587 00004734 8B16[E205]              	MOV	DX,[CURBUF]
 27588                                  	;add	dx,16 ; MSDOS 3.3
 27589                                  	;add	dx,20 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 27590 00004738 83C218                  	ADD	DX,BUFINSIZ
 27591 0000473B 01D3                    	ADD	BX,DX
 27592                                  	;add	dx,[es:bp+2]
 27593 0000473D 26035602                	ADD	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; Always clears carry
 27594                                  	; 29/12/2022

 27626                                  ; Inputs:

 27630                                  ; Function:

 27644                                  	JZ	short SETROOTSRCH
