 27969                                  ;============================================================================
 27970                                  ; DIR2.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 27971                                  ;============================================================================
 27972                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27973                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 27974                                  
 27975                                  ;	TITLE	DIR2 - Directory and path cracking
 27976                                  ;	NAME	Dir2
 27977                                  
 27978                                  ;Break	<GETPATH -- PARSE A WFP>
 27979                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27980                                  ;
 27981                                  ; Procedure Name : GETPATH
 27982                                  ;
 27983                                  ; Inputs:
 27984                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:\" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 27985                                  ;		terminated; d:/ (note forward slash) indicates a real device).
 27986                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 27987                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 27988                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 27989                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 27990                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 27991                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 27992                                  ;	[THISDPB] set to DPB if disk otherwise garbage.
 27993                                  ; Function:
 27994                                  ;	Crack the path
 27995                                  ; Outputs:
 27996                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk if disk file
 27997                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Unk if char device
 27998                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 27999                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 28000                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28001                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 28002                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 28003                                  ;	   Zero set
 28004                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 28005                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 28006                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 28007                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 28008                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 28009                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 28010                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 28011                                  ;	   Zero reset
 28012                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path or attribute mismatch
 28013                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 28014                                  ;	ELSE
 28015                                  ;	   [CurBuf] = -1 if root directory
 28016                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 28017                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 28018                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points into [CURBUF] to dir_first field for entry
 28019                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 28020                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 28021                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 28022                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 28023                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 28024                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 28025                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 28026                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it.
 28027                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 28028                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 28029                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 28030                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 28031                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 28032                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 28033                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 28034                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 28035                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 28036                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28037                                  
 28038                                  ;hkn; called from delete.asm, finfo.asm, mknode.asm and rename.asm.
 28039                                  ;hkn; DS already set up at this point.
 28040                                  
 28041                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28042                                  GETPATH:
 28043                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E500h
 28044 000048E5 C706[7E05]00E5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0 ; Not Creating, not DEL *.*
 28045                                  
 28046                                  ; Same as GetPath only CREATING and DELALL already set
 28047                                  
 28048                                  	;entry	GetPathNoSet
 28049                                  GetPathNoSet:
 28050                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2	
 28051 000048EB C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 28052 000048F0 C706[E205]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURBUF],-1	; initial setting
 28053                                  
 28054                                  ; See if the input indicates a device that has already been detected. If so,
 28055                                  ; go build the guy quickly. Otherwise, let findpath find the device.
 28056                                  
 28057 000048F6 8B3E[B205]              	MOV	DI,[WFP_START]		; point to the beginning of the name
 28058                                  	;cmp	word [DI+1],5C3Ah
 28059                                  	;CMP	WORD [DI+1],'\' << 8 + ':'
 28060 000048FA 817D013A5C              	cmp	word [DI+1],':\'
 28061 000048FF 7438                    	JZ	short CrackIt
 28062                                  
 28063                                  ; Let ChkDev find it in the device list
 28064                                  
 28065 00004901 83C703                  	ADD	DI,3
 28066                                  	; 18/08/2018
 28067                                  	;MOV	SI,DI			; let CHKDEV see the original name
 28068                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28069                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28070                                  	;mov	si,di ; not required ! (it is written in CHKDEV proc already!)
 28071 00004904 E8AB00                  	CALL	CHKDEV
 28072 00004907 722E                    	JC	short InternalError
 28073                                  
 28074                                  Build_devJ:
 28075 00004909 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 28076 0000490C A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 28077                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],1
 28078 0000490F C606[2303]01            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; In the particular case of
 28079                                  					; "finding" a char device
 28080                                  					; set LOCUS to Unknown. This makes
 28081                                  					; certain idiotic problems reported
 28082                                  					; by a certain 3 letter OEM go away.
 28083                                  
 28084                                  ; Take name in name1 and pack it back into where wfp_start points. This
 28085                                  ; guarantees wfp_start pointing to a canonical representation of a device.
 28086                                  ; We are allowed to do this as GetPath is *ALWAYS* called before entering a
 28087                                  ; wfp into the share set.
 28088                                  ;
 28089                                  ; We copy chars from name1 to wfp_start remembering the position of the last
 28090                                  ; non-space seen +1.  This position is kept in DX.
 28091                                  
 28092                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 28093 00004914 16                      	push	ss
 28094 00004915 07                      	pop	es
 28095                                  
 28096                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 28097 00004916 BE[4B05]                	mov	si,NAME1
 28098 00004919 8B3E[B205]              	mov	di,[WFP_START]
 28099 0000491D 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 28100 0000491F B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; 8 chars in device name
 28101                                  MoveLoop:
 28102 00004922 AC                      	lodsb
 28103 00004923 AA                      	stosb
 28104 00004924 3C20                    	cmp	al," "
 28105 00004926 7402                    	jz	short NoSave
 28106                                  
 28107 00004928 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 28108                                  NoSave:
 28109 0000492A E2F6                    	loop	MoveLoop
 28110                                  
 28111                                  ; DX is the position of the last seen non-space + 1. We terminate the name
 28112                                  ; at this point.
 28113                                  
 28114 0000492C 89D7                    	mov	di,dx
 28115 0000492E C60500                  	mov	byte [di],0		; end of string
 28116 00004931 E8C402                  	call	Build_device_ent	; Clears carry sets zero
 28117 00004934 FEC0                    	INC	AL			; reset zero
 28118 00004936 C3                      	retn
 28119                                  
 28120                                  InternalError:
 28121                                  InternalError_loop:
 28122 00004937 EBFE                    	JMP	short InternalError_loop	; freeze
 28123                                  
 28124                                  ; Start off at the correct spot. Optimize if the current dir part is valid.
 28125                                  
 28126                                  CrackIt:
 28127 00004939 8B36[B605]              	MOV	SI,[CURR_DIR_END]	; get current directory pointer
 28128 0000493D 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1			; valid?
 28129 00004940 7503                    	JNZ	short LOOK_SING		; Yes, use it.
 28130 00004942 8D7503                  	LEA	SI,[DI+3]		; skip D:\.
 28131                                  LOOK_SING:
 28132                                  	;mov	byte [ATTRIB],16h
 28133 00004945 C606[6B05]16            	MOV	byte [ATTRIB],attr_directory+attr_system+attr_hidden
 28134                                  					; Attributes to search through Dirs
 28135 0000494A C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 28136 0000494E B8FFFF                  	MOV	AX,-1
 28137                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+73]
 28138 00004951 268B5D49                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+curdir.ID]
 28139 00004955 8B36[B605]              	MOV	SI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 28140                                  
 28141                                  ; AX = -1
 28142                                  ; BX = cluster number of current directory. THis number is -1 if the media
 28143                                  ;      has been uncertainly changed.
 28144                                  ; SI = offset in DOSGroup into path to end of current directory text. This
 28145                                  ;      may be -1 if no current directory part has been used.
 28146                                  
 28147 00004959 39C6                    	CMP	SI,AX			; if Current directory is not part
 28148 0000495B 743B                    	JZ	short NO_CURR_D		; then we must crack from root
 28149 0000495D 39C3                    	CMP	BX,AX			; is the current directory cluster valid
 28150                                  
 28151                                  ; DOS 3.3  6/25/86
 28152 0000495F 7437                    	JZ	short NO_CURR_D		; no, crack form the root
 28153                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],1
 28154 00004961 F606[6D12]01            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set ; for fastopen ?
 28155 00004966 743D                    	JZ	short GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER	; no
 28156 00004968 06                      	PUSH	ES			; save registers
 28157 00004969 57                      	PUSH	DI
 28158 0000496A 51                      	PUSH	CX
 28159 0000496B FF74FF                  	PUSH	word [SI-1]		; save \ and 1st char of next element
 28160 0000496E 56                      	PUSH	SI
 28161 0000496F 53                      	PUSH	BX
 28162                                  
 28163 00004970 C644FF00                	MOV	BYTE [SI-1],0		; call fastopen to look up cur dir info
 28164 00004974 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 28165                                  
 28166                                  ;hkn; FastOpenTable, Dir_Info_Buff & FastOpen_Ext_Info are in DOSDATA
 28167 00004978 BB[6312]                	MOV	BX,FastOpenTable
 28168 0000497B BF[970D]                	MOV	DI,Dir_Info_Buff
 28169 0000497E B9[8C0D]                	MOV	CX,FastOpen_Ext_Info
 28170                                  	;mov	al,1
 28171 00004981 B001                    	MOV	AL,FONC_Look_up
 28172 00004983 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 28173 00004984 07                      	POP	ES
 28174                                  	;call	far [BX+2]
 28175 00004985 FF5F02                  	CALL	far [BX+fastopen_entry.name_caching]
 28176 00004988 7203                    	JC	short GO_Chk_end1 	;fastopen not installed, or wrong drive.
 28177                                  					; Go to Got_Srch_cluster
 28178                                  	; 29/12/2022
 28179                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SI],0		;fastopen has current dir info?
 28180                                  	;JE	short GO_Chk_end	;yes. Go to got_search_cluster
 28181                                  	;stc
 28182                                  	;jmp	short GO_Chk_end	;Go to No_Curr_D
 28183                                  
 28184 0000498A 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1
 28185                                  GO_Chk_end1:	; 29/12/2022
 28186 0000498D F5                      	cmc 
 28187                                  	; [si] = 0 -> cf = 0
 28188                                  	; [si] > 0 -> cf = 1
 28189                                  
 28190                                  ;GO_Chk_end1:
 28191                                  	; 29/12/2022
 28192                                  	;clc
 28193                                  
 28194                                  GO_Chk_end:				; restore registers
 28195 0000498E 5B                      	POP	BX
 28196 0000498F 5E                      	POP	SI
 28197 00004990 8F44FF                  	POP	word [SI-1]
 28198 00004993 59                      	POP	CX
 28199 00004994 5F                      	POP	DI
 28200 00004995 07                      	POP	ES
 28201 00004996 730D                    	JNC	short GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER ; crack based on cur dir
 28202                                  
 28203                                  ; DOS 3.3  6/25/86
 28204                                  ;
 28205                                  ; We must cract the path beginning at the root. Advance pointer to beginning
 28206                                  ; of path and go crack from root.
 28207                                  
 28208                                  NO_CURR_D:
 28209 00004998 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 28210 0000499C 8D7403                  	LEA	SI,[SI+3]		; Skip "d:/"
 28211 0000499F C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Get ES:BP
 28212 000049A3 EB3B                    	JMP	short ROOTPATH
 28213                                  
 28214                                  ; We are able to crack from the current directory part. Go set up for search
 28215                                  ; of specified cluster.
 28216                                  
 28217                                  GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER:
 28218 000049A5 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Get ES:BP
 28219 000049A9 E827FE                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 28220                                  	;JC	short SETFERR
 28221                                  	;JMP	short FINDPATH
 28222                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28223 000049AC 7342                    	jnc	short FINDPATH ; 17/08/2018
 28224                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28225                                  	;JC	short SETFERR
 28226                                  	;JMP	short FINDPATH
 28227                                  SETFERR:
 28228 000049AE 30C9                    	XOR	CL,CL			; set zero
 28229 000049B0 F9                      	STC
 28230 000049B1 C3                      	retn
 28231                                  
 28232                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28233                                  ;
 28234                                  ; Procedure Name : ChkDev
 28235                                  ;
 28236                                  ; Check to see if the name at DS:DI is a device. Returns carry set if not a
 28237                                  ;   device.
 28238                                  ; Blasts CX,SI,DI,AX,BX
 28239                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28240                                  
 28241                                  CHKDEV:
 28242 000049B2 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 28243 000049B4 8CD7                    	MOV	DI,SS
 28244 000049B6 8EC7                    	MOV	ES,DI
 28245                                  
 28246 000049B8 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 28247 000049BB B90900                  	MOV	CX,9
 28248                                  TESTLOOP:
 28249 000049BE E85710                  	call	GETLET
 28250                                  
 28251 000049C1 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'
 28252 000049C3 740E                    	JZ	short TESTDEVICE
 28253 000049C5 E8A610                  	call	PATHCHRCMP
 28254 000049C8 7407                    	JZ	short NOTDEV
 28255 000049CA 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 28256 000049CC 7405                    	JZ	short TESTDEVICE
 28257                                  
 28258 000049CE AA                      	STOSB
 28259 000049CF E2ED                    	LOOP	TESTLOOP
 28260                                  NOTDEV:
 28261 000049D1 F9                      	STC
 28262 000049D2 C3                      	retn
 28263                                  
 28264                                  TESTDEVICE:
 28265                                  	;ADD	CX,2
 28266                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28267 000049D3 41                      	inc	cx
 28268 000049D4 41                      	inc	cx
 28269 000049D5 B020                    	MOV	AL,' '
 28270 000049D7 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 28271 000049D9 8CD0                    	MOV	AX,SS
 28272 000049DB 8ED8                    	MOV	DS,AX
 28273                                  	;call	DEVNAME
 28274                                  	;retn
 28275                                  	; 18/12/2022
 28276 000049DD E9B901                  	jmp	DEVNAME
 28277                                  
 28278                                  ;Break	<ROOTPATH, FINDPATH -- PARSE A PATH>
 28279                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28280                                  ;
 28281                                  ; Procedure Name : ROOTPATH,FINDPATH
 28282                                  ;
 28283                                  ; Inputs:
 28284                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but,
 28285                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path which is assumed to start at
 28286                                  ;		the root (no leading '/').
 28287                                  ; Function:
 28288                                  ;	Search from root for path
 28289                                  ; Outputs:
 28290                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but:
 28291                                  ;	If root directory specified, [CURBUF] and [NAME1] are NOT set, and
 28292                                  ;	[NoSetDir] is ignored.
 28293                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28294                                  
 28295                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28296                                  	; DOSCODE:7F47h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28297                                  
 28298                                  ROOTPATH:
 28299 000049E0 E81CFE                  	call	SETROOTSRCH
 28300                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28301 000049E3 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah
 28302                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SI],0
 28303 000049E5 3824                    	cmp	[si],ah ; 0
 28304 000049E7 7507                    	JNZ	short FINDPATH
 28305                                  
 28306                                  ; Root dir specified
 28307 000049E9 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 28308 000049EC A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 28309                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28310                                  	;XOR	AH,AH			; Sets "device ID" byte, sets zero
 28311                                  					; (dir), clears carry.
 28312 000049EF C3                      	retn
 28313                                  
 28314                                  ; Inputs:
 28315                                  ;	[ATTRIB] Set to get through directories
 28316                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Set to find last element
 28317                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28318                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path (no leading '/').
 28319                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 28320                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Phys sec # of first sector of directory
 28321                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Cluster # of next cluster
 28322                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors per cluster
 28323                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 28324                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 28325                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 28326                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 28327                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 28328                                  ;	[CREATING] and [DELALL] set
 28329                                  ; Function:
 28330                                  ;	Parse path name
 28331                                  ; Outputs:
 28332                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 28333                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 28334                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28335                                  ;	[THISDPB] = ES:BP
 28336                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 28337                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 28338                                  ;	   Zero set
 28339                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 28340                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 28341                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 28342                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 28343                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 28344                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 28345                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 28346                                  ;	   Zero reset
 28347                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path
 28348                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 28349                                  ;	ELSE
 28350                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 28351                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 28352                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to fcb_FIRCLUS field for entry
 28353                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 28354                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 28355                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 28356                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 28357                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 28358                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 28359                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 28360                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it,
 28361                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 28362                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 28363                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 28364                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 28365                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 28366                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 28367                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 28368                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 28369                                  ; Destroys all other registers
 28370                                  
 28371                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28372                                  	; DOSCODE:7F58h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28373                                  
 28374                                      	;entry	FINDPATH
 28375                                  FINDPATH:
 28376 000049F0 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 28377 000049F1 56                      	PUSH	SI
 28378 000049F2 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 28379 000049F4 8B0E[C205]              	MOV	CX,[DIRSTART]		; Get start clus of dir being searched
 28380 000049F8 833E[B605]FF            	CMP	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1
 28381 000049FD 740E                    	JZ	short NOIDS		; No current dir part
 28382 000049FF 3B3E[B605]              	CMP	DI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 28383 00004A03 7508                    	JNZ	short NOIDS		; Not to current dir end yet
 28384 00004A05 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 28385                                  	;mov	[es:di+73],cx
 28386 00004A09 26894D49                	MOV	[ES:DI+curdir.ID],CX	; Set current directory currency
 28387                                  NOIDS:
 28388                                  
 28389                                  ; Parse the name off of DS:SI into NAME1. AL = 1 if there was a meta
 28390                                  ; character in the string. CX,DI may be destroyed.
 28391                                  ;
 28392                                  ;	invoke	NAMETRANS
 28393                                  ;	MOV	CL,AL
 28394                                  ;
 28395                                  ; The above is the slow method. The name has *already* been munged by
 28396                                  ; TransPath so no special casing needs to be done. All we do is try to copy
 28397                                  ; the name until ., \ or 0 is hit.
 28398                                  
 28399 00004A0D 8CD0                    	MOV	AX,SS
 28400 00004A0F 8EC0                    	MOV	ES,AX
 28401                                  
 28402                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 28403 00004A11 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 28404 00004A14 B82020                  	MOV	AX,'  ' ; 2020h
 28405 00004A17 AA                      	STOSB
 28406 00004A18 AB                      	STOSW
 28407 00004A19 AB                      	STOSW
 28408 00004A1A AB                      	STOSW
 28409 00004A1B AB                      	STOSW
 28410 00004A1C AB                      	STOSW
 28411                                  
 28412                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 28413 00004A1D BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 28414 00004A20 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; bits for CL
 28415                                  GetNam:
 28416                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28417                                  	;INC	CL ; ?*! ; MSDOS 6.0	;AN000; KK increment volid count
 28418                                  
 28419                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28420                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28421                                  	;inc	cl ; not required !	
 28422                                  	
 28423 00004A22 AC                      	LODSB
 28424 00004A23 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'	; 2Eh
 28425 00004A25 7412                    	JZ	short _SetExt
 28426 00004A27 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 28427 00004A29 7424                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 28428 00004A2B 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'	; 5Ch
 28429 00004A2D 7420                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 28430 00004A2F 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'	; 3Fh
 28431 00004A31 7503                    	JNZ	short StoNam
 28432 00004A33 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 28433                                  StoNam: 
 28434 00004A36 AA                      	STOSB
 28435 00004A37 EBE9                    	JMP	short GetNam
 28436                                  _SetExt:
 28437 00004A39 BF[5305]                	MOV	DI,NAME1+8
 28438                                  GetExt:
 28439 00004A3C AC                      	LODSB
 28440 00004A3D 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 28441 00004A3F 740E                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 28442 00004A41 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 28443 00004A43 740A                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 28444 00004A45 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'
 28445 00004A47 7503                    	JNZ	short StoExt
 28446 00004A49 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 28447                                  StoExt: 
 28448 00004A4C AA                      	STOSB
 28449 00004A4D EBED                    	JMP	short GetExt
 28450                                  _GetDone:
 28451 00004A4F 4E                      	DEC	SI
 28452 00004A50 88E1                    	MOV	CL,AH  ; 0 or 1 ; 29/12/2022
 28453 00004A52 80C980                  	OR	CL,80H
 28454 00004A55 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of this element
 28455 00004A56 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 28456 00004A57 39FE                    	CMP	SI,DI
 28457 00004A59 7503                    	JNZ	short check_device
 28458 00004A5B E9E200                  	JMP	_BADPATH		; NUL parse (two delims most likely)
 28459                                  check_device:
 28460 00004A5E 56                      	PUSH	SI			; Start of next element
 28461                                  	;MOV	AL,[SI]
 28462                                  	;OR	AL,AL
 28463                                  	; 23/09/2023
 28464 00004A5F 803C00                  	cmp	byte [si],0
 28465 00004A62 7508                    	JNZ	short NOT_LAST
 28466                                  
 28467                                  ; for last element of the path switch to the correct search attributes
 28468                                  
 28469 00004A64 8A3E[6D05]              	MOV	BH,[SATTRIB]
 28470 00004A68 883E[6B05]              	MOV	[ATTRIB],BH
 28471                                  
 28472                                  NOT_LAST:
 28473                                  
 28474                                  ; check name1 to see if we have a device...
 28475                                  
 28476 00004A6C 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 28477                                  
 28478                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 28479                                  	;context ES
 28480 00004A6D 16                      	push	ss
 28481 00004A6E 07                      	pop	es
 28482 00004A6F E82701                  	call	DEVNAME 		; blast BX
 28483 00004A72 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 28484 00004A73 720B                    	JC	short FindFile		; Not a device
 28485 00004A75 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL			; Test next char again
 28486 00004A77 7403                    	JZ	short GO_BDEV
 28487 00004A79 E9C800                  	JMP	FILEINPATH		; Device name in middle of path
 28488                                  
 28489                                  GO_BDEV:
 28490 00004A7C 5E                      	POP	SI			; Points to NUL at end of path
 28491 00004A7D E989FE                  	JMP	Build_devJ
 28492                                  
 28493                                  FindFile:
 28494                                  ;;;; 7/28/86
 28495 00004A80 803E[4B05]E5            	CMP	BYTE [NAME1],0E5H	; if 1st char = E5
 28496 00004A85 7505                    	JNZ	short NOE5		; no
 28497 00004A87 C606[4B05]05            	MOV	BYTE [NAME1],05H	; change it to 05
 28498                                  NOE5:
 28499                                  ;;;; 7/28/86
 28500 00004A8C 57                      	PUSH	DI			; Start of this element
 28501 00004A8D 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 28502 00004A8E 51                      	PUSH	CX			; CL return from NameTrans
 28503                                  ;DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/12/86 F.C.
 28504                                  
 28505 00004A8F E89502                  	CALL	LookupPath		; call fastopen to get dir entry
 28506 00004A92 7303                    	JNC	short DIR_FOUND		; found dir entry
 28507                                  
 28508                                  ;DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/12/86 F.C.
 28509 00004A94 E86EFB                  	call	FINDENTRY
 28510                                  DIR_FOUND:
 28511 00004A97 59                      	POP	CX
 28512 00004A98 07                      	POP	ES
 28513 00004A99 5F                      	POP	DI
 28514 00004A9A 7303                    	JNC	short LOAD_BUF
 28515 00004A9C E9CA00                  	JMP	BADPATHPOP
 28516                                  
 28517                                  LOAD_BUF:
 28518 00004A9F C53E[E205]              	LDS	DI,[CURBUF]
 28519                                  	;test	byte [bx+0Bh],10h
 28520 00004AA3 F6470B10                	TEST	BYTE [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory
 28521 00004AA7 7503                    	JNZ	short GO_NEXT 		; DOS 3.3
 28522 00004AA9 E99800                  	JMP	FILEINPATH		; Error or end of path
 28523                                  
 28524                                  ; if we are not setting the directory, then check for end of string
 28525                                  
 28526                                  GO_NEXT:
 28527                                  ;hkn; SS override
 28528 00004AAC 36803E[4C03]00          	CMP	BYTE [SS:NoSetDir],0
 28529 00004AB2 7423                    	JZ	short SetDir
 28530 00004AB4 89FA                    	MOV	DX,DI			; Save pointer to entry
 28531 00004AB6 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS
 28532                                  
 28533                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 28534                                  	;context DS
 28535 00004AB8 16                      	push	ss
 28536 00004AB9 1F                      	pop	ds
 28537 00004ABA 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of next element
 28538                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 28703                                  ; Procedure Name : STARTSRCH
 28704                                  ;
 28705                                  ; Inputs:

 28725                                  ;BREAK <MatchAttributes - the final check for attribute matching>

 28729                                  ; Input:    [Attrib] = attribute to search for
 28730                                  ;	    CH = found attribute

 28742 00004B93 20E8                    	AND	AL,CH			; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet
 28743                                  	;and	al,16h

 28745                                  ;
 28746                                  ; the result is non-zero if an attribute is not in the search set
 28747                                  ; and in the found set and in the important set. This means that we do not
 28748                                  ; have a match. Do a JNZ <nomatch> or JZ <match>

 28759                                  ;Break <DevName - Look for name of device>
 28760                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28761                                  ;
 28762                                  ; Procedure Name : DevName
 28763                                  ;
 28764                                  ; Inputs:
 28765                                  ;	DS,ES:DOSDATA
 28766                                  ;	Filename in NAME1
 28767                                  ;	ATTRIB set so that we can error out if looking for Volume IDs
 28768                                  ; Function:
 28769                                  ;	Determine if file is in list of I/O drivers
 28770                                  ; Outputs:
 28771                                  ;	Carry set if not a device
 28772                                  ;	ELSE
 28773                                  ;	Zero flag set
 28774                                  ;	BH = Bit 7,6 = 1, bit 5 = 0 (cooked mode)
 28775                                  ;	     bits 0-4 set from low byte of attribute word

 28849                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 28850                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28851                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 28852                                  ;
 28853                                  ; Inputs:
 28854                                  ;	[NAME1] has name

 28856                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 28857                                  ; Function:

 28923                                  ;Break	<ValidateCDS - given a CDS, validate the media and the current directory>
 28924                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28925                                  ;
 28926                                  ;   ValidateCDS - Get current CDS. Splice it. Call FatReadCDS to check
 28927                                  ;   media. If media has been changed, do DOS_Chdir to validate path.
 28928                                  ;   If invalid, reset original CDS to root.
 28929                                  ;
 28930                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisCDS points to CDS of interest
 28931                                  ;		SS:DI points to temp buffer
 28932                                  ;   Outputs:	The current directory string is validated on the appropriate
 28933                                  ;		    drive

 28935                                  ;		ES:DI point to CDS
 28936                                  ;		Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28937                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 28938                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28939                                  
 28940                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28941                                  	; DOSCODE:819Bh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28942                                  
 28943                                  ValidateCDS:
 28944                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28945                                  	; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 28946                                  
 28947                                     %define  Temp	[bp-2]	; word

 28950                                     %define  SaveCDSH	[bp-4]	; word
 28951                                  
 28952                                  	;Enter

 28966                                  	;test	byte [SI+curdir.flags+1],80h

 28979                                  	;Context ES

 28981 00004C4E 07                      	pop	es

 28984 00004C52 8B76FE                  	MOV	SI,Temp
 28985

 28987                                  	;Context DS

 28990                                  	;Invoke	Splice

 28992

 29007 00004C6B C536[A205]              	LDS	SI,[THISCDS]		;   if (ThisCDS->ID == -1) {
 29008                                  	;cmp	word [si+73],-1

 29012                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29013                                  	;Context ES
 29014 00004C75 16                      	push	ss

 29087                                  ; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 29088                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - offset 43BDh
 29089                                  
 29090                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 29091                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29092                                  ;
 29093                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 29094                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 29095                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 29096                                  ;
 29097                                  ;	[path]device
 29098                                  ;
 29099                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 29100                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 29101                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 29102                                  ;
 29103                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29104                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 29105                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29106                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 29107                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 29108                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 29109                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 29110                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29111                                  
 29112                                  CheckThisDevice:
 29113 00004CE2 57                      	push	di
 29114 00004CE3 56                      	push	si
 29115 00004CE4 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 29116                                  
 29117                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 29118                                  
 29119 00004CE6 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 29120 00004CE8 E8830D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 29121 00004CEB 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 29122 00004CED 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 29123                                  
 29124                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 29125                                  
 29126 00004CEE AD                      	LODSW
 29127 00004CEF 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 29128 00004CF2 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 29129                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 29130 00004CF5 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 29131 00004CF7 AC                      	LODSB
 29132 00004CF8 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 29133 00004CFA 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 29134 00004CFC 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 29135 00004CFE AC                      	LODSB
 29136 00004CFF E86C0D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 29137 00004D02 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 29138                                  
 29139                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 29140                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 29141                                  
 29142                                  ParseDev:
 29143 00004D04 1E                      	push	ds
 29144 00004D05 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 29145 00004D06 E8A30C                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 29146 00004D09 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 29147 00004D0C F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 29148 00004D0D 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 29149                                  
 29150                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29151 00004D0F 16                      	push	ss
 29152 00004D10 1F                      	pop	ds
 29153                                  
 29154                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 29155                                  ;
 29156                                  ; SR;
 29157                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 29158                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 29159                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 29160                                  
 29161 00004D11 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 29162 00004D14 A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 29163                                  
 29164                                  ; M026 - end
 29165                                  
 29166 00004D17 E87FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 29167                                  
 29168                                  SkipSearch:
 29169 00004D1A 5E                      	pop	si
 29170 00004D1B 1F                      	pop	ds
 29171                                  
 29172                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 29173                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 29174                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 29175                                  
 29176                                  CheckReturn:
 29177 00004D1C 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 29178 00004D1D 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 29179 00004D1F 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 29180                                  Check_Done:
 29181 00004D21 5F                      	pop	di
 29182 00004D22 F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 29183 00004D23 C3                      	retn
 29184                                  NotDevice:
 29185 00004D24 F9                      	STC
 29186 00004D25 EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn
 29187                                  
 29188                                  ;BREAK <LookupPath - call fastopen to get dir entry info>
 29189                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29190                                  ;
 29191                                  ; Procedure Name : LookupPath
 29192                                  ;
 29193                                  ; Output  DS:SI -> path name,
 29194                                  ;	  ES:DI -> dir entry info buffer
 29195                                  ;	  ES:CX -> extended dir info buffer
 29196                                  ;
 29197                                  ;	  carry flag clear : tables pointed by ES:DI and ES:CX are filled by
 29198                                  ;			     FastOpen, DS:SI points to char just one after
 29199                                  ;			     the last char of path name which is fully or
 29200                                  ;			     partially found in FastOPen
 29201                                  ;	  carry flag set : FastOpen not in memory or path name not found
 29202                                  ;
 29203                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29204                                  
 29205                                  LookupPath:
 29206                                  ;	PUSH	AX
 29207                                  
 29208                                  ;hkn; SS override

 29212                                  NOLOOK:

 29214                                  
 29215                                  FASTINST:
 29216                                  ;hkn; SS override
 29217                                  	;test	byte [ss:FastOpenFlg],8
 29218 00004D32 36F606[6D12]08          	TEST	byte [ss:FastOpenFlg],No_Lookup	    ; no more lookup?

 29220                                  
 29221 00004D3A BB[6312]                	MOV	BX,FastOpenTable		    ; get fastopen related tab
 29222                                  
 29223                                  ;hkn; SS override
 29224 00004D3D 368B36[B205]            	MOV	SI,[SS:WFP_START]		    ; si points to path name
 29225 00004D42 BF[970D]                	MOV	DI,Dir_Info_Buff
 29226 00004D45 B9[8C0D]                	MOV	CX,FastOpen_Ext_Info

 29231                                  ;hkn; SS override

 29235

 29237                                  
 29238                                  ;hkn; SS override
 29239 00004D54 363B1E[B205]            	CMP	BX,[SS:WFP_START]		    ; path found ?
 29240 00004D59 745D                    	JZ	short NOTFOUND			    ; no
 29241                                  
 29242                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29243                                  
 29244                                  	; MSDOS 6.0				    ; fully or partially found
 29245 00004D5B 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0			    ;AN000;FO.

 29247 00004D60 51                      	PUSH	CX				    ;AN000;FO.; is attribute matched ?
 29248                                  
 29249                                  ;hkn; SS override for attrib/sattrib
 29250 00004D61 368A0E[6B05]            	MOV	CL,[ss:ATTRIB]			    ;AN000;FO.;

 29252 00004D6B 36882E[6B05]            	MOV	[ss:ATTRIB],CH			    ;AN000;FO.;
 29253                                  	;mov	ch,[es:di+0Bh]
 29254 00004D70 268A6D0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:DI+dir_entry.dir_attr]	    ;AN000;FO.;
 29255 00004D74 E815FE                  	call	MatchAttributes 		    ;AN000;FO.;
 29256                                  ;;;	MOV	[ss:ATTRIB],CL			    ;AN001;FO.; restore attrib
 29257 00004D77 59                      	POP	CX				    ;AN000;FO.;
 29258 00004D78 754F                    	JNZ	short NOLOOKUP			    ;AN000;FO.; not matched
 29259                                  parfnd:
 29260                                  
 29261                                  ;hkn; SS override
 29262 00004D7A 368936[B70D]            	MOV	[SS:Next_Element_Start],SI	    ; save si
 29263 00004D7F 89CB                    	MOV	BX,CX
 29264                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 29265                                  	;mov	ax,[bx+7]
 29266 00004D81 8B4707                  	MOV	AX,[BX+FEI.lastent]		    ;AN000;;FO. restore lastentry
 29267                                  ;hkn; SS override for LASTENT, DIRSTART, CLUSNUM
 29268 00004D84 36A3[4803]              	MOV	[SS:LASTENT],AX			    ;AN000;;FO.

 29270 00004D8B 36A3[C205]              	MOV	[SS:DIRSTART],AX		    ;AN001;;FO.
 29271                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)

 29273                                  	;mov	ax,[bx+5] ; MSDOS 6.0

 29276

 29282 00004D9F 07                      	POP	ES				    ; pop ES
 29283                                  ;SR;
 29284                                  ; We cannot have a root dir if we have come here. So, we zero out CurBuf to
 29285                                  ;indicate it is not a root dir

 29299                                  NOTFOUND:

 29311                                  ;BREAK <InsertPath - call fastopen to insert dir entry info>
 29312                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29313                                  ;
 29314                                  ; Procedure Name : InsertPath
 29315                                  ; Input:  FastOpen_Set flag set when from DOSOPEN otherwise 0
 29316                                  ;	  Lookup_Success flag set when got dir entry info from FASTOPEN
 29317                                  ;	  DS = DOSDATA
 29318                                  ; Output: FastOPen_Ext_Info is set and path dir info is inserted
 29319                                  ;
 29320                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29321                                  
 29322                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 29323                                  
 29324                                  InsertPath:
 29325 00004DCB 9C                      	PUSHF
 29326                                  ;hkn; SS override for FastOpenFlag

 29333                                  	;and	byte [ss:FastOpenFlg],0FDh
 29334 00004DDC 368026[6D12]FD          	AND	byte [SS:FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Reset  ; we got dir info from fastopen so
 29335 00004DE2 368B3E[B70D]            	MOV	DI,[SS:Next_Element_Start]	; no need to insert it again
 29336 00004DE7 EB5E                    	JMP	short GET_NEXT2
 29337                                  INSERT_DIR_INFO:				; save registers
 29338 00004DE9 1E                      	PUSH	DS

 29433                                  ;**	Misc Routines to do 1-12 low level I/O and call devices

 29437                                  ;DOSCODE:8401h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 29438                                  
 29439                                  ;Public DEV001S, DEV001E 		; Pathgen labels

 29471                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29472                                  ;
 29473                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 29474                                  ;
 29475                                  ; Inputs:
 29476                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 29477                                  ;	AH is function code
 29478                                  ;		= 0 Input
 29479                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 29480                                  ;		= 2 Output
 29481                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 29482                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 29483                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 29484                                  ;				   present.
 29485                                  ;	AL = character if output
 29486                                  ; Function:
 29487                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 29488                                  ; Outputs:
 29489                                  ;	AL is character if input
 29490                                  ;	If a status call
 29491                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 29492                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 29493                                  ; For regular files:
 29494                                  ;	Input Status
 29495                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 29496                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 29497                                  ;	Input
 29498                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 29499                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 29500                                  ;	Output Status
 29501                                  ;		Always ready
 29502                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved
 29503                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29504

 29728                                  ;**	Dev_Open_SFT - Open the Device for an SFT
 29729                                  ;
 29730                                  ;	Dev_Open_SFT issues an open call to the device associated with
 29731                                  ;	the SFT.

 29745                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29746                                  ; Procedure Name : DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 29747                                  ;
 29748                                  ; Inputs:
 29749                                  ;	ES:DI Points to SFT
 29750                                  ; Function:
 29751                                  ;	Issue a CLOSE call to the correct device
 29752                                  ; Outputs:
 29753                                  ;	None
 29754                                  ; ALL preserved
 29755                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29756                                  
 29757                                  DEV_CLOSE_SFT:
 29758 00004FBA 06                      	push	es ; * (MSDOS 6.21)
 29759 00004FBB E89AB4                  	call	save_world
 29760                                  	;mov	al,0Eh	
 29761 00004FBE B00E                    	MOV	AL,DEVCLS
 29762                                  
 29763                                  	; Main entry for device open and close. AL contains the function 
 29764                                  	; requested. Subtlety: if Sharing is NOT loaded then we do NOT issue 
 29765                                  	; open/close to block devices. This allows networks to function but 
 29766                                  	; does NOT hang up with bogus change-line code.
 29767                                  
 29768                                  	;entry	DO_OPCLS
 29769                                  DO_OPCLS:
 29770                                  	; Is the SFT for the net? If so, no action necessary.
 29771                                  
 29772                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 29774                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet

 29780                                  	;les	di,[es:di+7]

 29782 00004FD2 7513                    	JNZ	short GOT_DEV_ADDR
 29783                                  
 29784                                  	; We are about to call device open/close on a block driver. If no 
 29785                                  	; sharing then just short circuit to done.
 29786                                  	
 29787                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 29788                                  					; SS override

 29791                                  
 29792                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)

 29796                                  	;MOV	CL,[ES:DI+DPB.DRIVE]	; (cl) = drive
 29797                                  	;;les	di,[es:di+12h] ; MSDOS 3.3
 29798                                  	;les	di,[es:di+13h] ; MSDOS 6.0

 29800                                  GOT_DEV_ADDR:				; ES:DI -> device
 29801                                  	;test	word [es:di+4],800h

 29813                                  					; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA

 30302 0000521A 7513                    	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30303 0000521C 1E                      	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30304 0000521D 56                      	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30305 0000521E 06                      	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30306 0000521F 57                      	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30307 00005220 52                      	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30308 00005221 51                      	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30309 00005222 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 30310 00005224 E83100                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 30311 00005227 59                      	POP	CX
 30312 00005228 5A                      	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30313 00005229 5F                      	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30314 0000522A 07                      	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30315 0000522B 5E                      	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30316 0000522C 1F                      	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30317 0000522D EB16                    	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 30318                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 30319 0000522F 36C706[6C03]0100        	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 30320 00005236 36C706[050E]0000        	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 30321 0000523D 36C606[9C12]FF          	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 30322 00005243 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 30323 00005244 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30324                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 30325 00005245 F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 30326 00005246 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 30328                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 30329                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30330                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30331                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)

 30333                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 30334                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30335                                  ;
 30336                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 30337                                  ;
 30338                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 30339                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 30340                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 30341                                  ; Function:
 30342                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30343                                  ; Output:
 30344                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 30345                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 30346                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30347                                  
 30348                                  SC2BUF:
 30349                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30350 00005247 E86BFF                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 30351                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30352                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30353 0000524A 723D                    	jc	short sexit
 30354 0000524C B80100                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 30355 0000524F D3E0                    	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 30356 00005251 368506[050E]            	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30357 00005256 7430                    	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 30358                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 30359                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 30360                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 30361                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 30362                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30363 00005258 36A1[FE0D]              	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30364 0000525C 91                      	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30365 0000525D F7E1                    	mul	cx
 30366 0000525F 360306[7300]            	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 30367 00005264 361316[7500]            	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30368 00005269 8EDA                    	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 30369 0000526B 89C6                    	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30370 0000526D 368E06[6A03]            	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 30371 00005272 368B3E[6803]            	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 30372                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30373                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 30374 00005277 D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 30375                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 30376                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 30377 00005279 36803E[6A00]00          	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 30378 0000527F 7403                    	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30379 00005281 D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 30380 00005283 66                      	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 30381                                  nodd:
 30382 00005284 F3A5                    	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 30383 00005286 F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30384 00005287 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 30385                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 30386 00005288 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30387                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 30388 00005289 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;LB.

 30419                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 30420                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30421                                  ;
 30422                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 30423                                  ;
 30424                                  ; Inputs:
 30425                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 30426                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 30427                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 30428                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30429                                  ;               entries
 30430                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30431                                  ; Function:
 30432                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 30433                                  ; Outputs:
 30434                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 30435                                  ;       ELSE
 30436                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 30437                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 30438                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 30439                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 30440                                  ;
 30441                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30442                                  
 30443                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30444                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30445                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30446                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30447

 30451                                  BUILDDIR:
 30452                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 30453                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 4E66h

 30458                                          ;CLC
 30459                                          ;retn
 30460                                  	; 24/09/2023

 30490 000052BB 72DD                            jc	short  builddir_retn

 30499                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 30500 000052D0 891E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],BX
 30501                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30502                                  	;PUSH	CX ; (not necessary)
 30503 000052D4 50                      	PUSH	AX
 30504 000052D5 55                      	PUSH	BP

 30506                                  	; 15/12/2022
 30507 000052D8 268A5600                	mov	dl,[ES:BP] ; 09/09/2018
 30508                                          ; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 30509                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 30510                                  	;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; drive #
 30511 000052DC 8B0E[C205]                      MOV     CX,[DIRSTART]		; first cluster #
 30512 000052E0 89DD                            MOV     BP,BX 			; CLUSNUM
 30513 000052E2 E88DDA                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 30514 000052E5 5D                              POP     BP
 30515 000052E6 58                              POP     AX
 30516                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30517                                          ;POP	CX
 30518                                  
 30519                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 30520                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:
 30521 000052E7 89DA                            MOV     DX,BX
 30522 000052E9 30DB                            XOR     BL,BL
 30523 000052EB E8CC04                  	call	FIGREC
 30524                                  GOTDIRREC:
 30525                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 30526 000052EE 268A4E04                        MOV     CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 30527 000052F2 FEC1                            INC     CL
 30528 000052F4 30ED                            XOR     CH,CH
 30529                                  ZERODIR:
 30530 000052F6 51                              PUSH    CX
 30531                                  	; 22/09/2023
 30532                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 30533                                          ;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; *
 30534 000052F7 B0FF                            MOV     AL,0FFH
 30535                                          ;call	GETBUFFR
 30536 000052F9 E85010                          call	GETBUFFRD ; *
 30537 000052FC 7302                    	JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 30538 000052FE 59                              POP     CX
 30539 000052FF C3                              retn
 30540                                  
 30541                                  GET_SSIZE:
 30542                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 30543 00005300 268B4E02                        MOV     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 30544 00005304 06                              PUSH    ES
 30545 00005305 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 30546                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 30547 00005309 26804D0504                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 30548 0000530E 57                              PUSH    DI
 30549                                  	;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 30550                                  	;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 30551 0000530F 83C718                          ADD     DI,BUFINSIZ
 30552 00005312 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 30553 00005314 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 30554 00005316 F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 30555 00005318 7301                            JNC	short EVENZ
 30556 0000531A AA                              STOSB
 30557                                  EVENZ:

 30559                                  
 30560                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 30561 0000531C 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 30562                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 30563 00005321 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty7		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 30564 00005323 E83912                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 30565                                          
 30566                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 30567 00005326 26804D0540              	OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 30568                                  yesdirty7:
 30569 0000532B 07                              POP	ES
 30570 0000532C 59                              POP	CX
 30571                                  
 30572                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30573                                  
 30574                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 30575                                  	;INC	DX
 30576

 30578                                  	; 24/09/2023

 30580                                  	;;adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 30581                                  	;; 24/09/2023
 30582                                  	;; ax=0
 30583                                  	;adc	[HIGH_SECTOR],ax ; 0
 30584                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30585 0000532D 42                      	inc	dx
 30586 0000532E 7504                    	jnz	short loop_zerodir
 30587 00005330 FF06[0706]              	inc	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 30588                                  loop_zerodir:

 30590

 30592 00005339 40                              INC     AX
 30593                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30594                                  	; cf=0
 30595                                  	;CLC
 30596 0000533A C3                              retn
