 30598                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30599                                  ;
 30600                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 30601                                  ;
 30602                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 30603                                  ;
 30604                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 30605                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 30606                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 30607                                  ;
 30608                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30609                                  
 30610                                  SETDOTENT:
 30611                                  ;	Fill in name field
 30612 0000533B AB                              STOSW
 30613 0000533C B90400                          MOV     CX,4
 30614 0000533F B82020                          MOV     AX,"  " ; 2020h
 30615 00005342 F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 30616 00005344 AA                              STOSB
 30617                                  
 30618                                  ;	Set up attribute
 30619                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 30620 00005345 B010                            MOV     AL,attr_directory
 30621 00005347 AA                              STOSB
 30622                                  
 30623                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 30624 00005348 83C70A                          ADD     DI,10
 30625 0000534B 8B36[9E05]                      MOV     SI,[THISSFT]
 30626                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 30627 0000534F 8B440D                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 30628 00005352 AB                              STOSW
 30629                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 30630 00005353 8B440F                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 30631 00005356 AB                      	STOSW
 30632                                  
 30633                                  ;	Set up first cluster field
 30634 00005357 89D0                            MOV     AX,DX
 30635 00005359 AB                              STOSW
 30636                                  
 30637                                  ;	0 file size
 30638 0000535A 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 30639 0000535C AB                              STOSW
 30640 0000535D AB                              STOSW
 30641 0000535E C3                              retn
 30642                                  
 30643                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 30644                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30645                                  ;
 30646                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 30647                                  ;
 30648                                  ; Inputs:
 30649                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 30650                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 30651                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 30652                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 30653                                  ;
 30654                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 30655                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 30656                                  ;
 30657                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 30658                                  ;               terminated)
 30659                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 30660                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 30661                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 30662                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 30663                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 30664                                  ; Function:
 30665                                  ;       Make a new node
 30666                                  ; Outputs:
 30667                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 30668                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 30669                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 30670                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 30671                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 30672                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 30673                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 30674                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 30675                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 30676                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 30677                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 30678                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 30679                                  ;       ELSE
 30680                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 30681                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 30682                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 30683                                  ;               containing new node.
 30684                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 30685                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 30686                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 30687                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 30688                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 30689                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 30690                                  ;
 30691                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30692                                  
 30693                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30694                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30695                                  
 30696                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30697                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30698                                  
 30699                                  MakeNode:
 30700                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 30701 0000535F C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 30702 00005365 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save AH value
 30703 00005366 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 30704 0000536B A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 30705 0000536E E87AF5                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 30706 00005371 88CA                            MOV     DL,CL           ; Save CL info
 30707 00005373 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Device ID to CH
 30708 00005375 58                              POP     AX              ; Get back AH
 30709 00005376 732E                            JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 30710 00005378 7505                            JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 30711 0000537A 80FA80                          CMP     DL,80h          ; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 30712 0000537D 7406                            JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 30713                                  make_err_4:
 30714 0000537F B004                            MOV     AL,4            ; case 1 bad path
 30715                                  make_err_ret:
 30716 00005381 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 30717 00005383 F9                              STC
 30718                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 30719 00005384 C3                              retn
 30720                                  
 30721                                          ;entry	RENAME_MAKE     ; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 30722                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 30723                                  make_type:
 30724                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 30725                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 30726                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 30727 00005385 F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 30728 0000538A 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 30729 0000538C 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 30730                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 30731                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 30732 00005391 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 30733 00005396 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 30734 00005398 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 30735 00005399 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 30736                                  	; 22/11/2022
 30737                                  make_retn:
 30738                                  	;return
 30739 0000539C C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 30740                                  
 30741                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 30742                                  
 30743                                  make_type2:
 30744 0000539D C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 30745 000053A1 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX           ; nothing exists Disk Node
 30746 000053A3 F9                              STC                     ; Not found
 30747 000053A4 EB5A                            JMP     short make_new
 30748                                  
 30749                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 30750                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 30751                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 30752                                  ;   else => file
 30753                                  
 30754                                  make_exists:
 30755 000053A6 7448                            JZ	short make_exists_dir
 30756 000053A8 B003                            MOV     AL,3            ; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 30757                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 30758 000053AA F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 30759 000053AF 753B                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 30760                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node

 30811                                  make_save:

 30836                                  
 30837                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 30838                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 30839                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 30840                                  
 30841 00005417 50                              PUSH    AX

 30843                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h

 30845                                  	
 30846                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 30847                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h

 30849                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 30863 0000543A 58                              POP     AX
 30864 0000543B EBAA                            jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 30865                                  
 30866                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 30867                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 30868                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 30869                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 30870                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 30871                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 30872                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 30873                                  ;
 30874                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 30875                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 30876                                  
 30877                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30878                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30879                                  
 30880                                  MakeEndShare:

 30882 00005441 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX

 30887 0000544A 57                      	push	di
 30888 0000544B 06                      	push	es

 30891 00005450 9D                              POPF

 30893 00005452 5F                      	pop	di

 30895                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 30896 00005456 E8BDC4                  	call	LCritSFT

 30898                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30899 00005459 5B                      	pop	bx
 30900 0000545A 5E                      	pop	si
 30901 0000545B 59                      	pop	cx
 30902 0000545C 58                      	pop	ax

 30904                                  
 30905                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 30906

 30909 00005463 53                      	push	bx

 30923                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30924                                  ;
 30925                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 30926                                  ;
 30927                                  ; Inputs:
 30928                                  ;       [THISSFT] set
 30929                                  ;       [THISDPB] set
 30930                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30931                                  ;               entries
 30932                                  ;       [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 30933                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 30934                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30935                                  ;       CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 30936                                  ;               NC means file existed (device)
 30937                                  ;               C  means file did not exist
 30938                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 30939                                  ;       If FILE
 30940                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 30941                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 30942                                  ;       If device
 30943                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 30944                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 30945                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 30946                                  ; Function:
 30947                                  ;       Make a new directory entry
 30948                                  ;       If an old one existed it is truncated first
 30949                                  ; Outputs:
 30950                                  ;       Carry set if error
 30951                                  ;               Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 30952                                  ;               vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 30953                                  ;       else
 30954                                  ;               outputs of DOOPEN
 30955                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 30956                                  ;
 30957                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30958                                  
 30959                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30960                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30961                                  
 30962                                  NEWENTRY:
 30963 0000546E C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 30964 00005472 7315                            JNC	short EXISTENT	
 30965 00005474 803E[4A03]00                    CMP     byte [FAILERR],0
 30966                                  	;STC
 30967                                          ;jnz	short makeendshare_retn	; User FAILed, node might exist
 30968                                          ; 24/09/2023
 30969 00005479 750C                    	jnz	short ERRRET3
 30970 0000547B E80CFE                  	CALL    BUILDDIR        ; Try to build dir
 30971 0000547E 72ED                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 30972 00005480 E891F2                          call	GETENT          ; Point at that free entry
 30973 00005483 72E8                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 30974 00005485 EB0E                            JMP     SHORT FREESPOT
 30975                                  
 30976                                  ERRRET3:

 30978                                  newentry_retn:
 30979 00005488 C3                              retn
 30980                                  
 30981                                  EXISTENT:

 30985                                  
 30986                                  NOT_DEV1:

 30988 00005493 72F3                            jc	short newentry_retn ; Failed
 30989                                  FREESPOT:

 31005 000054B5 AA                      	STOSB                   ; Attributes
 31006                                  
 31007                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00

 31009                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00

 31024                                  updnxt:
 31025 000054C9 8B36[E205]              	MOV	SI,[CURBUF]
 31026

 31028

 31030 000054CD 26F6440540              	TEST	byte [ES:SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31031                                  				;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 31084                                  ;NOTE FALL THROUGH
 31085                                  
 31086                                  ; DOSCODE:8AE4h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31087                                  
 31088                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31089                                  ; DOSCODE:8AA9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31090                                  
 31091                                  ; DOOPEN
 31092                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31093                                  ;
 31094                                  ; Inputs:
 31095                                  ;       [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 31096                                  ;       [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 31097                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 31098                                  ;       If FILE
 31099                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31100                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31101                                  ;       If device
 31102                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31103                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31104                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31105                                  ; Function:
 31106                                  ;       Fill in SFT from dir entry
 31107                                  ; Outputs:
 31108                                  ;       CARRY CLEAR
 31109                                  ;       sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 31110                                  ;       sf_flags high byte = 0
 31111                                  ;       sf_flags low byte = AH except
 31112                                  ;       sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 31113                                  ;       sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 31114                                  ;       sf_position = 0
 31115                                  ;       If device
 31116                                  ;           sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 31117                                  ;           sf_size = 0
 31118                                  ;       If file
 31119                                  ;           sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 31120                                  ;           sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 31121                                  ;           sf_cluspos = 0
 31122                                  ;           sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 31123                                  ;           sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 31124                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 31125                                  ;
 31126                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31127                                  
 31128                                  	;entry	DOOPEN
 31129                                  DOOPEN:
 31130                                  ;	Generate and store attribute
 31131                                  
 31132 0000551D 88E6                            MOV     DH,AH           ; AH to different place
 31133 0000551F C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 31134                                  	;add	di,4
 31135 00005523 83C704                          ADD     DI,SF_ENTRY.sf_attr ; Skip ref_count and mode fields
 31136                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31137 00005526 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31138                                  	;XOR	AL,AL		; Assume it's a device, devices have an
 31139                                  				;   attribute of 0 (for R/O testing etc).
 31140 00005528 08F6                            OR      DH,DH           ; See if our assumption good.
 31141 0000552A 7807                            JS	short DEV_SFT1	; If device DS=DOSGROUP
 31142 0000552C 8E1E[E405]                      MOV     DS,[CURBUF+2]
 31143                                  	;mov	al,[BX+0Bh]
 31144 00005530 8A470B                          MOV     AL,[BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 31145                                  				; If file, get attrib from dir entry
 31146                                  DEV_SFT1:
 31147 00005533 AA                              STOSB                   ; sf_attr, ES:DI -> sf_flags
 31148                                  
 31149                                  ;	Generate and store flags word
 31150                                  
 31151                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31152                                  	;XOR	AX,AX
 31153                                          ; ah=0
 31154 00005534 88F0                    	MOV     AL,DH
 31155                                  	;or	al,40h
 31156 00005536 0C40                            OR      AL,devid_file_clean
 31157 00005538 AB                              STOSW                   ; sf_flags, ES:DI -> sf_devptr
 31158                                  
 31159                                  ;	Generate and store device pointer
 31160                                  
 31161 00005539 1E                              PUSH    DS
 31162                                  	;lds	ax,[bx+1Ah]
 31163 0000553A C5471A                          LDS     AX,[BX+dir_entry.dir_first] ; Assume device
 31164 0000553D 08F6                            OR      DH,DH
 31165 0000553F 7805                            JS	short DEV_SFT2
 31166                                  
 31167                                  ;hkn; SS override
 31168 00005541 36C506[8A05]                    LDS     AX,[SS:THISDPB]	; Was file
 31169                                  DEV_SFT2:
 31170 00005546 AB                              STOSW 			; store offset
 31171 00005547 8CD8                            MOV     AX,DS
 31172 00005549 1F                              POP     DS
 31173 0000554A AB                      	STOSW			; store segment
 31174                                  				; ES:DI -> sf_firclus
 31175                                  
 31176                                  ;	Generate pointer to, generate and store first cluster 
 31177                                  ;	(irrelevant for devices)
 31178                                  
 31179 0000554B 56                              PUSH    SI              ; Save pointer to dir_first
 31180 0000554C A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_first -> sf_firclus
 31181                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_size_l, ES:DI -> sf_time
 31182                                  
 31183                                  ;	Copy time/date of last modification
 31184                                  
 31185                                  	;sub	si,6
 31186 0000554D 83EE06                          SUB     SI,dir_entry.dir_size_l - dir_entry.dir_time 
 31187                                  				; DS:SI->dir_time
 31188 00005550 A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_time -> sf_time
 31189                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_date, ES:DI -> sf_date

 31191                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_first, ES:DI -> sf_size
 31192

 31194                                  
 31195 00005552 AD                              LODSW                   ; skip dir_first, DS:SI -> dir_size_l
 31196 00005553 AD                              LODSW                   ; dir_size_l in AX , DS:SI -> dir_size_h
 31197 00005554 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; dir_size_l in CX
 31198 00005556 AD                              LODSW                   ; dir_size_h (size AX:CX), DS:SI -> ????
 31199 00005557 08F6                            OR      DH,DH
 31200 00005559 7904                            JNS	short FILE_SFT1
 31201 0000555B 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 31202 0000555D 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Devices are open ended
 31203                                  FILE_SFT1:

 31323                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31324                                  ;
 31325                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 31326                                  ;
 31327                                  ; Inputs:
 31328                                  ;       ES:BP -> DPB
 31329                                  ;       [CURBUF] Set
 31330                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 31331                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 31332                                  ; Function:
 31333                                  ;       Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 31334                                  ; Outputs:
 31335                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 31336                                  ;       (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 31337                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 31338                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31339                                  
 31340                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31341                                  FREEENT:
 31342 000055BC 1E                              PUSH    DS
 31343 000055BD C53E[E205]                      LDS     DI,[CURBUF]
 31344 000055C1 8B0C                            MOV     CX,[SI]         ; Get pointer to clusters
 31345                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31346                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31347 000055C3 8B5508                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]  ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31348                                  ;hkn; SS override
 31349 000055C6 368916[0706]                    MOV	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],DX		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31350 000055CB 8B5506                          MOV     DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 31351 000055CE 1F                              POP     DS
 31352 000055CF 83F902                  	CMP	CX,2
 31353 000055D2 722E                            JB	short RET1	; Was 0 length file (or mucked Firclus if CX=1)
 31354                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 31355 000055D4 263B4E0D                        CMP     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 31356 000055D8 7728                            JA	short RET1	; Treat like zero length file (firclus mucked)
 31357 000055DA 29FB                            SUB     BX,DI
 31358 000055DC 53                              PUSH    BX              ; Save offset
 31359 000055DD FF36[0706]              	PUSH	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31360 000055E1 52                              PUSH    DX              ; Save sector number
 31361 000055E2 89CB                            MOV     BX,CX
 31362 000055E4 E8AC02                          call	RELEASE         ; Free any data allocated
 31363 000055E7 5A                              POP     DX
 31364 000055E8 8F06[0706]                      POP	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31365 000055EC 7302                            JNC	short GET_BUF_BACK
 31366 000055EE 5B                              POP     BX
 31367                                  freeent_retn:
 31368 000055EF C3                              retn			; Screw up
 31369

 31389                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31390                                  ;
 31391                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 31392                                  ;
 31393                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 31394                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 31395                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 31396                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 31397                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 31398                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 31399                                  ;
 31400                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31401                                  
 31402                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 31403 00005604 50                      	PUSH    AX
 31404 00005605 9F                              lahf                    ; preserve flags
 31405 00005606 803E[A20A]00                    CMP     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 31406 0000560B 7410                            JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 31407 0000560D C606[A20A]00                    mov     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0	; reset flag
 31408 00005612 06                      	push	es
 31409 00005613 57                      	push	di
 31410 00005614 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 31411 00005618 E89FF9                          call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 31412 0000561B 5F                      	pop	di
 31413 0000561C 07                      	pop	es
 31414                                  
 31415                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 31416 0000561D 9E                              sahf                    ; restore flags
 31417 0000561E 58                              POP     AX
 31418 0000561F C3                              retn

 31451                                  ;Break   <FNDCLUS -- Skip over allocation units>
 31452                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31453                                  ;
 31454                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 31455                                  ;
 31456                                  ; Inputs:
 31457                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters to skip
 31458                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 31459                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT
 31460                                  ; Outputs:
 31461                                  ;       BX = Last cluster skipped to
 31462                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)
 31463                                  ;       DX = Position of last cluster
 31464                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 31465                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 31466                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31467                                  
 31468                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31469                                  ; DOSCODE:8BF2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31470                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31471                                  ; DOSCODE:8BB7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31472                                  
 31473                                  FNDCLUS:

 31476                                  	;;mov	bx,[es:di+1Bh] ; MSDOS 3.3
 31477                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+35h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 31478 00005625 268B5D35                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_lstclus]
 31479                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+19h]

 31491                                  FINDIT:

 31533                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 31534                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31535                                  ;
 31536                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 31537                                  ;
 31538                                  ; Inputs:
 31539                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 31540                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 31541                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 31542                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 31543                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 31544                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 31545                                  ; Function:
 31546                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 31547                                  ;       read if necessary.
 31548                                  ; Outputs:
 31549                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 31550                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 31551                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 31552                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 31553                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 31554                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 31555                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31556                                  
 31557                                  BUFSEC:
 31558 0000565A 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 31559 0000565E 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 31560                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 31561 00005662 C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 31562 00005667 E85001                          CALL    FIGREC
 31563 0000566A E8E40C                  	call	GETBUFFR
 31564 0000566D 72EA                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 31565                                  
 31566 0000566F C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 31567 00005674 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 31568 00005678 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 31569 0000567A 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 31570 0000567E 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 31571 00005680 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 31572 00005684 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 31573                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 31574 00005688 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 31575                                  	;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 31576                                  	;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 31577 0000568D 8D7D18                          LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 31578 00005690 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 31579 00005694 F8                              CLC
 31580 00005695 C3                              retn
 31581                                  
 31582                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 31583                                  
 31584                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31585                                  ;
 31586                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 31587                                  ;
 31588                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 31589                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 31590                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 31591                                  ;
 31592                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 31593                                  ;
 31594                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31595                                  
 31596                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31597                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31598                                  BUFRD:
 31599 00005696 06                              PUSH	ES
 31600 00005697 31C0                            xor	ax, ax			; pre-read sector
 31601 00005699 E8BEFF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 31602 0000569C 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK
 31603                                  
 31604                                  BUF_IO_FAIL:				; this label used by BUFWRT also
 31605 0000569E 07                              POP	ES
 31606 0000569F EB2B                            JMP     SHORT RBUFPLACED
 31607                                  
 31608                                  BUF_OK:
 31609 000056A1 8CC3                            MOV     BX,ES
 31610 000056A3 8E06[2E03]                      MOV     ES,[DMAADD+2]
 31611 000056A7 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX
 31612 000056A9 87FE                    	XCHG    DI,SI
 31613 000056AB D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 31614                                  ;M039
 31615                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 31616                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 31617                                  	;MOVSB
 31618                                  ;EVENRD:
 31619                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 31620                                  
 31621                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 31622                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 31623                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 31624                                  
 31625                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31626 000056AD F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 31627                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 31628                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 31629                                  	; 16/12/2022
 31630 000056AF 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 31631 000056B1 A4                      	movsb ; ****
 31632                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31633                                  	;adc	cx,0
 31634                                  	;rep	movsb
 31635                                  ;M039
 31636                                  EVENRD: ; ****
 31637 000056B2 07                              POP	ES
 31638                                  ;hkn; SS override

 31641                                  	;lea	bx,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 31642 000056B8 8D5D18                  	LEA     BX,[DI+BUFINSIZ]
 31643 000056BB 29DE                            SUB     SI,BX                   ; Position in buffer
 31644 000056BD E8310C                          call	PLACEBUF

 31647 000056C4 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC	; No, leave buf where it is
 31648                                  ;M039
 31649                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 31650                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 31651                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 31652                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 31653 000056C6 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 31654                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 31655                                  
 31656                                  RBUFPLACEDC:

 31660 000056CD 1F                      	pop	ds

 31663                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31664                                  ;
 31665                                  ; Procedure : BUFWRT
 31666                                  ;
 31667                                  ; Do a partial sector write via one of the system buffers
 31668                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 31669                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 31670                                  ;
 31671                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 31672                                  ;
 31673                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31674                                  
 31675                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31676                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31677                                  BUFWRT:
 31678                                          ;MOV     AX,[SECPOS]
 31679                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 31680                                  	;ADD	AX,1            	; Set for next sector
 31681                                          ;MOV	[SECPOS],AX 		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31682                                          ;ADC	word [SECPOS+2],0	;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31683                                          ; 24/09/2023
 31684 000056CF FF06[C405]              	inc	word [SECPOS]
 31685 000056D3 7504                    	jnz	short bufw_secpos
 31686 000056D5 FF06[C605]              	inc	word [SECPOS+2]
 31687                                  bufw_secpos:
 31688 000056D9 A1[C605]                	MOV	AX,[SECPOS+2]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31689 000056DC 3B06[CA05]                      CMP	AX,[VALSEC+2]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31690 000056E0 B001                            MOV	AL,1			;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31691 000056E2 770F                            JA	short NOREAD		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31692 000056E4 720B                            JB	short _doread		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31693 000056E6 A1[C405]                        MOV	AX,[SECPOS]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 31694                                  
 31695                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 31696                                  	;INC	AX
 31697                                  	;MOV	[SECPOS],AX ; 09/09/2018
 31698                                  
 31699                                  	; 20/05/2019
 31700                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 31701 000056E9 3B06[C805]                      CMP     AX,[VALSEC]		; Has sector been written before?
 31702 000056ED B001                            MOV     AL,1
 31703 000056EF 7702                            JA	short NOREAD		; Skip preread if SECPOS>VALSEC
 31704                                  _doread:
 31705 000056F1 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL
 31706                                  NOREAD:
 31707 000056F3 06                              PUSH	ES
 31708 000056F4 E863FF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 31709 000056F7 72A5                    	JC	short BUF_IO_FAIL
 31710 000056F9 8E1E[2E03]                      MOV     DS,[DMAADD+2]
 31711 000056FD D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
