 43200                                  ;Break <$CreateNewFile - Create a new directory entry>
 43201                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43202                                  ;   CreateNew - Create a new directory entry.  Return a file handle if there
 43203                                  ;	was no previous directory entry, and fail if a directory entry with
 43204                                  ;	the same name existed previously.
 43205                                  ;
 43206                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an ASCIZ file name
 43207                                  ;		CX contains default file attributes
 43208                                  ;   Outputs:	Carry Clear:
 43209                                  ;		    AX has file handle opened for read/write
 43210                                  ;		Carry Set:
 43211                                  ;		    AX has error code
 43212                                  ;   Registers modified: All
 43213                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43214                                  
 43215                                  _$CreateNewFile:
 43216 00007AAA 51                      	push	cx			; Save attributes on stack

 43218 00007AAE E914FF                  	JMP	AccessSet		; use good ol' open
 43219                                  
 43220                                  ;**	BinToAscii - convert a number to a string.
 43221                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43222                                  ;	BinToAscii converts a 16 bit number into a 4 ascii characters.
 43223                                  ;	This routine is used to generate temp file names so we don't spend
 43224                                  ;	the time and code needed for a true hex number, we just use
 43225                                  ;	A thorugh O.
 43226                                  ;
 43227                                  ;	ENTRY	(ax) = value
 43228                                  ;		(es:di) = destination
 43229                                  ;	EXIT	(es:di) updated by 4
 43230                                  ;	USES	cx, di, flags
 43231                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43232                                  
 43233                                  ; MSDOS 3.3
 43234                                  ;BinToAscii:
 43235                                  ;	mov     cx,4
 43236                                  ;bta5:
 43237                                  ;	push    cx
 43238                                  ;	mov     cl,4
 43239                                  ;	rol     ax,cl
 43240                                  ;	push    ax
 43241                                  ;	and     al,0Fh
 43242                                  ;	add     al,'0'
 43243                                  ;	cmp     al,'9'
 43244                                  ;	jbe     short bta6
 43245                                  ;	add     al,7
 43246                                  ;bta6: 
 43247                                  ;	stosb
 43248                                  ;	pop     ax
 43249                                  ;	pop     cx
 43250                                  ;	loop    bta5
 43251                                  ;	retn
 43252                                  
 43253                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 43254                                  BinToAscii:
 43255 00007AB1 B90404                  	mov	cx,404h			; (ch) = digit counter, (cl) = shift cnt
 43256                                  bta5:	
 43257 00007AB4 D3C0                    	ROL	AX,CL			; move leftmost nibble into rightmost
 43258 00007AB6 50                      	push	ax			; preserve remainder of digits
 43259 00007AB7 240F                    	AND	AL,0Fh			; grab low nibble
 43260 00007AB9 0441                    	ADD	AL,'A'			; turn into ascii
 43261 00007ABB AA                      	STOSB				; drop in the character
 43262 00007ABC 58                      	pop	ax			; (ax) = shifted number
 43263 00007ABD FECD                    	dec	ch
 43264 00007ABF 75F3                    	jnz	short bta5		; process 4 digits
 43265 00007AC1 C3                      	retn
 43266                                  
 43267                                  ;Break	<$CreateTempFile - create a unique name>
 43268                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43269                                  ;   $CreateTemp - given a directory, create a unique name in that directory.
 43270                                  ;	Method used is to get the current time, convert to a name and attempt
 43271                                  ;	a create new. Repeat until create new succeeds.
 43272                                  ;
 43273                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a null terminated directory name.
 43274                                  ;		CX  contains default attributes
 43275                                  ;   Outputs:	Unique name is appended to DS:DX directory.
 43276                                  ;		AX has handle
 43277                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 43278                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43279                                  
 43280                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 43281                                  
 43282                                  _$CreateTempFile:
 43283                                  	;Enter
 43284 00007AC2 55                      	push	bp
 43285 00007AC3 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 43286                                  
 43287                                  	;LocalVar  EndPtr,DWORD
 43288                                  	;LocalVar  FilPtr,DWORD
 43289                                  	;LocalVar  Attr,WORD
 43290                                  
 43291 00007AC5 83EC0A                  	sub	sp,10
 43292                                  
 43293                                  	;test	cx,0FFD8h
 43294 00007AC8 F7C1D8FF                	test	CX,~attr_changeable
 43295 00007ACC 7405                    	JZ	short OKatts		; Ok if no non-changeable bits set
 43296                                  
 43297                                  ; We need this "hook" here to detect these cases (like user sets one both of
 43298                                  ; vol_id and dir bits) because of the structure of the or $CreateNewFile loop
 43299                                  ; below. The code loops on error_access_denied, but if one of the non
 43300                                  ; changeable attributes is specified, the loop COULD be infinite or WILL be
 43301                                  ; infinite because CreateNewFile will fail with access_denied always. Thus we
 43302                                  ; need to detect these cases before getting to the loop.
 43303                                  
 43304                                  	;mov	ax, 5
 43305 00007ACE B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 43306 00007AD1 EB69                    	JMP	SHORT SETTMPERR
 43307                                  
 43308                                  OKatts:
 43309                                  	;MOV	attr,CX 		; save attribute
 43310 00007AD3 894EF6                  	mov     [bp-10],cx
 43311                                  	;MOV	FilPtrL,DX		; pointer to file
 43312 00007AD6 8956F8                  	mov	[bp-8],dx
 43313                                  	;MOV	FilPtrH,DS
 43314 00007AD9 8C5EFA                  	mov	[bp-6],ds
 43315                                  	;MOV	EndPtrH,DS		; seg pointer to end of dir
 43316 00007ADC 8C5EFE                  	mov	[bp-2],ds
 43317 00007ADF 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 43318 00007AE0 07                      	POP	ES			; destination for nul search
 43319 00007AE1 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 43320 00007AE3 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 43321 00007AE5 F7D9                    	NEG	CX			; number of bytes remaining in segment
 43322                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 43323 00007AE7 09C9                    	OR	CX,CX			;AN000;MS. cx=0 ? ds:dx on segment boundary
 43324 00007AE9 7501                    	JNZ	short okok		;AN000;MS. no
 43325                                  	;MOV	CX,-1			;AN000;MS.
 43326                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 43327                                  	; 17/12/2022
 43328 00007AEB 49                      	dec	cx  ; mov cx,-1
 43329                                  	;mov	cx,-1 ; 0FFFh
 43330                                  okok:					;AN000;
 43331 00007AEC 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			;AN000;
 43332 00007AEE F2AE                    	REPNZ	SCASB			;AN000;
 43333                                  					;AN000;
 43334 00007AF0 4F                      	DEC	DI			; point back to the null
 43335 00007AF1 268A45FF                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI-1]		; Get char before the NUL
 43336 00007AF5 E876DF                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; Is it a path separator?
 43337 00007AF8 7403                    	JZ	short SETENDPTR		; Yes
 43338                                  STOREPTH:
 43339 00007AFA B05C                    	MOV	AL,'\'
 43340 00007AFC AA                      	STOSB				; Add a path separator (and INC DI)
 43341                                  SETENDPTR:
 43342                                  	;MOV	EndPtrL,DI		; pointer to the tail
 43343 00007AFD 8856FC                  	mov	[bp-4],dl
 43344                                  CreateLoop:
 43345 00007B00 16                      	push	ss			; let ReadTime see variables
 43346 00007B01 1F                      	pop	ds
 43347 00007B02 55                      	push	bp
 43348 00007B03 E88690                  	call	READTIME		; go get time
 43349 00007B06 5D                      	pop	bp
 43350                                  ;
 43351                                  ; Time is in CX:DX. Go drop it into the string.
 43352                                  ;
 43353                                  	;les	di,EndPtr		; point to the string
 43354 00007B07 C47EFC                  	les	di,[BP-4]
 43355 00007B0A 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 43356 00007B0C E8A2FF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store upper word
 43357 00007B0F 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 43358 00007B11 E89DFF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store lower word
 43359 00007B14 30C0                    	xor	al,al
 43360 00007B16 AA                      	STOSB				; nul terminate
 43361                                  	;LDS	DX,FilPtr		; get name
 43362 00007B17 C556F8                  	lds	dx,[bp-8]
 43363                                  	;MOV	CX,Attr 		; get attr
 43364 00007B1A 8B4EF6                  	mov	cx,[bp-10]
 43365 00007B1D 55                      	push	bp
 43366 00007B1E E889FF                  	CALL	_$CreateNewFile		; try to create a new file
 43367 00007B21 5D                      	pop	bp
 43368 00007B22 7319                    	JNC	short CreateDone	; failed, go try again
 43369                                  
 43370                                  ; The operation failed and the error has been mapped in AX. Grab the extended
 43371                                  ; error and figure out what to do.
 43372                                  
 43373                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3			; M049 - start
 43374                                  ;;	mov	ax,[ss:EXTERR]				;smr;SS Override
 43375                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_file_exists

 43445                                  ; Input: AL= 0 reserved  AH=6CH

 43667                                  ;BREAK <$LockOper - Lock Calls>
 43668                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43669                                  ;
 43670                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 43671                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle	       (DOS 3.3)
 43672                                  ;	    MOV     CX, OffsetHigh
 43673                                  ;	    MOV     DX, OffsetLow
 43674                                  ;	    MOV     SI, LengthHigh
 43675                                  ;	    MOV     DI, LengthLow
 43676                                  ;	    MOV     AH, LockOper
 43677                                  ;	    MOV     AL, Request
 43678                                  ;	    INT     21h
 43679                                  ;
 43680                                  ;   Error returns:
 43681                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 43682                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 43683                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 43684                                  ;
 43685                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 43686                                  ;	    MOV     AX, 5C??	       (DOS 4.00)
 43687                                  ;
 43688                                  ;				    0? lock all
 43689                                  ;				    8? lock write
 43690                                  ;				    ?2 lock multiple
 43691                                  ;				    ?3 unlock multiple
 43692                                  ;				    ?4 lock/read
 43693                                  ;				    ?5 write/unlock
 43694                                  ;				    ?6 add (lseek EOF/lock/write/unlock)
 43695                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle
 43696                                  ;	    MOV     CX, count or size
 43697                                  ;	    LDS     DX, buffer
 43698                                  ;	    INT     21h
 43699                                  ;
 43700                                  ;   Error returns:
 43701                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 43702                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 43703                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 43704                                  ;
 43705                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43706                                  
 43707                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 43708                                  _$LockOper:
 43709 00007CA3 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1
 43710 00007CA5 770B                    	JA	short lock_bad_func
 43711                                  
 43712 00007CA7 57                      	PUSH	DI			       ; Save LengthLow
 43713 00007CA8 E8D5F3                  	call	SFFromHandle		       ; ES:DI -> SFT
 43714 00007CAB 731D                    	JNC	short lock_do 		       ; have valid handle
 43715 00007CAD 5F                      	POP	DI			       ; Clean stack
 43716                                  	;mov	al,6
 43717 00007CAE B006                    	mov	al,error_invalid_handle
 43718                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 43719                                  ;lockoperr:
 43720                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 43721                                  	; 17/12/2022
 43722 00007CB0 EBEE                    	jmp	short lockoperr ; jmp SYS_RET_ERR
 43723                                  
 43724                                  lock_bad_func:
 43725                                  	;mov	byte [ss:EXTERR_LOCUS],1
 43726 00007CB2 36C606[2303]01          	MOV	byte [SS:EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; Extended Error Locus;smr;SS Override
 43727                                  	;mov	al,1
 43728 00007CB8 B001                    	mov	al,error_invalid_function
 43729                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 43730                                  lockoperrj:
 43731                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 43732 00007CBA EBE4                    	jmp	short lockoperr
 43733                                  
 43734                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 43735                                  
 43736                                  	; MSDOS 6.0 
 43737                                  ; Align_buffer call has been deleted, since it corrupts the DTA (6/5/88) P5013
 43738                                  ; Dead code deleted, MD, 23 Mar 90
 43739                                  
 43740                                  ;lock_do:
 43741                                  ;	; MSDOS 3.3
 43742                                  ;	or	al,al
 43743                                  ;	pop	ax
 43744                                  ;	jz	short DOS_Lock
 43745                                  ;DOS_Unlock:
 43746                                  ;	;test	word [es:di+5],8000h
 43747                                  ;	test	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet
 43748                                  ;	JZ	short LOCAL_UNLOCK
 43749                                  ;	push    ax
 43750                                  ;	mov     ax,110Bh
 43751                                  ;	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - UNLOCK REGION OF FILE
 43752                                  ;			; BX = file handle, CX:DX = starting offset, SI = high word of size

 43915                                  ; LOCK_CHECK

 43918                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 43922                                  ;	[PROC_ID] Set
 43923                                  ; Function:
 43924                                  ;	Check for lock violations on local I/O
 43925                                  ;	Retries are attempted with sleeps in between
 43926                                  ; Outputs:
 43927                                  ;    Carry clear
 43928                                  ;	Operation is OK
 43929                                  ;    Carry set
 43930                                  ;	A lock violation detected
 43931                                  ; Outputs of SETUP preserved
 43932                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 43938                                  LockRetry:
 43939 00007D0D 53                      	push	bx		; save regs
 43940 00007D0E 50                      	push	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 43941                                  
 43942                                  	;MSDOS 3.3
 43943                                  	;Call	far [ss:JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 43944                                  	;MSDOS 6.0
 43945 00007D0F FF1E[B000]              	Call	far [JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 43946

 43948 00007D14 5B                      	pop	bx		; restrore regs
 43949 00007D15 7307                    	jnc	short lc_ret_label ; There are no locks (retnc)
 43950                                  LockN:

 43952 00007D1A 4B                      	DEC	BX		; remember a retry
 43953 00007D1B 75F0                    	JNZ	short LockRetry	; more retries left...
 43954 00007D1D F9                      	STC
 43955                                  lc_ret_label:
 43956 00007D1E C3                      	retn

 43959                                  ; LOCK_VIOLATION
 43960                                  ;MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 43961                                  
 43962                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43963                                  ; Inputs:
 43964                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 43965                                  ;	[READOP] indicates whether error on read or write
 43966                                  ; Function:
 43967                                  ;	Handle Lock violation on compatibility (FCB) mode SFTs
 43968                                  ; Outputs:
 43969                                  ;	Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_lock_violation
 43970                                  ;	Carry clear if user wants a retry
 43971                                  ;
 43972                                  ; DS, ES, DI, CX preserved, others destroyed

 43975                                  LOCK_VIOLATION:

 43977 00007D20 06                      	PUSH	ES
 43978 00007D21 57                      	PUSH	DI
 43979 00007D22 51                      	PUSH	CX
 43980                                  	;mov	ax,21h
 43981 00007D23 B82100                  	MOV	AX,error_lock_violation
 43982                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 43983 00007D26 C606[4B03]18            	MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 43984 00007D2B C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 43985 00007D2F BF0100                  	MOV	DI,1		; Fake some registers
 43986 00007D32 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 43987                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+11]
 43988 00007D34 268B560B                	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FIRST_SECTOR]
 43989 00007D38 E89CDF                  	call	HARDERR
 43990 00007D3B 59                      	POP	CX
 43991 00007D3C 5F                      	POP	DI
 43992 00007D3D 07                      	POP	ES
 43993 00007D3E 1F                      	POP	DS
 43994 00007D3F 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1
 43995 00007D41 74DB                    	jz	short lc_ret_label ; 1 = retry, carry clear
 43996 00007D43 F9                      	STC
 43997 00007D44 C3                      	retn

 44025                                  ; SHARE_CHECK
 44026                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44027                                  ; Inputs:
 44028                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to filled in local file/device SFT for new
 44029                                  ;               instance of file sf_mode ALWAYS has mode (even on FCB SFTs)
 44030                                  ;       [WFP_START] has full path of name
 44031                                  ;       [USER_ID] Set
 44032                                  ;       [PROC_ID] Set
 44033                                  ; Function:
 44034                                  ;       Check for sharing violations on local file/device access
 44035                                  ; Outputs:
 44036                                  ;    Carry clear
 44037                                  ;       Sharing approved
 44038                                  ;    Carry set
 44039                                  ;       A sharing violation detected
 44040                                  ;           AX is error code
 44041                                  ; USES    ALL but DS
 44042                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44043                                  
 44044                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 44045                                  SHARE_CHECK:
 44046                                  	; 26/07/2019
 44047 00007D52 FF1E[9400]              	call	far [JShare+(1*4)] 	; 1 = MFT_Enter
 44048                                  shchk_retn:
 44049 00007D56 C3                      	retn
 44050                                  
 44051                                  ; SHARE_VIOLATION
 44052                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44053                                  ; Inputs:
 44054                                  ;       [THISDPB] Set
 44055                                  ;       AX has error code
 44056                                  ; Function:
 44057                                  ;       Handle Sharing errors
 44058                                  ; Outputs:
 44059                                  ;       Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_sharing_violation
 44060                                  ;       Carry clear if user wants a retry
 44061                                  ;
 44062                                  ; DS, ES, DI preserved, others destroyed
 44063                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44064                                  
 44065                                  SHARE_VIOLATION:
 44066 00007D57 1E                      	PUSH    DS
 44067 00007D58 06                      	PUSH	ES
 44068 00007D59 57                      	PUSH    DI
 44069 00007D5A C606[7505]00            	MOV     byte [READOP],0		; All share errors are reading
 44070                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 44071 00007D5F C606[4B03]18            	MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 44072 00007D64 C42E[8A05]              	LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 44073 00007D68 BF0100                  	MOV     DI,1			; Fake some registers
 44074 00007D6B 89F9                    	MOV     CX,DI
 44075                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+17]
 44076 00007D6D 268B5611                	MOV     DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]
 44077 00007D71 E863DF                  	call	HARDERR
 44078 00007D74 5F                      	POP     DI
 44079 00007D75 07                      	POP	ES
 44080 00007D76 1F                      	POP     DS
 44081 00007D77 3C01                    	CMP     AL,1
 44082 00007D79 74DB                    	jz	short shchk_retn	; 1 = retry, carry clear
 44083 00007D7B F9                      	STC
 44084 00007D7C C3                      	retn
 44085                                  
 44086                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44087                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 44088                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 44089                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 44090                                  ;
 44091                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 44092                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 44093                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 44094                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44095                                  
 44096                                  ShareEnd:
 44097                                  	; 26/07/2019
 44098 00007D7D FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 44099 00007D81 C3                      	retn
 44100                                  
 44101                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 44102                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44103                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 44104                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 44105                                  ;
 44106                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 44107                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 44108                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 44109                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 44110                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 44111                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44112                                  
 44113                                  ShareEnter:
 44114 00007D82 51                      	push	cx
 44115                                  retry:
 44116 00007D83 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 44117                                  attempt:
 44118 00007D87 C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 44119 00007D8B 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 44120                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],axfff
 44121 00007D8D 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 44122 00007D91 51                      	push	cx
 44123 00007D92 E8BDFF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 44124 00007D95 59                      	pop	cx
 44125 00007D96 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 44126 00007D98 E8479A                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 44127 00007D9B E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 44128 00007D9D E8B7FF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 44129 00007DA0 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 44130                                  done:
 44131 00007DA2 59                      	pop	cx
 44132 00007DA3 C3                      	retn
 44133

 44137                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0

 44139                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 44140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44141                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 44142                                  ;
 44143                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 44144                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 44145                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 44146                                  ;
 44147                                  ;	Revision history:
 44148                                  ;
 44149                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 44150                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44151                                  
 44152                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44153                                  ;
 44154                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 44155                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 44156                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 44157                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 44158                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 44159                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 44160                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 44161                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 44162                                  ;
 44163                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44164                                  
 44165                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 44166                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 44167                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 44168                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 44169                                  
 44170                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 44171                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 44172                                  
 44173                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 44174                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 44175                                  
 44176                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 44177                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 44178                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 44179                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 44180                                  
 44181                                  PATCH3_COM_OFFSET	EQU	074H
 44182                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 44183                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 44184                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2

 44186                                  ;**	Data structure passed for ExecReady call
 44187                                  ;
 44188                                  ;struc ERStruc
 44189                                  ; .ER_Reserved:	resw	1	; reserved, should be zero
 44190                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 44191                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 44192                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 44193                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 44194                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 44195                                  ; .size:
 44196                                  ;endstruc

 44199

 44216                                  ExecReady:
