 44221                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 44222 00007DAA 7413                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 44223                                  
 44224                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 44225 00007DAC 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 44226 00007DAF 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 44227 00007DB2 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 44228                                  
 44229                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 44230 00007DB4 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 44231                                  	;mov	cx,[si+12]
 44232 00007DB7 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 44233                                  
 44234                                  	;call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 44235 00007DBA 36FF16[880D]            	call	word [ss:FixExePatch] ; 28/12/2022
 44236                                  	
 44237                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 44238                                  	;call	[ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 44239                                  
 44240                                  er_setver:
 44241                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 44242                                  	; 17/12/2022
 44243 00007DBF F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 44244                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 44245 00007DC3 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 44246                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 44247 00007DC5 1E                      	push	ds
 44248 00007DC6 56                      	push	si
 44249                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 44250 00007DC7 C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 44251 00007DCA E876ED                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 44252 00007DCD E887ED                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 44253 00007DD0 5E                      	pop	si
 44254 00007DD1 1F                      	pop	ds
 44255                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 44256 00007DD2 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 44257 00007DD5 36A1[020F]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 44258 00007DD9 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 44259                                  
 44260                                  er_chkdoshi:
 44261 00007DDD 36803E[870D]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 44262 00007DE3 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 44263                                  
 44264                                  					; M068 - Start
 44265                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 44266 00007DE5 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 44267                                  
 44268                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 44269 00007DE8 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 44270                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 44271                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 44272                                  					; explanation
 44273                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 44274                                  	; 17/12/2022
 44275 00007DEE F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 44276                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 44277 00007DF2 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 44278                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 44279 00007DF4 1E                         	push	ds
 44280 00007DF5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 44281 00007DF7 E88E02                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 44282 00007DFA 1F                      	pop	ds
 44283                                  
 44284                                  er_setA20:
 44285                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 44286                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 44287                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 44288                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 44289                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 44290                                  
 44291 00007DFB 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 44292 00007E00 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 44293                                  					; turned OFF.
 44294                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 44295 00007E04 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 44296 00007E06 C3                      	retn
 44297                                  
 44298                                  ; M028 - END
 44299                                  
 44300                                  
 44301                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 44302                                  %if 0
 44303                                  
 44304                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44305                                  ;
 44306                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 44307                                  ;
 44308                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 44309                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 44310                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 44311                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 44312                                  ;
 44313                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 44314                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 44315                                  ;
 44316                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 44317                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 44318                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 44319                                  ;
 44320                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 44321                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 44322                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 44323                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 44324                                  ; or not.
 44325                                  ;
 44326                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 44327                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 44328                                  ; running in the HMA.
 44329                                  ;
 44330                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 44331                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 44332                                  ;
 44333                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44334                                  
 44335                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 44336                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 44337                                  
 44338                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44339                                  ;
 44340                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 44341                                  ;
 44342                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44343                                  
 44344                                  rpFind1:
 44345                                  	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 44346                                  
 44347                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 44348                                  
 44349                                  ;	cli
 44350                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 44351                                  ;	pusha
 44352                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 44353                                  ;	out	43h, al
 44354                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 44355                                  
 44356                                  rpFind1a:
 44357                                  	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 44358                                  
 44359                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 44360                                  
 44361                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 44362                                  ;	out	37h, al
 44363                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 44364                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 44365                                  
 44366                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 44367                                  
 44368                                  rpFind2:
 44369                                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 44370                                  
 44371                                  rpFind2Len equ	$ - rpFind2
 44372                                  
 44373                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 44374                                  
 44375                                  rpFind3:
 44376                                  	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 44377                                  
 44378                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 44379                                  
 44380                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 44381                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 44382                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 44383                                  
 44384                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 44385                                  
 44386                                  rpRepl2:
 44387                                   	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 44388                                  
 44389                                  rpRepl2Len equ	$ - rpRepl2
 44390                                  
 44391                                  ;	push	eax
 44392                                  ;	push	cx
 44393                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 44394                                  
 44395                                  rpRepl3:
 44396                                  	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 44397                                  
 44398                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 44399                                  
 44400                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 44401                                  ;	pop	cx
 44402                                  ;	pop	eax
 44403                                  
 44404                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 44405                                  
 44406                                  rpFind4:
 44407                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 44408                                  
 44409                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 44410                                  
 44411                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 44412                                  ;	pop	ax
 44413                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 44414                                  
 44415                                  rpFind5:
 44416                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 44417                                  
 44418                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 44419                                  
 44420                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 44421                                  ;	int	67h
 44422                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 44423                                  ;	jmp	bx
 44424                                  
 44425                                  rpRepl4:
 44426                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 44427                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 44428                                  
 44429                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 44430                                  
 44431                                  	db	00h, 00h
 44432                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 44433                                  
 44434                                  rpRepl4o2Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 44435                                  
 44436                                  	db	00h, 00h
 44437                                  
 44438                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 44439                                  
 44440                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 44441                                  ;	pop	ax
 44442                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 44443                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 44444                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 44445                                  
 44446                                  rpRepl5:
 44447                                  	db	8Bh, 0E1h
 44448                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 0A1h
 44449                                  
 44450                                  rpRepl5o1Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 44451                                  
 44452                                  	db	00h, 00h
 44453                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 8Bh, 36h
 44454                                  
 44455                                  rpRepl5o2Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 44456                                  
 44457                                  	db	00h, 00h
 44458                                  	db	0FFh, 0E3h
 44459                                  
 44460                                  rpRepl5Len equ	$ - rpRepl5
 44461                                  
 44462                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 44463                                  ;	mov	eax, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 44464                                  ;	mov	esi, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 44465                                  ;	jmp	bx
 44466                                  
 44467                                  ; bug # 3 -- loss of high EAX, EBX, ECX, EDX on 386+ only if VCPI
 44468                                  
 44469                                  rpFind6:
 44470                                  	db	0FAh, 52h, 51h
 44471                                  
 44472                                  rpFind6Len equ	$ - rpFind6
 44473                                  
 44474                                  ;	cli
 44475                                  ;	push	dx
 44476                                  ;	push	cx
 44477                                  
 44478                                  rpFind7a:
 44479                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 66h, 26h, 0FFh, 1Eh
 44480                                  
 44481                                  rpFind7aLen equ	$ - rpFind7a
 44482                                  
 44483                                  ;	mov	ax, 0DE0Ch
 44484                                  ;	call	fword ptr es:[xxxx]
 44485                                  
 44486                                  rpFind7b:
 44487                                  	db	59h, 5Ah, 5Bh
 44488                                  
 44489                                  rpFind7bLen equ	$ - rpFind7b
 44490                                  
 44491                                  ;	pop	cx
 44492                                  ;	pop	dx
 44493                                  ;	pop	bx
 44494                                  
 44495                                  rpRepl6 :
 44496                                  	db	0FAh, 66h, 50h, 66h, 53h, 66h, 51h, 66h, 52h
 44497                                  
 44498                                  rpRepl6Len equ	$ - rpRepl6
 44499                                  
 44500                                  ;	cli
 44501                                  ;	push	eax
 44502                                  ;	push	ebx
 44503                                  ;	push	ecx
 44504                                  ;	push	edx
 44505                                  
 44506                                  rpRepl7:
 44507                                  	db	66h, 5Ah, 66h, 59h, 66h, 5Bh, 66h, 58h, 5Bh
 44508                                  
 44509                                  rpRepl7Len equ	$ - rpRepl7
 44510                                  
 44511                                  ;	pop	edx
 44512                                  ;	pop	ecx
 44513                                  ;	pop	ebx
 44514                                  ;	pop	eax
 44515                                  ;	pop	bx
 44516                                  
 44517                                  ; bug # 4 -- loss of high EAX and EBX on 386+ only if VCPI
 44518                                  
 44519                                  rpFind8:
 44520                                   	db	60h, 06h, 1Eh, 0B8h, 00h, 00h, 8Eh, 0D8h
 44521                                  
 44522                                  rpFind8Len equ	$ - rpFind8
 44523                                  
 44524                                  ;	pusha
 44525                                  ;	push	es
 44526                                  ;	push	ds
 44527                                  ;	mov	ax, dgroup	;jump back to here from replace8
 44528                                  ;	mov	ds, ax
 44529                                  
 44530                                  rpFind9 :
 44531                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 61h
 44532                                  
 44533                                  rpFind9Len equ	$ - rpFind9
 44534                                  
 44535                                  ;	pop	ds
 44536                                  ;	pop	es
 44537                                  ;	popa
 44538                                  
 44539                                  rpRepl8:
 44540                                   	db	66h, 60h, 06h, 1Eh
 44541                                  
 44542                                  rpRepl8Len equ	$ - rpRepl8
 44543                                  
 44544                                  ;	pushad
 44545                                  ;	push	es
 44546                                  ;	push	ds
 44547                                  
 44548                                  rpRepl9:
 44549                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 66h, 61h, 0C3h
 44550                                  
 44551                                  rpRepl9Len equ	$ - rpRepl9
 44552                                  
 44553                                  ;	pop	ds
 44554                                  ;	pop	es
 44555                                  ;	popad
 44556                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 44557                                  
 44558                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44559                                  
 44560                                  struc SearchPair
 44561                                   .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 44562                                   .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 44563                                   .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 44564                                   .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 44565                                   .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 44566                                   .size:
 44567                                  endstruc
 44568                                  
 44569                                  ;rpBug1Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind2, rpFind2Len, offset rpFind3, rpFind3Len, 20h>
 44570                                  
 44571                                  rpBug1Strs:
 44572                                  	dw	rpFind2
 44573                                  	dw	rpFind2Len ; 3
 44574                                  	dw	rpFind3
 44575                                  	dw	rpFind3Len ; 4
 44576                                  	dw	20h
 44577                                  
 44578                                  ;rpBug2Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind4, rpFind4Len, offset rpFind5, rpFind5Len, 80h>
 44579                                  
 44580                                  rpBug2Strs:
 44581                                  	dw	rpFind4
 44582                                  	dw	rpFind4Len ; 4
 44583                                  	dw	rpFind5
 44584                                  	dw	rpFind5Len ; 9
 44585                                  	dw	80h
 44586                                  
 44587                                  ;rpBug3Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind6, rpFind6Len, offset rpFind7a, rpFind7aLen, 80h>
 44588                                  
 44589                                  rpBug3Strs:
 44590                                  	dw	rpFind6
 44591                                  	dw	rpFind6Len ; 3
 44592                                  	dw	rpFind7a
 44593                                  	dw	rpFind7aLen ; 7
 44594                                  	dw	80h
 44595                                  
 44596                                  ;rpBug4Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind8, 4, offset rpFind9, rpFind9Len, 80h>
 44597                                  
 44598                                  rpBug4Strs:
 44599                                  	dw	rpFind8
 44600                                  	dw	4
 44601                                  	dw	rpFind9
 44602                                  	dw	rpFind9Len ; 3
 44603                                  	dw	80h
 44604                                  
 44605                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44606                                  
 44607                                  struc StackVars
 44608                                   .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 44609                                   .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 44610                                   .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 44611                                   .size:
 44612                                  endstruc
 44613                                  
 44614                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44615                                  
 44616                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 44617                                  
 44618                                  Rational386Patch:
 44619                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 44620                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 44621                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 44622                                  
 44623                                  	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 44624                                  	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 44625                                  
 44626                                  	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 44627                                  	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 44628                                  
 44629                                  	push	ax
 44630                                  
 44631                                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 44632                                  	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 44633                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 44634                                  	cmp	[es:28],ax
 44635                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 44636                                  	cmp	[es:36],ax
 44637                                  	je	short rp3Maybe
 44638                                  rp3QO_ax:
 44639                                  	pop	ax
 44640                                  rp3QuickOut:
 44641                                  	retn
 44642                                  
 44643                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 44644                                  
 44645                                  rp3Maybe:
 44646                                  	cld
 44647                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 44648                                  	push	cx
 44649                                  	push	dx
 44650                                  	push	si
 44651                                  	push	di
 44652                                  	push	es
 44653                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 44654                                  	push	bp
 44655                                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 44656                                  	mov	bp,sp
 44657                                  
 44658                                  	push	cs
 44659                                  	pop	ds
 44660                                  
 44661                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 44662                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 44663                                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 44664                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 44665                                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 44666                                  	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 44667                                  
 44668                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 44669                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 44670                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 44671                                  ; an 80286 system.
 44672                                  
 44673                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 44674                                  
 44675                                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 44676                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 44677                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 44678                                  
 44679                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 44680                                  
 44681                                  	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 44682                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 44683                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 44684                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 44685                                  
 44686                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 44687                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 44688                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 44689                                  
 44690                                  	mov	si,rpFind1a
 44691                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1aLen  ;8
 44692                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 44693                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 44694                                  
 44695                                  rp3Exit_j:
 44696                                  	jmp	rp3Exit
 44697                                  
 44698                                  ; Found the location to write patch code! DI = offset in code seg.
 44699                                  
 44700                                  rpGotPatch:
 44701                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 44702                                  	mov	[bp-StackVars.sv_pPatch],di	; save patch pointer
 44703                                  
 44704                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44705                                  ; Bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 44706                                  
 44707                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],381
 44708                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],381 ; only need bug 1 if version
 44709                                  	cmp	word [bp],381
 44710                                  	jae	short rpBug2			;   < 3.81
 44711                                  
 44712                                  	mov	bx,rpBug1Strs			; locate find2 & find3 code
 44713                                  	call	FindBadCode
 44714                                  	jc	short rpBug2
 44715                                  
 44716                                  ; si = rpFind2 offset, di = rpFind3 offset
 44717                                  
 44718                                  	push	di
 44719                                  	mov	di,si				; rpFind2 offset
 44720                                  	mov	dx,rpFind2Len ; 3
 44721                                  
 44722                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],51h	 	; find2 preceeded by push cx?
 44723                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx
 44724                                  
 44725                                  	dec	di				;   yes, gobble up push cx too
 44726                                  	inc	dx
 44727                                  rp_no_cx:
 44728                                  	mov	si,rpRepl2			; patch out find2 sequence
 44729                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl2Len  ; 6
 44730                                  	call	GenPatch
 44731                                  
 44732                                  	pop	di				; rpFind3 offset
 44733                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],59h 		; find3 preceeded by pop cx?
 44734                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx2
 44735                                  
 44736                                  	mov	byte [es:di-1],90h		;   yes, no-op it
 44737                                  rp_no_cx2:
 44738                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 44739                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; change offset of far jmp
 44740                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],ax
 44741                                  	mov	[es:di+rpFind3Len],ax		;   to go to patch code
 44742                                  
 44743                                  	push	di				; save find3 offset
 44744                                  	mov	si,rpRepl3			; copy repl3 to patch area
 44745                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl3Len ; 5
 44746                                  	call	CopyPatch
 44747                                  
 44748                                  	pop	bx				; find3 offset
 44749                                  	add	bx,rpFind3Len+4	 ; 8		; skip over find3 and far jmp
 44750                                  	call	GenJump 			; jmp back from patch area
 44751                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 44752                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch], di	;   to main-line, update patch
 44753                                  						;   area pointer
 44754                                  
 44755                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44756                                  ; Bug # 2 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 44757                                  
 44758                                  rpBug2:
 44759                                  	mov	bx,rpBug2Strs			; locate find4 & find5 code
 44760                                  	call	FindBadCode
 44761                                  	jc	short rpBug3
 44762                                  
 44763                                  ; si = rpFind4 offset, di = rpFind5 offset
 44764                                  
 44765                                  	;push	word [bp+4]
 44766                                  	push	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; save current patch pointer
 44767                                  						;   (where repl4 goes)
 44768                                  	push	di				; save find5 offset
 44769                                  
 44770                                  	mov	di,si
 44771                                  	mov	dx,rpFind4Len ; 4
 44772                                  	mov	si,rpRepl4
 44773                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl4Len ; 15
 44774                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find4 code
 44775                                  
 44776                                  	pop	di				; find5 offset
 44777                                  	add	di,5				; keep 5 bytes of find5 code
 44778                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 44779                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; jump to patch area
 44780                                  	push	bx				; save repl5 location
 44781                                  	call	GenJump
 44782                                  
 44783                                  	mov	si,rpRepl5			; copy repl5 code to patch
 44784                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl5Len  ; 15		;   area -- it has a jmp bx
 44785                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no need to jmp back to
 44786                                  						;   main-line code
 44787                                  
 44788                                  ; patches have been made, now update the patch code to store/load dwords just
 44789                                  ; after the code in the patch area
 44790                                  
 44791                                  	pop	di				; repl5 location
 44792                                  	pop	si				; repl4 location
 44793                                  
 44794                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 44795                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; (where dwords go)
 44796                                  
 44797                                  	;mov	[es:si+7],ax
 44798                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o1Len],ax		; offset for EAX
 44799                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 44800                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o1Len],ax
 44801                                  	add	ax,4
 44802                                  	;mov	[es:si+0Dh],ax
 44803                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o2Len],ax		; offset for ESI
 44804                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],ax
 44805                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o2Len],ax
 44806                                  
 44807                                  	;add	word [bp+4],8
 44808                                  	add	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],8	; reserve space for 2 dwords in
 44809                                  						; patch area
 44810                                  
 44811                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44812                                  ; Bug # 3 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 44813                                  
 44814                                  rpBug3:
 44815                                  	mov	bx,rpBug3Strs			; locate find6 & find7a code
 44816                                  	call	FindBadCode
 44817                                  	jc	short rpBug4
 44818                                  
 44819                                  	;add	di,9
 44820                                  	add	di,rpFind7aLen + 2		; skip over offset in find7a
 44821                                  	push	si				;   code and locate find7b
 44822                                  	mov	si,rpFind7b			;   sequence
 44823                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 44824                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di
 44825                                  	pop	si
 44826                                  	jnz	short rpBug4
 44827                                  
 44828                                  	push	di				; save find7b code offset
 44829                                  
 44830                                  	mov	di,si
 44831                                  	mov	dx,rpFind6Len ; 3
 44832                                  	mov	si,rpRepl6
 44833                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl6Len ; 9
 44834                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find6 code
 44835                                  
 44836                                  	pop	di
 44837                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 44838                                  	mov	si,rpRepl7
 44839                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl7Len ; 9
 44840                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find7b code
 44841                                  
 44842                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44843                                  ; Bug # 4 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 44844                                  
 44845                                  rpBug4:
 44846                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],360
 44847                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],360 ; only applies if 
 44848                                  	cmp	word [bp],360
 44849                                  	jbe	short rp3Exit 			; version > 3.60 and < 3.95
 44850                                  
 44851                                  	mov	bx,rpBug4Strs			; locate find8 & find9 code
 44852                                  	call	FindBadCode
 44853                                  	jc	short rp3Exit
 44854                                  
 44855                                  	push	di				; save find9 code offset
 44856                                  
 44857                                  	mov	di,si
 44858                                  	mov	dx,3
 44859                                  	mov	si,rpRepl8
 44860                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl8Len ; 4
 44861                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find8 code
 44862                                  
 44863                                  	pop	di				; find9 offset
 44864                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 44865                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; patch find9 to jmp to
 44866                                  	call	GenJump 			;   patch area
 44867                                  
 44868                                  	mov	si,rpRepl9			; copy replacement code to
 44869                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl9Len ; 5		;   patch area--it does a RET
 44870                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no jmp back to main-line
 44871                                  
 44872                                  rp3Exit:
 44873                                  	add	sp,StackVars.size
 44874                                  	pop	bp
 44875                                  	pop	ds
 44876                                  	pop	es
 44877                                  	pop	di
 44878                                  	pop	si
 44879                                  	pop	dx
 44880                                  	pop	cx
 44881                                  	pop	bx
 44882                                  	pop	ax
 44883                                  	retn
 44884                                  
 44885                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44886                                  ;
 44887                                  ; FindBadCode
 44888                                  ;
 44889                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 44890                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 44891                                  ;
 44892                                  ; Entry:
 44893                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 44894                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 44895                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 44896                                  ;
 44897                                  ; Exit:
 44898                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 44899                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 44900                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 44901                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 44902                                  ;
 44903                                  ; Used:
 44904                                  ;	CX
 44905                                  ;
 44906                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44907                                  
 44908                                  ;struc SearchPair
 44909                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 44910                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 44911                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 44912                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 44913                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 44914                                  ; .size:
 44915                                  ;endstruc
 44916                                  
 44917                                  FindBadCode:
 44918                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 44919                                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 44920                                  
 44921                                  	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 44922                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 44923                                  	
 44924                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 44925                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 44926                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 44927                                  	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 44928                                  
 44929                                  	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 44930                                  
 44931                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 44932                                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 44933                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 44934                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 44935                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 44936                                  
 44937                                  	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 44938                                  	jnz	short fbc_error
 44939                                  
 44940                                  	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 44941                                  	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 44942                                  	jc	short fbc_error
 44943                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 44944                                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 44945                                  	ja	short fbc_error
 44946                                  
 44947                                  	clc
 44948                                  	retn
 44949                                  
 44950                                  fbc_error:
 44951                                  	stc
 44952                                  	retn
 44953                                  
 44954                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44955                                  ;
 44956                                  ; GenPatch
 44957                                  ;
 44958                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 44959                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 44960                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 44961                                  ; code.
 44962                                  ;
 44963                                  ; Entry:
 44964                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 44965                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 44966                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 44967                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 44968                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 44969                                  ;
 44970                                  ; Exit:
 44971                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 44972                                  ;
 44973                                  ; Used:
 44974                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 44975                                  ;
 44976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44977                                  
 44978                                  GenPatch:
 44979                                  	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 44980                                  
 44981                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 44982                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 44983                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 44984                                  	call	GenJump
 44985                                  
 44986                                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 44987                                  
 44988                                  	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 44989                                  	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 44990                                  
 44991                                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 44992                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 44993                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 44994                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 44995                                  	retn
 44996                                  
 44997                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44998                                  ;
 44999                                  ; CopyPatch
 45000                                  ;
 45001                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 45002                                  ;
 45003                                  ; Entry:
 45004                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 45005                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 45006                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 45007                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 45008                                  ;
 45009                                  ; Exit:
 45010                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 45011                                  ;
 45012                                  ; Used:
 45013                                  ;	SI, Flags
 45014                                  ;
 45015                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45016                                  
 45017                                  CopyPatch:
 45018                                  	push	cx
 45019                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 45020                                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 45021                                  	cld
 45022                                  	rep movsb
 45023                                  	pop	cx
 45024                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 45025                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 45026                                  	retn
 45027                                  
 45028                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45029                                  ;
 45030                                  ; GenJump
 45031                                  ;
 45032                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 45033                                  ;
 45034                                  ; Entry:
 45035                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 45036                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 45037                                  ;
 45038                                  ; Exit:
 45039                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 45040                                  ;
 45041                                  ; Used:
 45042                                  ;	AX
 45043                                  ;
 45044                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45045                                  
 45046                                  GenJump:
 45047                                  	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 45048                                  	stosb
 45049                                  
 45050                                  	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 45051                                  	sub	ax,di
 45052                                  	sub	ax,2
 45053                                  
 45054                                  	stosw			; output offset
 45055                                  
 45056                                  	retn
 45057                                  
 45058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45059                                  ;
 45060                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 45061                                  ;
 45062                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 45063                                  ;
 45064                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 45065                                  ;
 45066                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45067                                  
 45068                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 45069                                  	mov	di,200h
 45070                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 45071                                  	push	cx
 45072                                  	sub	cx,dx
 45073                                  	inc	cx
 45074                                  scsagain:
 45075                                  	push	si
 45076                                  	push	di
 45077                                  	push	cx
 45078                                  	mov	cx,dx
 45079                                  	rep	cmpsb
 45080                                  	pop	cx
 45081                                  	pop	di
 45082                                  	pop	si
 45083                                  	je	short scsfound
 45084                                  	inc	di
 45085                                  	loop	scsagain
 45086                                  scsfound:
 45087                                  	pop	cx
 45088                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 45089                                  	retn
 45090                                  	
 45091                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45092                                  ;
 45093                                  ; VerifyVersion
 45094                                  ;
 45095                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 45096                                  ; from ES:2A.
 45097                                  ;
 45098                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 45099                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 45100                                  ;
 45101                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45102                                  
 45103                                  VerifyVersion:
 45104                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 45105                                  					;  in ascii
 45106                                  	mov	bl,10
 45107                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 45108                                  
 45109                                  	call	VVDigit
 45110                                  	jne	short vvexit
 45111                                  	call	VVDigit
 45112                                  	jne	short vvexit
 45113                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 45114                                  	jne	short vvexit
 45115                                  	dec	si
 45116                                  	;call	VVDigit
 45117                                  	; 18/12/2022
 45118                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 45119                                  ;vvexit:
 45120                                  	;retn
 45121                                  VVDigit:
 45122                                  	div	bl
 45123                                  	add	ah,'0'
 45124                                  	dec	si
 45125                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 45126                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 45127                                  	retn
 45128                                  
 45129                                  %endif
 45130

 45396                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 45397                                  ;
 45398                                  ; Procedure Name 	: ExePackPatch
 45399                                  ;
 45400                                  ; Inputs	 	: DS 			-> DOSDATA
 45401                                  ;			  ES:0 			-> read in image
 45402                                  ;			  ax:cx = start cs:ip of program
 45403                                  ; Output		:		
 45404                                  ;
 45405                                  ;	1. If ES <= 0fffh
 45406                                  ;	   2. if exepack signature ('RB') found
 45407                                  ;	      3. if common code to patch compares (for 3 diff. versions)
 45408                                  ;	       	 4. if rest of the code & checksum compares
 45409                                  ;	  	    5. overlay buggy code with code in 
 45410                                  ;		       doscode:str1.
 45411                                  ;		 6. endif
 45412                                  ;	      7. endif
 45413                                  ;	   8. endif
 45414                                  ;	9. endif
 45415                                  ;
 45416                                  ;
 45417                                  ; Uses			: NONE
 45418                                  ;
 45419                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 45420                                  		
 45421                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 45422                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 45423                                  ExePackPatch:
 45424 00007F57 53                      	push	bx
 45425 00007F58 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; bx has load segment
 45426 00007F5A 81FBFF0F                	cmp	bx,0FFFh		; Q: is the load segment > 64K
 45427 00007F5E 7602                    	jbe	short ep_cont		; N: 
 45428 00007F60 5B                      	pop	bx			; Y: no need to patch
 45429 00007F61 C3                      	retn
 45430                                  ep_cont:
 45431 00007F62 1E                      	push	ds
 45432 00007F63 06                      	push	es
 45433 00007F64 50                      	push	ax
 45434 00007F65 51                      	push	cx
 45435 00007F66 56                      	push	si
 45436 00007F67 57                      	push	di
 45437                                  	
 45438                                  		; M033 - start
 45439                                  		; exepacked programs have an IP of 12h (>=2)
 45440                                  
 45441 00007F68 83E902                  	sub	cx,2			; Q: is IP >=2 
 45442 00007F6B 7303                    	jnb	short epp_1		; N: exit
 45443 00007F6D E9C500                  	jmp	ep_notpacked
 45444                                  					; ax:cx now points to location of
 45445                                  					; 'RB' if this is an exepacked file.
 45446                                  		; M033 - end
 45447                                  epp_1:
 45448 00007F70 89CF                    	mov	di,cx
 45449 00007F72 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 45450 00007F74 36893E[8700]            	mov	[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET],di	; save pointer to 'RB' in 
 45451                                  					; unpack_offset
 45452                                  
 45453 00007F79 26813D5242              	cmp	word [es:di],'RB' ; 4252h
 45454                                  	;ljne	ep_notpacked
 45455 00007F7E 7403                    	je	short epp_2
 45456 00007F80 E9B200                  	jmp	ep_notpacked
 45457                                  epp_2:

 45460                                  
 45461                                  	;add	di,6Ch

 45463                                  					;          file where we hope to find
 45464                                  					;	   scan string. 
 45465

 45467                                  
 45468 00007F8B 7524                    	jnz	short ep_chkpatch2	; Q: does the patch match
 45469                                  					; N: check at patch2_offset
 45470                                  					; Y: check for rest of patch string
 45471 00007F8D BE[6D7E]                	mov	si,scan_patch1
 45472                                  					; ds:si -> scan string 
 45473 00007F90 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; restore di to point to 'RB'
 45474

 45476                                  	; 07/12/2022

 45537                                  					; Y: overlay code with new 
 45538                                  						
 45539                                  ep_patchcode2:			       	; M046 - End
 45540 00007FDE BE[077E]                	mov	si,str1

 45610                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45611                                  ;
 45612                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: chk_common_str
 45613                                  ;
 45614                                  ;	Input		: DS = DOSCODE
 45615                                  ;			; ES:DI points to string in packed file
 45616                                  ;
 45617                                  ;	Output		; Z if match else NZ
 45618                                  ;
 45619                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45620                                  
 45621                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 45622                                  chk_common_str:
 45623 0000803D BE[377F]                	mov	si,scan_com
 45624                                  					; ds:si -> scan string 
 45625                                  	;mov	cx,32
 45626 00008040 B92000                  	mov	cx,size_scan_com
 45627                                  
 45628 00008043 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb	       
 45629                                  
 45630                                  					; M046 - start
 45631                                  	; a fourth possible version of these exepacked programs have a 
 45632                                  	; 056h instead of 06Bh. See scan_com above
 45633                                  	;
 45634                                  	; 	db  75h, 6Bh		;jne CorruptExe		
 45635                                  	;
 45636                                  	; If the mismatch at this point is due to a 56h instead of 6Bh 
 45637                                  	; we shall try to match the rest of the string
 45638                                  	;
 45639                                  
 45640 00008045 7409                    	jz	short ccs_done
 45641 00008047 26807DFF56              	cmp	byte [es:di-1],56h
 45642 0000804C 7502                    	jnz	short ccs_done
 45643                                  
 45644 0000804E F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb	    
 45645                                  ccs_done:				; M046 - end
 45646 00008050 C3                      	retn
 45647                                  
 45648                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45649                                  ;
 45650                                  ;	Procedure Name	: chk_patchsum
 45651                                  ;
 45652                                  ;	Input		: DS:SI -> string we're looking for
 45653                                  ;			: ES:DI -> offset in packed file
 45654                                  ;			: CX 	= scan length
 45655                                  ;			: BX	= length of check sum
 45656                                  ;			: AX 	= value of check sum
 45657                                  ;
 45658                                  ;	Output		: if patch & check sum compare
 45659                                  ;				NC
 45660                                  ;			  else
 45661                                  ;				CY
 45662                                  ;
 45663                                  ;	Uses		: AX, BX, CX, SI
 45664                                  ;
 45665                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45666                                  
 45667                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 45668                                  chk_patchsum:
 45669 00008051 57                      	push	di
 45670                                  
 45671 00008052 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb			   
 45672                                  
 45673 00008054 7518                    	jnz	short cp_fail		; Q: does the patch match
 45674                                  					; N: exit
 45675                                  					; Y:	
 45676                                  
 45677                                  		; we do a check sum starting from the location of the 
 45678                                  		; exepack signature 'RB' up to 11c/2 bytes, the end of the
 45679                                  		; unpacking code.
 45680                                  
 45681 00008056 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; di -> start of unpack code
 45682 0000805B 89D9                    	mov	cx,bx			; cx = length of check sum
 45683                                  
 45684 0000805D 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; save check sum passed to us in bx
 45685 0000805F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 45686                                  ep_chksum:
 45687 00008061 260305                  	add	ax,[es:di]
 45688 00008064 83C702                  	add	di,2
 45689 00008067 E2F8                    	loop	ep_chksum
 45690                                  
 45691 00008069 5F                      	pop	di			; restore di
 45692                                  
 45693 0000806A 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		 	; Q: does the check sum match
 45694                                  	;jne	short cp_fail		; N: exit
 45695                                  					; Y: 
 45696                                  	; 25/09/2023
 45697                                  	;clc	
 45698                                  	;retn
 45699 0000806C 74E2                    	je	short ccs_done ; cf=0
 45700                                  	
 45701                                  cp_fail:
 45702 0000806E F9                      	stc
 45703 0000806F C3                      	retn
 45704
